[2;36m                    [0m         [39msubprocess command returned a non-zero exit status: [0m[1;36m1[0m                               [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mINFO:__main__:Running: docker run --privileged --shm-[0m[33msize[0m[39m=[0m[35m2g[0m[39m --platform linux/amd64[0m [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m--rm -i -e [0m[33mHELPER[0m[39m=[0m[3;92mTrue[0m[39m -e [0m[33mARCHITECTURE[0m[39m=[0m[35mx86_64[0m[39m -v [0m                                   [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [35m/home/qqor/crete/packages/python_oss_fuzz/.oss_fuzz/build/out/[0m[95mmongoose[0m[39m:[0m[35m/[0m[95mout[0m[39m -v [0m     [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [35m/tmp/[0m[95mtmp6oxomw4r[0m[39m:[0m[35m/[0m[95mtestcase[0m[39m -t ghcr.io/aixcc-finals/base-runner:v1.[0m[1;36m3.0[0m[39m reproduce [0m    [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mfuzz -[0m[33mruns[0m[39m=[0m[1;36m100[0m[39m.[0m                                                                     [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m===Evaluation [0m[33mReport[0m[39m===[0m                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m# Evaluation Report[0m                                                                 [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m## Summary[0m                                                                          [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mA stack-buffer-overflow vulnerability has been detected by AddressSanitizer during [0m [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mfuzzing of the Mongoose codebase. The overflow occurs when writing [0m[1;36m1[0m[39m byte beyond [0m   [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mthe bounds of a stack-allocated variable `tmp371` [0m[1;39m([0m[1;36m8[0m[39m bytes in size, allocated at [0m   [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mstack offset [0m[1;36m112[0m[39m-[0m[1;36m120[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m in the `mg_vxprintf` function. The write occurs at offset [0m    [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m120[0m[39m, which is immediately after the variable's allocated space. The error manifests[0m [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mthrough a call chain starting from `LLVMFuzzerTestOneInput` through HTTP parsing [0m   [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mand logging functions, ultimately reaching the formatting/printf implementation [0m    [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mwhere the overflow occurs.[0m                                                          [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m## Description[0m                                                                      [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m### Issue Overview[0m                                                                  [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mThe issue is a **stack-buffer-overflow** vulnerability with a scariness score of [0m   [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m46[0m[39m, classified as a [0m[32m"1-byte-write-stack-buffer-overflow"[0m[39m. The overflow is detected [0m [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mwhen the fuzzer runs with AddressSanitizer instrumentation enabled, using libfuzzer[0m [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mas the fuzzing engine with [0m[1;36m100[0m[39m runs on a test case.[0m                                 [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m### Vulnerability Details[0m                                                           [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mThe stack trace reveals the following call sequence leading to the overflow:[0m        [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m1[0m[39m. **Entry Point**: `LLVMFuzzerTestOneInput` in `[0m[35m/src/mongoose/test/[0m[95mfuzz.c[0m[39m:[0m[1;92m32:7[0m[39m` - [0m [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mthe fuzzing harness that processes input[0m                                            [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m2[0m[39m. **HTTP Processing**: `mg_http_parse` in `[0m[35m/src/mongoose/src/[0m[95mhttp.c[0m[39m:[0m[1;92m317:9[0m[39m` - [0m      [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mparses HTTP data from the fuzzed input[0m                                              [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m3[0m[39m. **Logging**: `mg_log` in `[0m[35m/src/mongoose/src/[0m[95mlog.c[0m[39m:[0m[1;92m43:3[0m[39m` - logs information [0m      [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mduring HTTP parsing[0m                                                                 [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m4[0m[39m. **Formatting Layer**: `mg_vxprintf` in `[0m[35m/src/mongoose/src/[0m[95mfmt.c[0m[39m:[0m[1;92m323:15[0m[39m` - [0m       [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mperforms formatted string operations[0m                                                [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m5[0m[39m. **Double Conversion**: `mg_dtoa` in `[0m[35m/src/mongoose/src/[0m[95mfmt.c[0m[39m` - converts double [0m [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mto ASCII representation[0m                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m6[0m[39m. **Printf Operations**: `mg_snprintf` and `mg_vsnprintf` in [0m                      [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m`[0m[35m/src/mongoose/src/[0m[95mprintf.c[0m[39m` - string formatting functions[0m                          [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m7[0m[39m. **Overflow Location**: `mg_putchar_iobuf_static` and ultimately [0m                 [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m`mg_pfn_iobuf_private` in `[0m[35m/src/mongoose/src/[0m[95mprintf.c[0m[39m` and [0m                         [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m`[0m[35m/src/mongoose/src/[0m[95mprintf.c[0m[39m:[0m[1;92m39:3[0m[39m` - where the actual [0m[1;36m1[0m[39m-byte write beyond the buffer[0m [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39moccurs[0m                                                                              [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m### Stack Frame Analysis[0m                                                            [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mThe overflow occurs in the `mg_vxprintf` function's stack frame at [0m                 [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m`[0m[35m/src/mongoose/src/[0m[95mfmt.c[0m[39m:[0m[1;36m247[0m[39m`. The frame contains:[0m                                  [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m- A [0m[1;36m40[0m[39m-byte variable `tmp` at offset [0m[1;39m[[0m[1;36m32[0m[39m, [0m[1;36m72[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m defined at line [0m[1;36m276[0m                   [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m- An [0m[1;36m8[0m[39m-byte variable `tmp371` at offset [0m[1;39m[[0m[1;36m112[0m[39m, [0m[1;36m120[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m defined at line [0m[1;36m319[0m              [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m- The memory access occurs at offset [0m[1;36m120[0m[39m, which is exactly [0m[1;36m1[0m[39m byte past the end of [0m  [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m`tmp371`[0m                                                                            [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m### Memory Access Pattern[0m                                                           [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mThe shadow bytes analysis shows:[0m                                                    [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m- The variable `tmp371` is located at a valid stack position [0m[1;39m([0m[39mmarked as `[0m[1;36m00[0m[39m` for [0m   [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39maddressable[0m[1;39m)[0m                                                                        [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m- The overflow write targets the right redzone marker [0m[1;39m([0m[39m`f3`[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m immediately following [0m [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mthe variable[0m                                                                        [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m- This indicates the write operation attempted to access memory exactly at the [0m     [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mboundary where the stack protection zone begins[0m                                     [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m### Code Areas Requiring Investigation[0m                                              [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mTo understand the complete context of this vulnerability, the following components [0m [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mshould be examined:[0m                                                                 [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m1[0m[39m. **Formatting Module** [0m[1;39m([0m[39m`[0m[35m/src/mongoose/src/[0m[95mfmt.c[0m[39m`[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m:[0m                               [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m   - The `mg_vxprintf` function implementation, particularly around line [0m[1;36m247[0m[39m where [0m [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mthe vulnerable stack frame is created[0m                                               [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m   - Lines [0m[1;36m276[0m[39m and [0m[1;36m319[0m[39m where `tmp` and `tmp371` variables are declared[0m              [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m   - Line [0m[1;36m315[0m[39m and [0m[1;36m323[0m[39m where `scpy` and `mg_dtoa` are called[0m                         [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m   - The `scpy` function implementation at line [0m[1;36m233[0m                                 [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m2[0m[39m. **Printf Implementation** [0m[1;39m([0m[39m`[0m[35m/src/mongoose/src/[0m[95mprintf.c[0m[39m`[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m:[0m                        [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m   - The `mg_pfn_iobuf_private` function where the actual overflow write occurs[0m     [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m   - The `mg_putchar_iobuf_static` function at line [0m[1;36m39[0m                              [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m   - The `mg_vsnprintf` and `mg_snprintf` functions [0m[1;39m([0m[39mlines [0m[1;36m48[0m[39m and [0m[1;36m57[0m[1;39m)[0m               [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m   - Buffer management logic for handling output operations[0m                         [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m3[0m[39m. **Double-to-ASCII Conversion** [0m[1;39m([0m[39m`[0m[35m/src/mongoose/src/[0m[95mfmt.c[0m[39m`[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m:[0m                      [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m   - The `mg_dtoa` function implementation[0m                                          [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m   - How it interacts with the temporary buffer `tmp371`[0m                            [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m   - Buffer size calculations and boundary checks[0m                                   [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m4[0m[39m. **HTTP Parsing** [0m[1;39m([0m[39m`[0m[35m/src/mongoose/src/[0m[95mhttp.c[0m[39m`[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m:[0m                                   [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m   - The `mg_http_parse` function at line [0m[1;36m317[0m                                       [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m   - What triggers the logging operation that leads to the formatting call[0m          [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m5[0m[39m. **Logging Module** [0m[1;39m([0m[39m`[0m[35m/src/mongoose/src/[0m[95mlog.c[0m[39m`[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m:[0m                                  [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m   - The `mg_log` function at line [0m[1;36m43[0m                                               [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m   - How it constructs log messages and passes them to the formatting layer[0m         [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mThe vulnerability appears to stem from insufficient bounds checking when writing [0m   [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mformatted output to a fixed-size stack buffer, particularly when handling [0m          [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mdouble-precision floating-point number conversions during the logging of HTTP [0m      [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mparsing operations.[0m                                                                 [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m## Initial Issue Log[0m                                                                [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mHere is the initial issue log of the codebase:[0m                                      [2m                [0m

[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m164[0m[39m:  while [0m[1;39m([0m[39md < [0m[1;36m1.0[0m[39m && d [0m[35m/[0m[39m mul < [0m[1;36m1.0[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m mul [0m[35m/[0m[39m= [0m[1;36m10.0[0m[39m, e--;[0m                            [2m                [0m

[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m180[0m[39m:      int ch = [0m[1;39m([0m[39mint[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m [0m[1;39m([0m[39md [0m[35m/[0m[39m t[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m;[0m                                                   [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m181[0m[39m:      if [0m[1;39m([0m[39mn > [0m[1;36m0[0m[39m || ch > [0m[1;36m0[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m buf[0m[1;39m[[0m[39ms + n++[0m[1;39m][0m[39m = [0m[1;39m([0m[39mchar[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m [0m[1;39m([0m[39mch + [0m[32m'0'[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m;[0m                    [2m                [0m

[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m157[0m[39m:  for [0m[1;39m([0m[39mi = [0m[1;36m0[0m[39m, t = mul * [0m[1;36m5[0m[39m; i < width; i++[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m t [0m[35m/[0m[39m= [0m[1;36m10.0[0m[39m;[0m                           [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m158[0m[39m:[0m                                                                                [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m159[0m[39m:  d += t;[0m                                                                       [2m                [0m

[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m161[0m[39m:  [0m[35m/[0m[35m/[0m[39m Calculate exponent, and [0m[32m'mul'[0m[39m for scientific representation[0m                [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m162[0m[39m:  mul = [0m[1;36m1.0[0m[39m;[0m                                                                    [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m163[0m[39m:  while [0m[1;39m([0m[39md >= [0m[1;36m10.0[0m[39m && d [0m[35m/[0m[39m mul >= [0m[1;36m10.0[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m mul *= [0m[1;36m10.0[0m[39m, e++;[0m                        [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m164[0m[39m:  while [0m[1;39m([0m[39md < [0m[1;36m1.0[0m[39m && d [0m[35m/[0m[39m mul < [0m[1;36m1.0[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m mul [0m[35m/[0m[39m= [0m[1;36m10.0[0m[39m, e--;[0m                            [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m165[0m[39m:  [0m[35m/[0m[35m/[0m[39m [0m[1;35mprintf[0m[1;39m([0m[32m" --> %g %d %g %g\n"[0m[39m, saved, e, t, mul[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m;[0m                            [2m                [0m

[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m169[0m[39m:    [0m[35m/[0m[35m/[0m[39m [0m[1;35mprintf[0m[1;39m([0m[32m" --> %.*g %d [0m[32m[[0m[32m%.*s[0m[32m][0m[32m\n"[0m[39m, [0m[1;36m10[0m[39m, d [0m[35m/[0m[39m t, e, n, buf[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m;[0m                   [2m                [0m

[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m171[0m[39m:    return [0m[1;35mmg_snprintf[0m[1;39m([0m[39mdst, dstlen, [0m[32m"%.*s"[0m[39m, n, buf[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m;[0m                            [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m172[0m[39m:  [0m[1;39m}[0m[39m else if [0m[1;39m([0m[39mtz && e <= -width && width > [0m[1;36m1[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m [0m[1;39m{[0m                                  [2m                [0m

[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m176[0m[39m:    return [0m[1;35mmg_snprintf[0m[1;39m([0m[39mdst, dstlen, [0m[32m"%.*s"[0m[39m, n, buf[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m;[0m                            [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m177[0m[39m:  [0m[1;39m}[0m[39m else [0m[1;39m{[0m                                                                      [2m                [0m

[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m179[0m[39m:    for [0m[1;39m([0m[39mi = [0m[1;36m0[0m[39m, t = mul; t >= [0m[1;36m1.0[0m[39m && s + n < [0m[1;39m([0m[39mint[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m [0m[1;35msizeof[0m[1;39m([0m[39mbuf[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m; i++[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m [0m[1;39m{[0m          [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m180[0m[39m:      int ch = [0m[1;39m([0m[39mint[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m [0m[1;39m([0m[39md [0m[35m/[0m[39m t[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m;[0m                                                   [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m181[0m[39m:      if [0m[1;39m([0m[39mn > [0m[1;36m0[0m[39m || ch > [0m[1;36m0[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m buf[0m[1;39m[[0m[39ms + n++[0m[1;39m][0m[39m = [0m[1;39m([0m[39mchar[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m [0m[1;39m([0m[39mch + [0m[32m'0'[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m;[0m                    [2m                [0m

[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m187[0m[39m:    while [0m[1;39m([0m[39mt >= [0m[1;36m1.0[0m[39m && n + s < [0m[1;39m([0m[39mint[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m [0m[1;35msizeof[0m[1;39m([0m[39mbuf[0m[1;39m)[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m buf[0m[1;39m[[0m[39mn++[0m[1;39m][0m[39m = [0m[32m'0'[0m[39m, t [0m[35m/[0m[39m= [0m[1;36m10.0[0m[39m;[0m    [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m188[0m[39m:    if [0m[1;39m([0m[39ms + n < [0m[1;39m([0m[39mint[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m [0m[1;35msizeof[0m[1;39m([0m[39mbuf[0m[1;39m)[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m buf[0m[1;39m[[0m[39mn + s++[0m[1;39m][0m[39m = [0m[32m'.'[0m[39m;[0m                          [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m189[0m[39m:    [0m[35m/[0m[35m/[0m[39m [0m[1;35mprintf[0m[1;39m([0m[32m" 1--> [0m[32m[[0m[32m%g[0m[32m][0m[32m -> [0m[32m[[0m[32m%.*s[0m[32m][0m[32m\n"[0m[39m, saved, s + n, buf[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m;[0m                     [2m                [0m

[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m191[0m[39m:    for [0m[1;39m([0m[39mi = [0m[1;36m0[0m[39m, t = [0m[1;36m0.1[0m[39m; s + n < [0m[1;39m([0m[39mint[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m [0m[1;35msizeof[0m[1;39m([0m[39mbuf[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m && n < targ_width; i++[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m [0m[1;39m{[0m    [2m                [0m

[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m198[0m[39m:[0m                                                                                [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m199[0m[39m:  while [0m[1;39m([0m[39mtz && n > [0m[1;36m0[0m[39m && buf[0m[1;39m[[0m[39ms + n - [0m[1;36m1[0m[1;39m][0m[39m == [0m[32m'0'[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m n--;  [0m[35m/[0m[35m/[0m[39m Trim trailing zeroes[0m    [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m200[0m[39m:  if [0m[1;39m([0m[39mtz && n > [0m[1;36m0[0m[39m && buf[0m[1;39m[[0m[39ms + n - [0m[1;36m1[0m[1;39m][0m[39m == [0m[32m'.'[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m n--;           [0m[35m/[0m[35m/[0m[39m Trim trailing dot[0m [2m                [0m

[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m204[0m[39m:  return [0m[1;35mmg_snprintf[0m[1;39m([0m[39mdst, dstlen, [0m[32m"%s"[0m[39m, buf[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m;[0m                                   [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m205[0m[39m:[0m[1;39m}[0m                                                                               [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m```[0m                                                                                 [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m<[0m[35m/[0m[95mcode[0m[39m>[0m                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m<code>[0m                                                                              [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39msrc/fmt.[0m[1;92mc:207[0m[39m-[0m[1;36m227[0m                                                                   [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m```[0m                                                                                 [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m207[0m[39m:static size_t [0m[1;35mmg_lld[0m[1;39m([0m[39mchar *buf, int64_t val, bool is_signed, bool is_hex[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m [0m[1;39m{[0m     [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m208[0m[39m:  const char *letters = [0m[32m"0123456789abcdef"[0m[39m;[0m                                     [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m209[0m[39m:  uint64_t v = [0m[1;39m([0m[39muint64_t[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m val;[0m                                                  [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m210[0m[39m:  size_t s = [0m[1;36m0[0m[39m, n, i;[0m                                                           [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m211[0m[39m:  if [0m[1;39m([0m[39mis_signed && val < [0m[1;36m0[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m buf[0m[1;39m[[0m[39ms++[0m[1;39m][0m[39m = [0m[32m'-'[0m[39m, v = [0m[1;39m([0m[39muint64_t[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m [0m[1;39m([0m[39m-val[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m;[0m              [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m212[0m[39m:  [0m[35m/[0m[35m/[0m[39m This loop prints a number in reverse order. I guess this is because we[0m     [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m213[0m[39m:  [0m[35m/[0m[35m/[0m[39m write numbers from right to left: least significant digit comes last.[0m      [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m214[0m[39m:  [0m[35m/[0m[35m/[0m[39m Maybe because we use Arabic numbers, and Arabs write RTL?[0m                  [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m215[0m[39m:  if [0m[1;39m([0m[39mis_hex[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m [0m[1;39m{[0m                                                                 [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m216[0m[39m:    for [0m[1;39m([0m[39mn = [0m[1;36m0[0m[39m; v; v >>= [0m[1;36m4[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m buf[0m[1;39m[[0m[39ms + n++[0m[1;39m][0m[39m = letters[0m[1;39m[[0m[39mv & [0m[1;36m15[0m[1;39m][0m[39m;[0m                     [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m217[0m[39m:  [0m[1;39m}[0m[39m else [0m[1;39m{[0m                                                                      [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m218[0m[39m:    for [0m[1;39m([0m[39mn = [0m[1;36m0[0m[39m; v; v [0m[35m/[0m[39m= [0m[1;36m10[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m buf[0m[1;39m[[0m[39ms + n++[0m[1;39m][0m[39m = letters[0m[1;39m[[0m[39mv % [0m[1;36m10[0m[1;39m][0m[39m;[0m                     [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m219[0m[39m:  [0m[1;39m}[0m                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m220[0m[39m:  [0m[35m/[0m[35m/[0m[39m Reverse a string[0m                                                           [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m221[0m[39m:  for [0m[1;39m([0m[39mi = [0m[1;36m0[0m[39m; i < n [0m[35m/[0m[39m [0m[1;36m2[0m[39m; i++[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m [0m[1;39m{[0m                                                 [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m222[0m[39m:    char t = buf[0m[1;39m[[0m[39ms + i[0m[1;39m][0m[39m;[0m                                                        [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m223[0m[39m:    buf[0m[1;39m[[0m[39ms + i[0m[1;39m][0m[39m = buf[0m[1;39m[[0m[39ms + n - i - [0m[1;36m1[0m[1;39m][0m[39m, buf[0m[1;39m[[0m[39ms + n - i - [0m[1;36m1[0m[1;39m][0m[39m = t;[0m                    [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m224[0m[39m:  [0m[1;39m}[0m                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m225[0m[39m:  if [0m[1;39m([0m[39mval == [0m[1;36m0[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m buf[0m[1;39m[[0m[39mn++[0m[1;39m][0m[39m = [0m[32m'0'[0m[39m;  [0m[35m/[0m[35m/[0m[39m Handle special case[0m                         [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m226[0m[39m:  return n + s;[0m                                                                 [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m227[0m[39m:[0m[1;39m}[0m                                                                               [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m```[0m                                                                                 [2m                [0m

[2;36m                    [0m         [39m```[0m                                                                                 [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m<[0m[35m/[0m[95mcode[0m[39m>[0m                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m<code>[0m                                                                              [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39msrc/fmt.[0m[1;92mc:272[0m[39m-[0m[1;36m290[0m                                                                   [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m```[0m                                                                                 [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m272[0m[39m:      if [0m[1;39m([0m[39mc == [0m[32m'd'[0m[39m || c == [0m[32m'u'[0m[39m || c == [0m[32m'x'[0m[39m || c == [0m[32m'X'[0m[39m || c == [0m[32m'p'[0m[39m ||[0m           [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m273[0m[39m:          c == [0m[32m'g'[0m[39m || c == [0m[32m'f'[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m [0m[1;39m{[0m                                               [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m274[0m[39m:        bool s = [0m[1;39m([0m[39mc == [0m[32m'd'[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m, h = [0m[1;39m([0m[39mc == [0m[32m'x'[0m[39m || c == [0m[32m'X'[0m[39m || c == [0m[32m'p'[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m;[0m            [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m275[0m[39m:        char tmp[0m[1;39m[[0m[1;36m40[0m[1;39m][0m[39m;[0m                                                           [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m276[0m[39m:        size_t xl = x ? [0m[1;36m2[0m[39m : [0m[1;36m0[0m[39m;[0m                                                  [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m277[0m[39m:        if [0m[1;39m([0m[39mc == [0m[32m'g'[0m[39m || c == [0m[32m'f'[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m [0m[1;39m{[0m                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m278[0m[39m:          double v = [0m[1;35mva_arg[0m[1;39m([0m[39m*ap, double[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m;[0m                                       [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m279[0m[39m:          if [0m[1;39m([0m[39mpr == ~0U[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m pr = [0m[1;36m6[0m[39m;[0m                                                [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m280[0m[39m:          k = [0m[1;35mmg_dtoa[0m[1;39m([0m[39mtmp, [0m[1;35msizeof[0m[1;39m([0m[39mtmp[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m, v, [0m[1;39m([0m[39mint[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m pr, c == [0m[32m'g'[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m;[0m                 [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m281[0m[39m:        [0m[1;39m}[0m[39m else if [0m[1;39m([0m[39mis_long == [0m[1;36m2[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m [0m[1;39m{[0m                                              [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m282[0m[39m:          int64_t v = [0m[1;35mva_arg[0m[1;39m([0m[39m*ap, int64_t[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m;[0m                                     [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m283[0m[39m:          k = [0m[1;35mmg_lld[0m[1;39m([0m[39mtmp, v, s, h[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m;[0m                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m284[0m[39m:        [0m[1;39m}[0m[39m else if [0m[1;39m([0m[39mis_long == [0m[1;36m1[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m [0m[1;39m{[0m                                              [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m285[0m[39m:          long v = [0m[1;35mva_arg[0m[1;39m([0m[39m*ap, long[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m;[0m                                           [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m286[0m[39m:          k = [0m[1;35mmg_lld[0m[1;39m([0m[39mtmp, s ? [0m[1;39m([0m[39mint64_t[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m v : [0m[1;39m([0m[39mint64_t[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m [0m[1;39m([0m[39munsigned long[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m v, s, h[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m;[0m [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m287[0m[39m:        [0m[1;39m}[0m[39m else [0m[1;39m{[0m                                                                [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m288[0m[39m:          int v = [0m[1;35mva_arg[0m[1;39m([0m[39m*ap, int[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m;[0m                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m289[0m[39m:          k = [0m[1;35mmg_lld[0m[1;39m([0m[39mtmp, s ? [0m[1;39m([0m[39mint64_t[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m v : [0m[1;39m([0m[39mint64_t[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m [0m[1;39m([0m[39munsigned[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m v, s, h[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m;[0m      [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m290[0m[39m:        [0m[1;39m}[0m                                                                       [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m```[0m                                                                                 [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m<[0m[35m/[0m[95mcode[0m[39m>[0m                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m<code>[0m                                                                              [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39msrc/fmt.[0m[1;92mc:317[0m[39m-[0m[1;36m327[0m                                                                   [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m```[0m                                                                                 [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m317[0m[39m:      [0m[1;39m}[0m[39m else if [0m[1;39m([0m[39mc == [0m[32m'e'[0m[39m || c == [0m[32m'E'[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m [0m[1;39m{[0m                                        [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m318[0m[39m:    [0m[39m        [0m[39m  char tmp[0m[1;39m[[0m[1;36m8[0m[1;39m][0m[39m;[0m                                                      [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m319[0m[39m:          double d = [0m[1;35mva_arg[0m[1;39m([0m[39m*ap, double[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m;[0m                                       [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m320[0m[39m:          int64_t exponent = [0m[1;39m([0m[39mint64_t[0m[1;39m)[0m[1;35mlog10[0m[1;39m([0m[1;35mmy_fabs[0m[1;39m([0m[39md[0m[1;39m)[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m;[0m                        [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m321[0m[39m:          double mantissa = d [0m[35m/[0m[39m [0m[1;35mpower[0m[1;39m([0m[1;36m10[0m[39m, exponent[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m;[0m                            [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m322[0m[39m:          k = [0m[1;35mmg_dtoa[0m[1;39m([0m[39mtmp, [0m[1;36m10[0m[39m, mantissa, [0m[1;36m8[0m[39m, c == [0m[32m'e'[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m;[0m                          [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m323[0m[39m:          n += [0m[1;35mscpy[0m[1;39m([0m[39mout, param, tmp, k[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m;[0m                                        [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m324[0m[39m:          [0m[1;35mout[0m[1;39m([0m[39mc, param[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m;[0m                                                        [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m325[0m[39m:          n++;[0m                                                                  [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m326[0m[39m:    [0m[39m        [0m[39m  k = [0m[1;35mmg_lld[0m[1;39m([0m[39mtmp, exponent, [0m[1;36m1[0m[39m, [0m[1;36m0[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m;[0m                                  [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m327[0m[39m:          n += [0m[1;35mscpy[0m[1;39m([0m[39mout, param, tmp, k[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m;[0m                                        [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m```[0m                                                                                 [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m<[0m[35m/[0m[95mcode[0m[39m>[0m                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m<[0m[35m/[0m[95mcode_snippets[0m[39m>[0m                                                                    [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m## Fix Strategy[0m                                                                     [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m<fix_strategy>[0m                                                                      [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m## Analysis of Code Snippets and Root Cause[0m                                         [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mAfter analyzing the evaluation report and code snippets, I have identified the [0m     [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mprecise root cause and optimal fix strategy:[0m                                        [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m### Root Cause Identification[0m                                                       [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mThe stack-buffer-overflow occurs in the `%e`[0m[35m/[0m[39m`%E` format specifier handler in [0m      [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m`src/fmt.c` at lines [0m[1;36m317[0m[39m-[0m[1;36m327[0m[39m. The vulnerability has two critical issues:[0m            [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m1[0m[39m. **Buffer Size Mismatch [0m[1;39m([0m[39mPrimary Issue[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m**:[0m                                        [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m   - Line [0m[1;36m318[0m[39m declares: `char tmp[0m[1;39m[[0m[1;36m8[0m[1;39m][0m[39m;` [0m[1;39m([0m[1;36m8[0m[39m bytes allocated[0m[1;39m)[0m                          [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m   - Line [0m[1;36m322[0m[39m calls: `k = [0m[1;35mmg_dtoa[0m[1;39m([0m[39mtmp, [0m[1;36m10[0m[39m, mantissa, [0m[1;36m8[0m[39m, c == [0m[32m'e'[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m;` [0m                [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m   - The second parameter [0m[1;39m([0m[39m`[0m[33mdstlen[0m[39m=[0m[1;36m10[0m[39m`[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m tells `mg_dtoa` that [0m[1;36m10[0m[39m bytes are available[0m [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m   - When `mg_dtoa` → `mg_snprintf` → `mg_pfn_iobuf_private` checks bounds using [0m   [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m`io->[0m[33msize[0m[39m=[0m[1;36m10[0m[39m`, it allows writing beyond the actual [0m[1;36m8[0m[39m-byte buffer[0m                    [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m2[0m[39m. **Buffer Reuse Without Sufficient Space [0m[1;39m([0m[39mSecondary Issue[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m**:[0m                     [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m   - Line [0m[1;36m326[0m[39m reuses the same `tmp` buffer: `k = [0m[1;35mmg_lld[0m[1;39m([0m[39mtmp, exponent, [0m[1;36m1[0m[39m, [0m[1;36m0[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m;`[0m      [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m   - `mg_lld` can write up to [0m[1;36m20[0m[39m bytes for large int64_t exponents [0m[1;39m([0m[39me.g., [0m          [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [32m"-9223372036854775808"[0m[1;39m)[0m                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m   - The [0m[1;36m8[0m[39m-byte buffer is insufficient for this operation[0m                           [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m### Why This is a Critical Security Issue[0m                                           [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mThe vulnerability is triggered through error logging code when HTTP parsing detects[0m [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39ma potential OOM condition:[0m                                                          [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m- `src/http.[0m[1;92mc:316[0m[39m` uses `[0m[1;35mMG_ERROR[0m[1;39m([0m[1;39m([0m[32m"MG_ERROR: oom potential; message.len is %e\n"[0m[39m, [0m [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;39m([0m[39mdouble[0m[1;39m)[0m[1;39m([0m[39mhm->message.len[0m[1;39m)[0m[1;39m)[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m`[0m                                                        [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m- The `%e` format triggers the vulnerable code path[0m                                 [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m- A malicious HTTP request with a large Content-Length header can trigger this[0m      [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m- The crash prevents proper error reporting, creating a denial-of-service vector[0m    [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m## Optimal Fix Strategy[0m                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m### Step [0m[1;36m1[0m[39m: Increase Buffer Size to Match Codebase Pattern[0m                          [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m**Location**: `src/fmt.[0m[1;92mc:318[0m[39m`[0m                                                       [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m**Current Code**:[0m                                                                   [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m```c[0m                                                                                [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mchar tmp[0m[1;39m[[0m[1;36m8[0m[1;39m][0m[39m;[0m                                                                        [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m```[0m                                                                                 [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m**Fix**: Change to:[0m                                                                 [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m```c[0m                                                                                [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mchar tmp[0m[1;39m[[0m[1;36m40[0m[1;39m][0m[39m;[0m                                                                       [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m```[0m                                                                                 [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m**Rationale**:[0m                                                                      [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m- Matches the established pattern used for `%g` and `%f` format specifiers [0m[1;39m([0m[39mline [0m   [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m275[0m[39m: `char tmp[0m[1;39m[[0m[1;36m40[0m[1;39m][0m[39m`[0m[1;39m)[0m                                                                [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m- Provides sufficient space for both `mg_dtoa` [0m[1;39m([0m[39mwhich internally uses [0m[1;36m40[0m[39m bytes[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m and[0m [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m`mg_lld` [0m[1;39m([0m[39mwhich needs up to [0m[1;36m20[0m[39m bytes[0m[1;39m)[0m                                               [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m- The [0m[1;36m40[0m[39m-byte size is already proven safe throughout the codebase[0m                   [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m### Step [0m[1;36m2[0m[39m: Use [0m[1;35msizeof[0m[1;39m([0m[1;39m)[0m[39m for Buffer Length Parameter[0m                                [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m**Location**: `src/fmt.[0m[1;92mc:322[0m[39m`[0m                                                       [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m**Current Code**:[0m                                                                   [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m```c[0m                                                                                [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mk = [0m[1;35mmg_dtoa[0m[1;39m([0m[39mtmp, [0m[1;36m10[0m[39m, mantissa, [0m[1;36m8[0m[39m, c == [0m[32m'e'[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m;[0m                                        [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m```[0m                                                                                 [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m**Fix**: Change to:[0m                                                                 [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m```c[0m                                                                                [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mk = [0m[1;35mmg_dtoa[0m[1;39m([0m[39mtmp, [0m[1;35msizeof[0m[1;39m([0m[39mtmp[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m, mantissa, [0m[1;36m8[0m[39m, c == [0m[32m'e'[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m;[0m                               [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m```[0m                                                                                 [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m**Rationale**:[0m                                                                      [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m- Ensures the buffer size parameter always matches the actual buffer size[0m           [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m- Prevents future maintenance errors if buffer size changes[0m                         [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m- Matches the pattern used in line [0m[1;36m280[0m[39m: `k = [0m[1;35mmg_dtoa[0m[1;39m([0m[39mtmp, [0m[1;35msizeof[0m[1;39m([0m[39mtmp[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m, v, [0m[1;39m([0m[39mint[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m pr,[0m [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mc == [0m[32m'g'[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m;`[0m                                                                         [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m- Makes the code self-documenting and type-safe[0m                                     [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m## Justification for This Approach[0m                                                  [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m### [0m[1;36m1[0m[39m. Preserves Existing Logic[0m                                                     [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m- The fix only changes buffer allocation and parameter passing[0m                      [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m- The actual formatting logic for `%e`[0m[35m/[0m[39m`%E` remains unchanged[0m                       [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m- Output format and behavior are identical to current implementation[0m                [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m- All existing test cases will continue to pass[0m                                     [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m### [0m[1;36m2[0m[39m. Consistency with Codebase[0m                                                    [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m- The `%g` and `%f` format handlers already use this exact pattern[0m                  [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m- Lines [0m[1;36m272[0m[39m-[0m[1;36m299[0m[39m show the correct implementation: `char tmp[0m[1;39m[[0m[1;36m40[0m[1;39m][0m[39m` with `[0m[1;35msizeof[0m[1;39m([0m[39mtmp[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m`[0m  [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m- This fix brings `%e`[0m[35m/[0m[39m`%E` handlers into alignment with established practices[0m      [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m### [0m[1;36m3[0m[39m. Safety Margins[0m                                                               [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m- [0m[1;36m40[0m[39m bytes is more than sufficient for:[0m                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m  - `mg_dtoa` output [0m[1;39m([0m[39muses internal [0m[1;36m40[0m[39m-byte buffer[0m[1;39m)[0m                                 [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m  - `mg_lld` output [0m[1;39m([0m[39mmaximum [0m[1;36m20[0m[39m bytes for int64_t[0m[1;39m)[0m                                  [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m  - Special values [0m[1;39m([0m[39minf: [0m[1;36m4[0m[39m bytes, nan: [0m[1;36m3[0m[39m bytes[0m[1;39m)[0m                                     [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m  - Scientific notation with large exponents[0m                                        [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m- Stack usage increase [0m[1;39m([0m[1;36m32[0m[39m bytes[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m is negligible[0m                                     [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m### [0m[1;36m4[0m[39m. No Breaking Changes[0m                                                          [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m- No API changes[0m                                                                    [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m- No behavioral changes[0m                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m- No test modifications required[0m                                                    [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m- Output remains identical to original intent[0m                                       [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m### [0m[1;36m5[0m[39m. Addresses All Vulnerability Vectors[0m                                          [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m- Fixes the immediate overflow [0m[1;39m([0m[39mdstlen > actual buffer[0m[1;39m)[0m                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m- Prevents future overflow in `mg_lld` call[0m                                         [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m- Makes error logging safe and reliable[0m                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m- Eliminates denial-of-service vector[0m                                               [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m## Implementation Context[0m                                                           [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mThe patch must be applied to the initial codebase state. Both changes are [0m          [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mindependent and can be applied as a single atomic fix:[0m                              [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m1[0m[39m. Locate line [0m[1;36m318[0m[39m in `src/fmt.c` within the `mg_vxprintf` function[0m                 [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m2[0m[39m. Change the buffer declaration from `char tmp[0m[1;39m[[0m[1;36m8[0m[1;39m][0m[39m;` to `char tmp[0m[1;39m[[0m[1;36m40[0m[1;39m][0m[39m;`[0m             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m3[0m[39m. Locate line [0m[1;36m322[0m[39m [0m[1;39m([0m[39msame block[0m[1;39m)[0m                                                     [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m4[0m[39m. Change the `mg_dtoa` call from hardcoded `[0m[1;36m10[0m[39m` to `[0m[1;35msizeof[0m[1;39m([0m[39mtmp[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m`[0m                   [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mThese changes are minimal, surgical, and follow the principle of least surprise by [0m [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mmatching existing patterns in the same file.[0m                                        [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m## Potential Side Effects and Mitigation[0m                                            [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m### Stack Usage Increase[0m                                                            [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m- **Impact**: Increases stack frame size by [0m[1;36m32[0m[39m bytes[0m                                [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m- **Mitigation**: This is acceptable because:[0m                                       [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m  - The same [0m[1;36m40[0m[39m-byte buffer is already used for other format specifiers[0m             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m  - Modern systems have adequate stack space[0m                                        [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m  - The function is not deeply recursive[0m                                            [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m### No Other Side Effects Expected[0m                                                  [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m- The fix is localized to one format specifier handler[0m                              [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m- No changes to external interfaces[0m                                                 [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m- No changes to utility functions used elsewhere[0m                                    [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m- No impact on other format specifiers or modules[0m                                   [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m## Verification[0m                                                                     [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mThe fix can be verified through:[0m                                                    [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m1[0m[39m. **Existing tests**: `test/unit_test.[0m[1;92mc:3654[0m[39m-[0m[1;36m3662[0m[39m` validates `%e` format output[0m    [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m2[0m[39m. **Fuzzing**: Re-running the fuzzer with the same test case should not crash[0m      [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m3[0m[39m. **Manual testing**: HTTP requests with large Content-Length values should log [0m   [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39merrors without crashing[0m                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m<code_range>src/fmt.[0m[1;92mc:318[0m[39m<[0m[35m/[0m[95mcode_range[0m[39m>[0m                                              [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m<code_range>src/fmt.[0m[1;92mc:322[0m[39m<[0m[35m/[0m[95mcode_range[0m[39m>[0m                                              [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m<[0m[35m/[0m[95mfix_strategy[0m[1m>[0m                                                                     [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         ===Evaluation [33mEnd[0m===                                                                [2m                [0m
