[2;36m                    [0m         [39m## Summary[0m                                                                          [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mThe initial issue reports an AddressSanitizer stack-buffer-overflow error occurring[0m [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39min the mongoose codebase, specifically a [0m[1;36m1[0m[39m-byte write overflow in the [0m              [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m`mg_pfn_iobuf_private` function. The overflow occurs at offset [0m[1;36m120[0m[39m in a stack frame[0m [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mfrom `mg_vxprintf`, affecting a variable named `tmp371` which has only [0m[1;36m8[0m[39m bytes [0m     [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mallocated [0m[1;39m([0m[39mfrom offset [0m[1;36m112[0m[39m to [0m[1;36m120[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m. The patch attempt increased the size of a [0m      [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mdifferent buffer [0m[1;39m([0m[39m`tmp`[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m from [0m[1;36m8[0m[39m to [0m[1;36m40[0m[39m bytes and updated a call to `mg_dtoa` to use [0m [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m`[0m[1;35msizeof[0m[1;39m([0m[39mtmp[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m` instead of a hardcoded value. However, after applying the patch, the [0m [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39msame stack-buffer-overflow error persists with identical characteristics, [0m          [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mindicating the patch did not address the root cause.[0m                                [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m## Description[0m                                                                      [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m### Initial Issue Analysis[0m                                                          [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mThe AddressSanitizer report identifies a stack-buffer-overflow with the following [0m  [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mkey characteristics:[0m                                                                [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m- **Error Type**: [0m[1;36m1[0m[39m-byte write beyond the bounds of a stack-allocated buffer[0m        [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m- **Scariness Score**: [0m[1;36m46[0m[39m [0m[1;39m([0m[1;36m1[0m[39m-byte-write-stack-buffer-overflow[0m[1;39m)[0m                      [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m- **Location**: The overflow occurs in `mg_pfn_iobuf_private` called from [0m          [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m`mg_putchar_iobuf_static`, which is invoked by `scpy` within `mg_vxprintf`[0m          [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m- **Affected Variable**: `tmp371` declared at line [0m[1;36m319[0m[39m in [0m                          [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m`[0m[35m/src/mongoose/src/[0m[95mfmt.c[0m[39m`, allocated [0m[1;36m8[0m[39m bytes [0m[1;39m([0m[39moffsets [0m[1;36m112[0m[39m-[0m[1;36m120[0m[1;39m)[0m                      [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m- **Overflow Location**: Offset [0m[1;36m120[0m[39m, exactly at the boundary of the allocated [0m      [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mbuffer[0m                                                                              [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mThe call stack shows:[0m                                                               [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m1[0m[39m. `mg_http_parse` calls into the logging system[0m                                    [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m2[0m[39m. `mg_log` triggers `mg_vxprintf` for formatted output[0m                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m3[0m[39m. `mg_vxprintf` calls `mg_dtoa` for double-to-ASCII conversion[0m                     [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m4[0m[39m. The formatted output through `mg_snprintf` and eventually `scpy` causes the [0m     [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39moverflow[0m                                                                            [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mThe shadow bytes around the buggy address show:[0m                                     [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m- `[0m[1;39m[[0m[1;36m112[0m[39m, [0m[1;36m120[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m [0m[32m'tmp371'[0m[39m` - [0m[1;36m8[0m[39m bytes allocated[0m                                         [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m- Write occurs at offset [0m[1;36m120[0m[39m, which is marked as `[0m[1;39m[[0m[39mf3[0m[1;39m][0m[39m` [0m[1;39m([0m[39mStack right redzone[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m, [0m     [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mconfirming the overflow[0m                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m### Patch Attempt Description[0m                                                       [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mThe patch modified `[0m[35m/src/mongoose/src/[0m[95mfmt.c[0m[39m` at line [0m[1;36m315[0m[39m [0m[1;39m([0m[39mthe [0m[32m'e'[0m[35m/[0m[32m'E'[0m[39m format [0m       [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mspecifier handling[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m:[0m                                                                [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m**Changes made**:[0m                                                                   [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m1[0m[39m. Increased `tmp` buffer size from [0m[1;36m8[0m[39m to [0m[1;36m40[0m[39m bytes: `char tmp[0m[1;39m[[0m[1;36m40[0m[1;39m][0m[39m;`[0m                  [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m2[0m[39m. Updated the `mg_dtoa` call to use `[0m[1;35msizeof[0m[1;39m([0m[39mtmp[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m` instead of hardcoded value [0m[1;36m10[0m[39m: [0m  [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m`k = [0m[1;35mmg_dtoa[0m[1;39m([0m[39mtmp, [0m[1;35msizeof[0m[1;39m([0m[39mtmp[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m, mantissa, [0m[1;36m8[0m[39m, c == [0m[32m'e'[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m;`[0m                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m**Location of changes**: The patch targets the exponential notation handling block [0m [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;39m([0m[39mlines [0m[1;36m317[0m[39m-[0m[1;36m325[0m[39m in the original code[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m, specifically for format specifiers [0m[32m'e'[0m[39m and [0m   [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [32m'E'[0m[39m.[0m                                                                                [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m### Post-Patch Results[0m                                                              [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mAfter applying the patch, the identical error persists:[0m                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m- Same error type: stack-buffer-overflow with [0m[1;36m1[0m[39m-byte write[0m                          [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m- Same scariness score: [0m[1;36m46[0m                                                          [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m- Same call stack leading to the overflow[0m                                           [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m- Same affected variable: `tmp371` at line [0m[1;36m319[0m[39m with [0m[1;36m8[0m[39m bytes [0m[1;39m([0m[39moffsets [0m[1;36m112[0m[39m-[0m[1;36m120[0m[1;39m)[0m       [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m- Same overflow location: offset [0m[1;36m120[0m                                                [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m- Same shadow byte pattern around the buggy address[0m                                 [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mThis indicates that the patched buffer [0m[1;39m([0m[39m`tmp` on line [0m[1;36m317[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m is not the same buffer [0m  [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mthat's overflowing [0m[1;39m([0m[39m`tmp371` on line [0m[1;36m319[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m.[0m                                          [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m### Critical Observations[0m                                                           [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m1[0m[39m. **Variable Mismatch**: The patch modified a buffer called `tmp` declared around [0m [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mline [0m[1;36m317[0m[39m, but the overflow occurs in a variable called `tmp371` at line [0m[1;36m319[0m[39m. These [0m [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mappear to be different variables despite their proximity in the code.[0m               [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m2[0m[39m. **Line Number Discrepancy**: The AddressSanitizer report consistently mentions [0m  [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mline [0m[1;36m319[0m[39m for `tmp371`, while the patch modifies code around line [0m[1;36m315[0m[39m-[0m[1;36m323[0m[39m. The [0m      [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mvariable at line [0m[1;36m319[0m[39m remains [0m[1;36m8[0m[39m bytes in size even after the patch.[0m                  [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m3[0m[39m. **Consistent Overflow Pattern**: The overflow occurs at exactly offset [0m[1;36m120[0m[39m, [0m     [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mwhich is immediately after the [0m[1;36m8[0m[39m-byte buffer ending at offset [0m[1;36m120[0m[39m. This suggests a [0m [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mmissing null terminator or an off-by-one error in buffer size calculation.[0m          [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m4[0m[39m. **Call Chain**: The overflow path goes through `mg_dtoa` → `mg_snprintf` → [0m      [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m`mg_vsnprintf` → `mg_vxprintf` → `scpy` → `mg_putchar_iobuf_static` → [0m              [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m`mg_pfn_iobuf_private`, suggesting the issue may involve buffer size calculations [0m  [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39macross multiple function calls.[0m                                                     [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m### Areas Requiring Further Investigation[0m                                           [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m1[0m[39m. **Line [0m[1;36m319[0m[39m in fmt.c**: The exact declaration and usage of `tmp371` variable [0m     [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mneeds examination to understand its purpose and why [0m[1;36m8[0m[39m bytes is insufficient.[0m        [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m2[0m[39m. **The mg_dtoa function**: This function's implementation should be reviewed to [0m  [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39munderstand what buffer sizes it expects and what it actually writes, particularly [0m  [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mfor the mantissa parameter in exponential notation.[0m                                 [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m3[0m[39m. **The scpy function**: This function appears in the call stack immediately [0m      [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mbefore the overflow. Its implementation at line [0m[1;36m233[0m[39m should be reviewed to [0m          [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39munderstand how it handles buffer boundaries.[0m                                        [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m4[0m[39m. **Format string handling in mg_vxprintf**: The complete implementation around [0m   [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mline [0m[1;36m247[0m[39m-[0m[1;36m325[0m[39m needs review to identify all temporary buffers used for number [0m        [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mformatting and their size requirements.[0m                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m5[0m[39m. **The relationship between different tmp variables**: The code appears to use [0m   [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mmultiple temporary buffers [0m[1;39m([0m[39mtmp, tmp371, etc.[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m. Understanding how these are used [0m   [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mand their size requirements is crucial.[0m                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m6[0m[39m. **Buffer size calculations for scientific notation**: The exponential notation [0m  [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mformatting may require more space than currently allocated for representing [0m        [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mmantissa, exponent sign, and exponent digits.[0m                                       [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m## Initial Issue Log[0m                                                                [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mHere is the initial issue log of the codebase:[0m                                      [2m                [0m

[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m144[0m[39m:  if [0m[1;39m([0m[1;35mxisnan[0m[1;39m([0m[39md[0m[1;39m)[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m return [0m[1;35mmg_snprintf[0m[1;39m([0m[39mdst, dstlen, [0m[32m"%s"[0m[39m, [0m[32m"nan"[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m;[0m                  [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m145[0m[39m:  if [0m[1;39m([0m[39md < [0m[1;36m0.0[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m d = -d, buf[0m[1;39m[[0m[39ms++[0m[1;39m][0m[39m = [0m[32m'-'[0m[39m;[0m                                          [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m146[0m[39m:[0m                                                                                [2m                [0m

[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m148[0m[39m:  saved = d;[0m                                                                    [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m149[0m[39m:  if [0m[1;39m([0m[39mtz[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m [0m[1;39m{[0m                                                                     [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m150[0m[39m:    mul = [0m[1;36m1.0[0m[39m;[0m                                                                  [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m151[0m[39m:    while [0m[1;39m([0m[39md >= [0m[1;36m10.0[0m[39m && d [0m[35m/[0m[39m mul >= [0m[1;36m10.0[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m mul *= [0m[1;36m10.0[0m[39m;[0m                           [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m152[0m[39m:  [0m[1;39m}[0m[39m else [0m[1;39m{[0m                                                                      [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m153[0m[39m:    mul = [0m[1;36m0.1[0m[39m;[0m                                                                  [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m154[0m[39m:  [0m[1;39m}[0m                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m155[0m[39m:[0m                                                                                [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m156[0m[39m:  while [0m[1;39m([0m[39md <= [0m[1;36m1.0[0m[39m && d [0m[35m/[0m[39m mul <= [0m[1;36m1.0[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m mul [0m[35m/[0m[39m= [0m[1;36m10.0[0m[39m;[0m                               [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m157[0m[39m:  for [0m[1;39m([0m[39mi = [0m[1;36m0[0m[39m, t = mul * [0m[1;36m5[0m[39m; i < width; i++[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m t [0m[35m/[0m[39m= [0m[1;36m10.0[0m[39m;[0m                           [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m158[0m[39m:[0m                                                                                [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m159[0m[39m:  d += t;[0m                                                                       [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m160[0m[39m:[0m                                                                                [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m161[0m[39m:  [0m[35m/[0m[35m/[0m[39m Calculate exponent, and [0m[32m'mul'[0m[39m for scientific representation[0m                [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m162[0m[39m:  mul = [0m[1;36m1.0[0m[39m;[0m                                                                    [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m163[0m[39m:  while [0m[1;39m([0m[39md >= [0m[1;36m10.0[0m[39m && d [0m[35m/[0m[39m mul >= [0m[1;36m10.0[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m mul *= [0m[1;36m10.0[0m[39m, e++;[0m                        [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m164[0m[39m:  while [0m[1;39m([0m[39md < [0m[1;36m1.0[0m[39m && d [0m[35m/[0m[39m mul < [0m[1;36m1.0[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m mul [0m[35m/[0m[39m= [0m[1;36m10.0[0m[39m, e--;[0m                            [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m165[0m[39m:  [0m[35m/[0m[35m/[0m[39m [0m[1;35mprintf[0m[1;39m([0m[32m" --> %g %d %g %g\n"[0m[39m, saved, e, t, mul[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m;[0m                            [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m166[0m[39m:[0m                                                                                [2m                [0m

[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m168[0m[39m:    n = [0m[1;39m([0m[39mint[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m [0m[1;35mmg_dtoa[0m[1;39m([0m[39mbuf, [0m[1;35msizeof[0m[1;39m([0m[39mbuf[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m, saved [0m[35m/[0m[39m mul, width, tz[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m;[0m                [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m169[0m[39m:    [0m[35m/[0m[35m/[0m[39m [0m[1;35mprintf[0m[1;39m([0m[32m" --> %.*g %d [0m[32m[[0m[32m%.*s[0m[32m][0m[32m\n"[0m[39m, [0m[1;36m10[0m[39m, d [0m[35m/[0m[39m t, e, n, buf[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m;[0m                   [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m170[0m[39m:    n += [0m[1;35maddexp[0m[1;39m([0m[39mbuf + s + n, e, [0m[32m'+'[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m;[0m                                           [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m171[0m[39m:    return [0m[1;35mmg_snprintf[0m[1;39m([0m[39mdst, dstlen, [0m[32m"%.*s"[0m[39m, n, buf[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m;[0m                            [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m172[0m[39m:  [0m[1;39m}[0m[39m else if [0m[1;39m([0m[39mtz && e <= -width && width > [0m[1;36m1[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m [0m[1;39m{[0m                                  [2m                [0m

[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m174[0m[39m:    [0m[35m/[0m[35m/[0m[39m [0m[1;35mprintf[0m[1;39m([0m[32m" --> %.*g %d [0m[32m[[0m[32m%.*s[0m[32m][0m[32m\n"[0m[39m, [0m[1;36m10[0m[39m, d [0m[35m/[0m[39m mul, e, n, buf[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m;[0m                 [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m175[0m[39m:    n += [0m[1;35maddexp[0m[1;39m([0m[39mbuf + s + n, -e, [0m[32m'-'[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m;[0m                                          [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m176[0m[39m:    return [0m[1;35mmg_snprintf[0m[1;39m([0m[39mdst, dstlen, [0m[32m"%.*s"[0m[39m, n, buf[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m;[0m                            [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m177[0m[39m:  [0m[1;39m}[0m[39m else [0m[1;39m{[0m                                                                      [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m178[0m[39m:    int targ_width = width;[0m                                                     [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m179[0m[39m:    for [0m[1;39m([0m[39mi = [0m[1;36m0[0m[39m, t = mul; t >= [0m[1;36m1.0[0m[39m && s + n < [0m[1;39m([0m[39mint[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m [0m[1;35msizeof[0m[1;39m([0m[39mbuf[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m; i++[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m [0m[1;39m{[0m          [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m180[0m[39m:      int ch = [0m[1;39m([0m[39mint[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m [0m[1;39m([0m[39md [0m[35m/[0m[39m t[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m;[0m                                                   [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m181[0m[39m:      if [0m[1;39m([0m[39mn > [0m[1;36m0[0m[39m || ch > [0m[1;36m0[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m buf[0m[1;39m[[0m[39ms + n++[0m[1;39m][0m[39m = [0m[1;39m([0m[39mchar[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m [0m[1;39m([0m[39mch + [0m[32m'0'[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m;[0m                    [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m182[0m[39m:      d -= ch * t;[0m                                                              [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m183[0m[39m:      t [0m[35m/[0m[39m= [0m[1;36m10.0[0m[39m;[0m                                                                [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m184[0m[39m:    [0m[1;39m}[0m                                                                           [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m185[0m[39m:    [0m[35m/[0m[35m/[0m[39m [0m[1;35mprintf[0m[1;39m([0m[32m" --> [0m[32m[[0m[32m%g[0m[32m][0m[32m -> %g %g [0m[32m([0m[32m%d[0m[32m)[0m[32m [0m[32m[[0m[32m%.*s[0m[32m][0m[32m\n"[0m[39m, saved, d, t, n, s + n, buf[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m;[0m  [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m186[0m[39m:    if [0m[1;39m([0m[39mn == [0m[1;36m0[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m buf[0m[1;39m[[0m[39ms++[0m[1;39m][0m[39m = [0m[32m'0'[0m[39m;[0m                                                 [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m187[0m[39m:    while [0m[1;39m([0m[39mt >= [0m[1;36m1.0[0m[39m && n + s < [0m[1;39m([0m[39mint[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m [0m[1;35msizeof[0m[1;39m([0m[39mbuf[0m[1;39m)[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m buf[0m[1;39m[[0m[39mn++[0m[1;39m][0m[39m = [0m[32m'0'[0m[39m, t [0m[35m/[0m[39m= [0m[1;36m10.0[0m[39m;[0m    [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m188[0m[39m:    if [0m[1;39m([0m[39ms + n < [0m[1;39m([0m[39mint[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m [0m[1;35msizeof[0m[1;39m([0m[39mbuf[0m[1;39m)[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m buf[0m[1;39m[[0m[39mn + s++[0m[1;39m][0m[39m = [0m[32m'.'[0m[39m;[0m                          [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m189[0m[39m:    [0m[35m/[0m[35m/[0m[39m [0m[1;35mprintf[0m[1;39m([0m[32m" 1--> [0m[32m[[0m[32m%g[0m[32m][0m[32m -> [0m[32m[[0m[32m%.*s[0m[32m][0m[32m\n"[0m[39m, saved, s + n, buf[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m;[0m                     [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m190[0m[39m:    if [0m[1;39m([0m[39m!tz && n > [0m[1;36m0[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m targ_width = width + n;[0m                                   [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m191[0m[39m:    for [0m[1;39m([0m[39mi = [0m[1;36m0[0m[39m, t = [0m[1;36m0.1[0m[39m; s + n < [0m[1;39m([0m[39mint[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m [0m[1;35msizeof[0m[1;39m([0m[39mbuf[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m && n < targ_width; i++[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m [0m[1;39m{[0m    [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m192[0m[39m:      int ch = [0m[1;39m([0m[39mint[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m [0m[1;39m([0m[39md [0m[35m/[0m[39m t[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m;[0m                                                   [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m193[0m[39m:      buf[0m[1;39m[[0m[39ms + n++[0m[1;39m][0m[39m = [0m[1;39m([0m[39mchar[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m [0m[1;39m([0m[39mch + [0m[32m'0'[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m;[0m                                         [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m194[0m[39m:      d -= ch * t;[0m                                                              [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m195[0m[39m:      t [0m[35m/[0m[39m= [0m[1;36m10.0[0m[39m;[0m                                                                [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m196[0m[39m:    [0m[1;39m}[0m                                                                           [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m197[0m[39m:  [0m[1;39m}[0m                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m198[0m[39m:[0m                                                                                [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m199[0m[39m:  while [0m[1;39m([0m[39mtz && n > [0m[1;36m0[0m[39m && buf[0m[1;39m[[0m[39ms + n - [0m[1;36m1[0m[1;39m][0m[39m == [0m[32m'0'[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m n--;  [0m[35m/[0m[35m/[0m[39m Trim trailing zeroes[0m    [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m200[0m[39m:  if [0m[1;39m([0m[39mtz && n > [0m[1;36m0[0m[39m && buf[0m[1;39m[[0m[39ms + n - [0m[1;36m1[0m[1;39m][0m[39m == [0m[32m'.'[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m n--;           [0m[35m/[0m[35m/[0m[39m Trim trailing dot[0m [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m201[0m[39m:  n += s;[0m                                                                       [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m202[0m[39m:  if [0m[1;39m([0m[39mn >= [0m[1;39m([0m[39mint[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m [0m[1;35msizeof[0m[1;39m([0m[39mbuf[0m[1;39m)[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m n = [0m[1;39m([0m[39mint[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m [0m[1;35msizeof[0m[1;39m([0m[39mbuf[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m - [0m[1;36m1[0m[39m;[0m                        [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m203[0m[39m:  buf[0m[1;39m[[0m[39mn[0m[1;39m][0m[39m = [0m[32m'\0'[0m[39m;[0m                                                                [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m204[0m[39m:  return [0m[1;35mmg_snprintf[0m[1;39m([0m[39mdst, dstlen, [0m[32m"%s"[0m[39m, buf[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m;[0m                                   [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m205[0m[39m:[0m[1;39m}[0m                                                                               [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m```[0m                                                                                 [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m<[0m[35m/[0m[95mcode[0m[39m>[0m                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m<code>[0m                                                                              [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39msrc/fmt.[0m[1;92mc:229[0m[39m-[0m[1;36m234[0m                                                                   [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m```[0m                                                                                 [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m229[0m[39m:static size_t [0m[1;35mscpy[0m[1;39m([0m[39mvoid [0m[1;39m([0m[39m*out[0m[1;39m)[0m[1;39m([0m[39mchar, void *[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m, void *ptr, char *buf,[0m             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m230[0m[39m:                          size_t len[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m [0m[1;39m{[0m                                         [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m231[0m[39m:  size_t i = [0m[1;36m0[0m[39m;[0m                                                                 [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m232[0m[39m:  while [0m[1;39m([0m[39mi < len && buf[0m[1;39m[[0m[39mi[0m[1;39m][0m[39m != [0m[32m'\0'[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m [0m[1;35mout[0m[1;39m([0m[39mbuf[0m[1;39m[[0m[39mi++[0m[1;39m][0m[39m, ptr[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m;[0m                         [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m233[0m[39m:  return i;[0m                                                                     [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m234[0m[39m:[0m[1;39m}[0m                                                                               [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m```[0m                                                                                 [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m<[0m[35m/[0m[95mcode[0m[39m>[0m                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m<code>[0m                                                                              [2m                [0m

[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m36[0m[39m:     [0m[39m        [0m[39mx *= [0m[1;36m0x1[0m[39mp54;[0m                                                        [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m37[0m[39m:     [0m[39m        [0m[39mu.f = x;[0m                                                            [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m38[0m[39m:     [0m[39m        [0m[39mhx = u.i>>[0m[1;36m32[0m[39m;[0m                                                       [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m39[0m[39m:     [0m[1;39m}[0m[39m else if [0m[1;39m([0m[39mhx >= [0m[1;36m0x7ff00000[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m [0m[1;39m{[0m                                              [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m40[0m[39m:     [0m[39m        [0m[39mreturn x;[0m                                                           [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m41[0m[39m:     [0m[1;39m}[0m[39m else if [0m[1;39m([0m[39mhx == [0m[1;36m0x3ff00000[0m[39m && u.i<<[0m[1;36m32[0m[39m == [0m[1;36m0[0m[1;39m)[0m                                [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m42[0m[39m:     [0m[39m        [0m[39mreturn [0m[1;36m0[0m[39m;[0m                                                           [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m43[0m[39m:     [0m[35m/[0m[39m* reduce x into [0m[1;39m[[0m[1;35msqrt[0m[1;39m([0m[1;36m2[0m[1;39m)[0m[35m/[0m[95m2[0m[39m, [0m[1;35msqrt[0m[1;39m([0m[1;36m2[0m[1;39m)[0m[1;39m][0m[39m *[0m[35m/[0m                                    [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m44[0m[39m:     [0m[39mhx += [0m[1;36m0x3ff00000[0m[39m - [0m[1;36m0x3fe6a09e[0m[39m;[0m                                              [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m45[0m[39m:     [0m[39mk += [0m[1;39m([0m[39mint[0m[1;39m)[0m[1;39m([0m[39mhx>>[0m[1;36m20[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m - [0m[1;36m0x3ff[0m[39m;[0m                                                 [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m46[0m[39m:     [0m[39mhx = [0m[1;39m([0m[39mhx&[0m[1;36m0x000fffff[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m + [0m[1;36m0x3fe6a09e[0m[39m;[0m                                          [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m47[0m[39m:     [0m[39mu.i = [0m[1;39m([0m[39muint64_t[0m[1;39m)[0m[39mhx<<[0m[1;36m32[0m[39m | [0m[1;39m([0m[39mu.i&[0m[1;36m0xffffffff[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m;[0m                                  [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m48[0m[39m:     [0m[39mx = u.f;[0m                                                                    [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m49[0m[39m:     [0m[39mf = x - [0m[1;36m1.0[0m[39m;[0m                                                                [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m50[0m[39m:     [0m[39mhfsq = [0m[1;36m0.5[0m[39m*f*f;[0m                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m51[0m[39m:     [0m[39ms = f/[0m[1;39m([0m[1;36m2.0[0m[39m+f[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m;[0m                                                              [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m52[0m[39m:     [0m[39mz = s*s;[0m                                                                    [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m53[0m[39m:     [0m[39mw = z*z;[0m                                                                    [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m54[0m[39m:     [0m[39mt1 = w*[0m[1;39m([0m[39mLg2+w*[0m[1;39m([0m[39mLg4+w*Lg6[0m[1;39m)[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m;[0m                                                 [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m55[0m[39m:     [0m[39mt2 = z*[0m[1;39m([0m[39mLg1+w*[0m[1;39m([0m[39mLg3+w*[0m[1;39m([0m[39mLg5+w*Lg7[0m[1;39m)[0m[1;39m)[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m;[0m                                         [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m56[0m[39m:     [0m[39mR = t2 + t1;[0m                                                                [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m57[0m[39m:     [0m[35m/[0m[39m* See log2.c for details. *[0m[35m/[0m                                               [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m58[0m[39m:     [0m[35m/[0m[39m* hi+lo = f - hfsq + s*[0m[1;39m([0m[39mhfsq+R[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m ~ [0m[1;35mlog[0m[1;39m([0m[1;36m1[0m[39m+f[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m *[0m[35m/[0m                              [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m59[0m[39m:     [0m[39mhi = f - hfsq;[0m                                                              [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m60[0m[39m:     [0m[39mu.f = hi;[0m                                                                   [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m61[0m[39m:     [0m[39mu.i &= [0m[1;39m([0m[39muint64_t[0m[1;39m)[0m[1;36m-1[0m[39m<<[0m[1;36m32[0m[39m;[0m                                                    [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m62[0m[39m:     [0m[39mhi = u.f;[0m                                                                   [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m63[0m[39m:     [0m[39mlo = f - hi - hfsq + s*[0m[1;39m([0m[39mhfsq+R[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m;[0m                                            [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m64[0m[39m:     [0m[35m/[0m[39m* val_hi+val_lo ~ [0m[1;35mlog10[0m[1;39m([0m[1;36m1[0m[39m+f[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m + k*[0m[1;35mlog10[0m[1;39m([0m[1;36m2[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m *[0m[35m/[0m                               [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m65[0m[39m:     [0m[39mval_hi = hi*ivln10hi;[0m                                                       [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m66[0m[39m:     [0m[39mdk = k;[0m                                                                     [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m67[0m[39m:     [0m[39my = dk*log10_2hi;[0m                                                           [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m68[0m[39m:     [0m[39mval_lo = dk*log10_2lo + [0m[1;39m([0m[39mlo+hi[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m*ivln10lo + lo*ivln10hi;[0m                     [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m69[0m[39m:     [0m[35m/[0m[39m*[0m                                                                          [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m70[0m[39m:     [0m[39m * Extra precision in for adding y is not strictly needed[0m                   [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m71[0m[39m:     [0m[39m * since there is no very large cancellation near x = [0m[1;35msqrt[0m[1;39m([0m[1;36m2[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m or[0m            [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m72[0m[39m:     [0m[39m * x = [0m[1;36m1[0m[39m/[0m[1;35msqrt[0m[1;39m([0m[1;36m2[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m, but we do it anyway since it costs little on CPUs[0m         [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m73[0m[39m:     [0m[39m * with some parallelism and it reduces the error for many args.[0m            [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m74[0m[39m:     [0m[39m *[0m[35m/[0m                                                                         [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m75[0m[39m:     [0m[39mw = y + val_hi;[0m                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m76[0m[39m:     [0m[39mval_lo += [0m[1;39m([0m[39my - w[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m + val_hi;[0m                                                 [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m77[0m[39m:     [0m[39mval_hi = w;[0m                                                                 [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m78[0m[39m:     [0m[39mreturn val_lo + val_hi;[0m                                                     [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m79[0m[39m:[0m[1;39m}[0m                                                                                [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m80[0m[39m:[0m                                                                                 [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;92m81:d[0m[39mouble [0m[1;35mpower[0m[1;39m([0m[39mdouble base, int64_t exponent[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m [0m[1;39m{[0m                                    [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m82[0m[39m:  double result = [0m[1;36m1.0[0m[39m;[0m                                                           [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m83[0m[39m:  int64_t i;[0m                                                                     [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m84[0m[39m:[0m                                                                                 [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m85[0m[39m:  if [0m[1;39m([0m[39mexponent > [0m[1;36m0[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m [0m[1;39m{[0m                                                            [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m86[0m[39m:    for [0m[1;39m([0m[39mi = [0m[1;36m0[0m[39m; i < exponent; i++[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m [0m[1;39m{[0m                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m87[0m[39m:      result *= base;[0m                                                            [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m88[0m[39m:    [0m[1;39m}[0m                                                                            [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m89[0m[39m:  [0m[1;39m}[0m[39m else if [0m[1;39m([0m[39mexponent < [0m[1;36m0[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m [0m[1;39m{[0m                                                     [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m90[0m[39m:    for [0m[1;39m([0m[39mi = [0m[1;36m0[0m[39m; i < -exponent; i++[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m [0m[1;39m{[0m                                            [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m91[0m[39m:      result [0m[35m/[0m[39m= base;[0m                                                            [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m92[0m[39m:    [0m[1;39m}[0m                                                                            [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m93[0m[39m:  [0m[1;39m}[0m                                                                              [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m94[0m[39m:  [0m[35m/[0m[35m/[0m[39m If exponent is [0m[1;36m0[0m[39m, result remains [0m[1;36m1.0[0m                                        [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m95[0m[39m:[0m                                                                                 [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m96[0m[39m:  return result;[0m                                                                 [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m97[0m[39m:[0m[1;39m}[0m                                                                                [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m98[0m[39m:[0m                                                                                 [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;92m99:d[0m[39mouble [0m[1;35mmy_fabs[0m[1;39m([0m[39mdouble x[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m [0m[1;39m{[0m                                                       [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m100[0m[39m:  if [0m[1;39m([0m[39mx >= [0m[1;36m0[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m [0m[1;39m{[0m                                                                 [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m101[0m[39m:    return x;[0m                                                                   [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m102[0m[39m:  [0m[1;39m}[0m[39m else [0m[1;39m{[0m                                                                      [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m103[0m[39m:    return -x;[0m                                                                  [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m104[0m[39m:  [0m[1;39m}[0m                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m105[0m[39m:[0m[1;39m}[0m                                                                               [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m106[0m[39m:[0m                                                                                [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m107[0m[39m:static int [0m[1;35maddexp[0m[1;39m([0m[39mchar *buf, int e, int sign[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m [0m[1;39m{[0m                                 [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m108[0m[39m:  int n = [0m[1;36m0[0m[39m;[0m                                                                    [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m109[0m[39m:  buf[0m[1;39m[[0m[39mn++[0m[1;39m][0m[39m = [0m[32m'e'[0m[39m;[0m                                                               [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m110[0m[39m:  buf[0m[1;39m[[0m[39mn++[0m[1;39m][0m[39m = [0m[1;39m([0m[39mchar[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m sign;[0m                                                       [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m111[0m[39m:  if [0m[1;39m([0m[39me > [0m[1;36m400[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m return [0m[1;36m0[0m[39m;[0m                                                        [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m112[0m[39m:  if [0m[1;39m([0m[39me < [0m[1;36m10[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m buf[0m[1;39m[[0m[39mn++[0m[1;39m][0m[39m = [0m[32m'0'[0m[39m;[0m                                                   [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m113[0m[39m:  if [0m[1;39m([0m[39me >= [0m[1;36m100[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m buf[0m[1;39m[[0m[39mn++[0m[1;39m][0m[39m = [0m[1;39m([0m[39mchar[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m [0m[1;39m([0m[39me [0m[35m/[0m[39m [0m[1;36m100[0m[39m + [0m[32m'0'[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m, e -= [0m[1;36m100[0m[39m * [0m[1;39m([0m[39me [0m[35m/[0m[39m [0m[1;36m100[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m;[0m        [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m114[0m[39m:  if [0m[1;39m([0m[39me >= [0m[1;36m10[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m buf[0m[1;39m[[0m[39mn++[0m[1;39m][0m[39m = [0m[1;39m([0m[39mchar[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m [0m[1;39m([0m[39me [0m[35m/[0m[39m [0m[1;36m10[0m[39m + [0m[32m'0'[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m, e -= [0m[1;36m10[0m[39m * [0m[1;39m([0m[39me [0m[35m/[0m[39m [0m[1;36m10[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m;[0m            [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m115[0m[39m:  buf[0m[1;39m[[0m[39mn++[0m[1;39m][0m[39m = [0m[1;39m([0m[39mchar[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m [0m[1;39m([0m[39me + [0m[32m'0'[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m;[0m                                                  [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m116[0m[39m:  return n;[0m                                                                     [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m117[0m[39m:[0m[1;39m}[0m                                                                               [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m118[0m[39m:[0m                                                                                [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m119[0m[39m:static int [0m[1;35mxisinf[0m[1;39m([0m[39mdouble x[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m [0m[1;39m{[0m                                                   [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m120[0m[39m:  union [0m[1;39m{[0m                                                                       [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m```[0m                                                                                 [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m<[0m[35m/[0m[95mcode[0m[39m>[0m                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m<code>[0m                                                                              [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39msrc/fmt.[0m[1;92mc:9[0m[39m-[0m[1;36m138[0m                                                                     [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m```[0m                                                                                 [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m9[0m[39m:static const double[0m                                                               [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m10[0m[39m:ivln10hi  = [0m[1;36m4.34294481878168880939e-01[0m[39m, [0m[35m/[0m[39m* [0m[1;36m0x3fdbcb7b[0m[39m, [0m[1;36m0x15200000[0m[39m *[0m[35m/[0m             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m11[0m[39m:ivln10lo  = [0m[1;36m2.50829467116452752298e-11[0m[39m, [0m[35m/[0m[39m* [0m[1;36m0x3dbb9438[0m[39m, [0m[1;36m0xca9aadd5[0m[39m *[0m[35m/[0m             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m12[0m[39m:log10_2hi = [0m[1;36m3.01029995663611771306e-01[0m[39m, [0m[35m/[0m[39m* [0m[1;36m0x3FD34413[0m[39m, [0m[1;36m0x509F6000[0m[39m *[0m[35m/[0m             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m13[0m[39m:log10_2lo = [0m[1;36m3.69423907715893078616e-13[0m[39m, [0m[35m/[0m[39m* [0m[1;36m0x3D59FEF3[0m[39m, [0m[1;36m0x11F12B36[0m[39m *[0m[35m/[0m             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m14[0m[39m:Lg1 = [0m[1;36m6.666666666666735130e-01[0m[39m,  [0m[35m/[0m[39m* 3FE55555 [0m[1;36m55555593[0m[39m *[0m[35m/[0m                         [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m15[0m[39m:Lg2 = [0m[1;36m3.999999999940941908e-01[0m[39m,  [0m[35m/[0m[39m* 3FD99999 9997FA04 *[0m[35m/[0m                         [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m16[0m[39m:Lg3 = [0m[1;36m2.857142874366239149e-01[0m[39m,  [0m[35m/[0m[39m* 3FD24924 [0m[1;36m94229359[0m[39m *[0m[35m/[0m                         [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m17[0m[39m:Lg4 = [0m[1;36m2.222219843214978396e-01[0m[39m,  [0m[35m/[0m[39m* 3FCC71C5 1D8E78AF *[0m[35m/[0m                         [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m18[0m[39m:Lg5 = [0m[1;36m1.818357216161805012e-01[0m[39m,  [0m[35m/[0m[39m* 3FC74664 96CB03DE *[0m[35m/[0m                         [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m19[0m[39m:Lg6 = [0m[1;36m1.531383769920937332e-01[0m[39m,  [0m[35m/[0m[39m* 3FC39A09 D078C69F *[0m[35m/[0m                         [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m20[0m[39m:Lg7 = [0m[1;36m1.479819860511658591e-01[0m[39m;  [0m[35m/[0m[39m* 3FC2F112 DF3E5244 *[0m[35m/[0m                         [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m21[0m[39m:[0m                                                                                 [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;92m22:d[0m[39mouble [0m[1;35mlog10[0m[1;39m([0m[39mdouble x[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m [0m[1;39m{[0m                                                         [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m23[0m[39m:     [0m[39munion [0m[1;39m{[0m[39mdouble f; uint64_t i;[0m[1;39m}[0m[39m u = [0m[1;39m{[0m[39mx[0m[1;39m}[0m[39m;[0m                                      [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m24[0m[39m:     [0m[39mdouble hfsq,f,s,z,R,w,t1,t2,dk,y,hi,lo,val_hi,val_lo;[0m                       [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m25[0m[39m:     [0m[39muint64_t hx;[0m                                                                [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m26[0m[39m:     [0m[39mint k;[0m                                                                      [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m27[0m[39m:     [0m[39mhx = u.i>>[0m[1;36m32[0m[39m;[0m                                                               [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m28[0m[39m:     [0m[39mk = [0m[1;36m0[0m[39m;[0m                                                                      [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m29[0m[39m:     [0m[39mif [0m[1;39m([0m[39mhx < [0m[1;36m0x00100000[0m[39m || hx>>[0m[1;36m31[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m [0m[1;39m{[0m                                            [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m30[0m[39m:     [0m[39m        [0m[39mif [0m[1;39m([0m[39mu.i<<[0m[1;36m1[0m[39m == [0m[1;36m0[0m[1;39m)[0m                                                    [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m31[0m[39m:     [0m[39m        [0m[39m        [0m[39mreturn [0m[1;36m-1[0m[39m/[0m[1;39m([0m[39mx*x[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m;  [0m[35m/[0m[39m* [0m[1;35mlog[0m[1;39m([0m[39m+[0m[1;36m-0[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m=-inf *[0m[35m/[0m                       [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m32[0m[39m:     [0m[39m        [0m[39mif [0m[1;39m([0m[39mhx>>[0m[1;36m31[0m[1;39m)[0m                                                         [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m33[0m[39m:     [0m[39m        [0m[39m        [0m[39mreturn [0m[1;39m([0m[39mx-x[0m[1;39m)[0m[35m/[0m[95m0.0[0m[39m; [0m[35m/[0m[39m* [0m[1;35mlog[0m[1;39m([0m[39m-#[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m = NaN *[0m[35m/[0m                       [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m34[0m[39m:     [0m[39m        [0m[35m/[0m[39m* subnormal number, scale x up *[0m[35m/[0m                                  [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m35[0m[39m:     [0m[39m        [0m[39mk -= [0m[1;36m54[0m[39m;[0m                                                            [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m36[0m[39m:     [0m[39m        [0m[39mx *= [0m[1;36m0x1[0m[39mp54;[0m                                                        [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m37[0m[39m:     [0m[39m        [0m[39mu.f = x;[0m                                                            [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m38[0m[39m:     [0m[39m        [0m[39mhx = u.i>>[0m[1;36m32[0m[39m;[0m                                                       [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m39[0m[39m:     [0m[1;39m}[0m[39m else if [0m[1;39m([0m[39mhx >= [0m[1;36m0x7ff00000[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m [0m[1;39m{[0m                                              [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m40[0m[39m:     [0m[39m        [0m[39mreturn x;[0m                                                           [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m41[0m[39m:     [0m[1;39m}[0m[39m else if [0m[1;39m([0m[39mhx == [0m[1;36m0x3ff00000[0m[39m && u.i<<[0m[1;36m32[0m[39m == [0m[1;36m0[0m[1;39m)[0m                                [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m42[0m[39m:     [0m[39m        [0m[39mreturn [0m[1;36m0[0m[39m;[0m                                                           [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m43[0m[39m:     [0m[35m/[0m[39m* reduce x into [0m[1;39m[[0m[1;35msqrt[0m[1;39m([0m[1;36m2[0m[1;39m)[0m[35m/[0m[95m2[0m[39m, [0m[1;35msqrt[0m[1;39m([0m[1;36m2[0m[1;39m)[0m[1;39m][0m[39m *[0m[35m/[0m                                    [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m44[0m[39m:     [0m[39mhx += [0m[1;36m0x3ff00000[0m[39m - [0m[1;36m0x3fe6a09e[0m[39m;[0m                                              [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m45[0m[39m:     [0m[39mk += [0m[1;39m([0m[39mint[0m[1;39m)[0m[1;39m([0m[39mhx>>[0m[1;36m20[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m - [0m[1;36m0x3ff[0m[39m;[0m                                                 [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m46[0m[39m:     [0m[39mhx = [0m[1;39m([0m[39mhx&[0m[1;36m0x000fffff[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m + [0m[1;36m0x3fe6a09e[0m[39m;[0m                                          [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m47[0m[39m:     [0m[39mu.i = [0m[1;39m([0m[39muint64_t[0m[1;39m)[0m[39mhx<<[0m[1;36m32[0m[39m | [0m[1;39m([0m[39mu.i&[0m[1;36m0xffffffff[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m;[0m                                  [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m48[0m[39m:     [0m[39mx = u.f;[0m                                                                    [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m49[0m[39m:     [0m[39mf = x - [0m[1;36m1.0[0m[39m;[0m                                                                [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m50[0m[39m:     [0m[39mhfsq = [0m[1;36m0.5[0m[39m*f*f;[0m                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m51[0m[39m:     [0m[39ms = f/[0m[1;39m([0m[1;36m2.0[0m[39m+f[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m;[0m                                                              [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m52[0m[39m:     [0m[39mz = s*s;[0m                                                                    [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m53[0m[39m:     [0m[39mw = z*z;[0m                                                                    [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m54[0m[39m:     [0m[39mt1 = w*[0m[1;39m([0m[39mLg2+w*[0m[1;39m([0m[39mLg4+w*Lg6[0m[1;39m)[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m;[0m                                                 [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m55[0m[39m:     [0m[39mt2 = z*[0m[1;39m([0m[39mLg1+w*[0m[1;39m([0m[39mLg3+w*[0m[1;39m([0m[39mLg5+w*Lg7[0m[1;39m)[0m[1;39m)[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m;[0m                                         [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m56[0m[39m:     [0m[39mR = t2 + t1;[0m                                                                [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m57[0m[39m:     [0m[35m/[0m[39m* See log2.c for details. *[0m[35m/[0m                                               [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m58[0m[39m:     [0m[35m/[0m[39m* hi+lo = f - hfsq + s*[0m[1;39m([0m[39mhfsq+R[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m ~ [0m[1;35mlog[0m[1;39m([0m[1;36m1[0m[39m+f[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m *[0m[35m/[0m                              [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m59[0m[39m:     [0m[39mhi = f - hfsq;[0m                                                              [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m60[0m[39m:     [0m[39mu.f = hi;[0m                                                                   [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m61[0m[39m:     [0m[39mu.i &= [0m[1;39m([0m[39muint64_t[0m[1;39m)[0m[1;36m-1[0m[39m<<[0m[1;36m32[0m[39m;[0m                                                    [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m62[0m[39m:     [0m[39mhi = u.f;[0m                                                                   [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m63[0m[39m:     [0m[39mlo = f - hi - hfsq + s*[0m[1;39m([0m[39mhfsq+R[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m;[0m                                            [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m64[0m[39m:     [0m[35m/[0m[39m* val_hi+val_lo ~ [0m[1;35mlog10[0m[1;39m([0m[1;36m1[0m[39m+f[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m + k*[0m[1;35mlog10[0m[1;39m([0m[1;36m2[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m *[0m[35m/[0m                               [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m65[0m[39m:     [0m[39mval_hi = hi*ivln10hi;[0m                                                       [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m66[0m[39m:     [0m[39mdk = k;[0m                                                                     [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m67[0m[39m:     [0m[39my = dk*log10_2hi;[0m                                                           [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m68[0m[39m:     [0m[39mval_lo = dk*log10_2lo + [0m[1;39m([0m[39mlo+hi[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m*ivln10lo + lo*ivln10hi;[0m                     [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m69[0m[39m:     [0m[35m/[0m[39m*[0m                                                                          [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m70[0m[39m:     [0m[39m * Extra precision in for adding y is not strictly needed[0m                   [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m71[0m[39m:     [0m[39m * since there is no very large cancellation near x = [0m[1;35msqrt[0m[1;39m([0m[1;36m2[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m or[0m            [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m72[0m[39m:     [0m[39m * x = [0m[1;36m1[0m[39m/[0m[1;35msqrt[0m[1;39m([0m[1;36m2[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m, but we do it anyway since it costs little on CPUs[0m         [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m73[0m[39m:     [0m[39m * with some parallelism and it reduces the error for many args.[0m            [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m74[0m[39m:     [0m[39m *[0m[35m/[0m                                                                         [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m75[0m[39m:     [0m[39mw = y + val_hi;[0m                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m76[0m[39m:     [0m[39mval_lo += [0m[1;39m([0m[39my - w[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m + val_hi;[0m                                                 [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m77[0m[39m:     [0m[39mval_hi = w;[0m                                                                 [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m78[0m[39m:     [0m[39mreturn val_lo + val_hi;[0m                                                     [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m79[0m[39m:[0m[1;39m}[0m                                                                                [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m80[0m[39m:[0m                                                                                 [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;92m81:d[0m[39mouble [0m[1;35mpower[0m[1;39m([0m[39mdouble base, int64_t exponent[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m [0m[1;39m{[0m                                    [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m82[0m[39m:  double result = [0m[1;36m1.0[0m[39m;[0m                                                           [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m83[0m[39m:  int64_t i;[0m                                                                     [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m84[0m[39m:[0m                                                                                 [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m85[0m[39m:  if [0m[1;39m([0m[39mexponent > [0m[1;36m0[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m [0m[1;39m{[0m                                                            [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m86[0m[39m:    for [0m[1;39m([0m[39mi = [0m[1;36m0[0m[39m; i < exponent; i++[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m [0m[1;39m{[0m                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m87[0m[39m:      result *= base;[0m                                                            [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m88[0m[39m:    [0m[1;39m}[0m                                                                            [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m89[0m[39m:  [0m[1;39m}[0m[39m else if [0m[1;39m([0m[39mexponent < [0m[1;36m0[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m [0m[1;39m{[0m                                                     [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m90[0m[39m:    for [0m[1;39m([0m[39mi = [0m[1;36m0[0m[39m; i < -exponent; i++[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m [0m[1;39m{[0m                                            [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m91[0m[39m:      result [0m[35m/[0m[39m= base;[0m                                                            [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m92[0m[39m:    [0m[1;39m}[0m                                                                            [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m93[0m[39m:  [0m[1;39m}[0m                                                                              [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m94[0m[39m:  [0m[35m/[0m[35m/[0m[39m If exponent is [0m[1;36m0[0m[39m, result remains [0m[1;36m1.0[0m                                        [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m95[0m[39m:[0m                                                                                 [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m96[0m[39m:  return result;[0m                                                                 [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m97[0m[39m:[0m[1;39m}[0m                                                                                [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m98[0m[39m:[0m                                                                                 [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;92m99:d[0m[39mouble [0m[1;35mmy_fabs[0m[1;39m([0m[39mdouble x[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m [0m[1;39m{[0m                                                       [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m100[0m[39m:  if [0m[1;39m([0m[39mx >= [0m[1;36m0[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m [0m[1;39m{[0m                                                                 [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m101[0m[39m:    return x;[0m                                                                   [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m102[0m[39m:  [0m[1;39m}[0m[39m else [0m[1;39m{[0m                                                                      [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m103[0m[39m:    return -x;[0m                                                                  [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m104[0m[39m:  [0m[1;39m}[0m                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m105[0m[39m:[0m[1;39m}[0m                                                                               [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m106[0m[39m:[0m                                                                                [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m107[0m[39m:static int [0m[1;35maddexp[0m[1;39m([0m[39mchar *buf, int e, int sign[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m [0m[1;39m{[0m                                 [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m108[0m[39m:  int n = [0m[1;36m0[0m[39m;[0m                                                                    [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m109[0m[39m:  buf[0m[1;39m[[0m[39mn++[0m[1;39m][0m[39m = [0m[32m'e'[0m[39m;[0m                                                               [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m110[0m[39m:  buf[0m[1;39m[[0m[39mn++[0m[1;39m][0m[39m = [0m[1;39m([0m[39mchar[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m sign;[0m                                                       [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m111[0m[39m:  if [0m[1;39m([0m[39me > [0m[1;36m400[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m return [0m[1;36m0[0m[39m;[0m                                                        [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m112[0m[39m:  if [0m[1;39m([0m[39me < [0m[1;36m10[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m buf[0m[1;39m[[0m[39mn++[0m[1;39m][0m[39m = [0m[32m'0'[0m[39m;[0m                                                   [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m113[0m[39m:  if [0m[1;39m([0m[39me >= [0m[1;36m100[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m buf[0m[1;39m[[0m[39mn++[0m[1;39m][0m[39m = [0m[1;39m([0m[39mchar[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m [0m[1;39m([0m[39me [0m[35m/[0m[39m [0m[1;36m100[0m[39m + [0m[32m'0'[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m, e -= [0m[1;36m100[0m[39m * [0m[1;39m([0m[39me [0m[35m/[0m[39m [0m[1;36m100[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m;[0m        [2m                [0m
