[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m211[0m[39m:  if [0m[1;39m([0m[39mis_signed && val < [0m[1;36m0[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m buf[0m[1;39m[[0m[39ms++[0m[1;39m][0m[39m = [0m[32m'-'[0m[39m, v = [0m[1;39m([0m[39muint64_t[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m [0m[1;39m([0m[39m-val[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m;[0m              [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m212[0m[39m:  [0m[35m/[0m[35m/[0m[39m This loop prints a number in reverse order. I guess this is because we[0m     [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m213[0m[39m:  [0m[35m/[0m[35m/[0m[39m write numbers from right to left: least significant digit comes last.[0m      [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m214[0m[39m:  [0m[35m/[0m[35m/[0m[39m Maybe because we use Arabic numbers, and Arabs write RTL?[0m                  [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m215[0m[39m:  if [0m[1;39m([0m[39mis_hex[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m [0m[1;39m{[0m                                                                 [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m216[0m[39m:    for [0m[1;39m([0m[39mn = [0m[1;36m0[0m[39m; v; v >>= [0m[1;36m4[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m buf[0m[1;39m[[0m[39ms + n++[0m[1;39m][0m[39m = letters[0m[1;39m[[0m[39mv & [0m[1;36m15[0m[1;39m][0m[39m;[0m                     [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m217[0m[39m:  [0m[1;39m}[0m[39m else [0m[1;39m{[0m                                                                      [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m218[0m[39m:    for [0m[1;39m([0m[39mn = [0m[1;36m0[0m[39m; v; v [0m[35m/[0m[39m= [0m[1;36m10[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m buf[0m[1;39m[[0m[39ms + n++[0m[1;39m][0m[39m = letters[0m[1;39m[[0m[39mv % [0m[1;36m10[0m[1;39m][0m[39m;[0m                     [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m219[0m[39m:  [0m[1;39m}[0m                                                                             [2m                [0m

[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m221[0m[39m:  for [0m[1;39m([0m[39mi = [0m[1;36m0[0m[39m; i < n [0m[35m/[0m[39m [0m[1;36m2[0m[39m; i++[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m [0m[1;39m{[0m                                                 [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m222[0m[39m:    char t = buf[0m[1;39m[[0m[39ms + i[0m[1;39m][0m[39m;[0m                                                        [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m223[0m[39m:    buf[0m[1;39m[[0m[39ms + i[0m[1;39m][0m[39m = buf[0m[1;39m[[0m[39ms + n - i - [0m[1;36m1[0m[1;39m][0m[39m, buf[0m[1;39m[[0m[39ms + n - i - [0m[1;36m1[0m[1;39m][0m[39m = t;[0m                    [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m224[0m[39m:  [0m[1;39m}[0m                                                                             [2m                [0m

[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m324[0m[39m:          [0m[1;35mout[0m[1;39m([0m[39mc, param[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m;[0m                                                        [2m                [0m

[2;36m                    [0m         [39m```[0m                                                                                 [2m                [0m

[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m## Fix Strategy[0m                                                                     [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m<fix_strategy>[0m                                                                      [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m## Analysis of the Issue[0m                                                            [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mAfter carefully examining the code snippets and the evaluation report, I can now [0m   [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39midentify why the previous patch failed and what the correct fix should be.[0m          [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m## Root Cause Identification[0m                                                        [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mThe stack-buffer-overflow occurs in the [0m[32m'e'[0m[35m/[0m[32m'E'[0m[39m format specifier handler in [0m        [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m`src/fmt.c` at lines [0m[1;36m317[0m[39m-[0m[1;36m327[0m[39m. The issue has **two distinct problems**:[0m              [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m1[0m[39m. **Buffer Size Mismatch**: Line [0m[1;36m318[0m[39m declares `char tmp[0m[1;39m[[0m[1;36m8[0m[1;39m][0m[39m;` [0m[1;39m([0m[1;36m8[0m[39m bytes actual[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m but [0m [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mline [0m[1;36m322[0m[39m calls `[0m[1;35mmg_dtoa[0m[1;39m([0m[39mtmp, [0m[1;36m10[0m[39m, [0m[33m...[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m` claiming [0m[1;36m10[0m[39m bytes are available. This [0m       [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mmismatch causes `mg_dtoa` to internally call `[0m[1;35mmg_snprintf[0m[1;39m([0m[39mtmp, [0m[1;36m10[0m[39m, [0m[33m...[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m`, which [0m    [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mbelieves it can safely write up to [0m[1;36m10[0m[39m bytes, resulting in writes at positions [0m[1;36m8[0m[39m-[0m[1;36m9[0m[39m [0m  [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mthat overflow the [0m[1;36m8[0m[39m-byte buffer.[0m                                                    [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m2[0m[39m. **Insufficient Buffer for Exponent**: Line [0m[1;36m326[0m[39m calls `[0m[1;35mmg_lld[0m[1;39m([0m[39mtmp, exponent, [0m[1;36m1[0m[39m, [0m  [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m0[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m` which can write up to [0m[1;36m20[0m[39m bytes for large exponent values [0m[1;39m([0m[1;36m1[0m[39m byte for sign + up [0m [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mto [0m[1;36m19[0m[39m digits for [0m[1;36m64[0m[39m-bit integers[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m, but the buffer is only [0m[1;36m8[0m[39m bytes.[0m                  [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m## Why Previous Patch Failed[0m                                                        [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mThe evaluation report indicates that the previous patch attempted to:[0m               [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m1[0m[39m. Change `char tmp[0m[1;39m[[0m[1;36m8[0m[1;39m][0m[39m;` to `char tmp[0m[1;39m[[0m[1;36m40[0m[1;39m][0m[39m;`[0m                                         [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m2[0m[39m. Change `[0m[1;35mmg_dtoa[0m[1;39m([0m[39mtmp, [0m[1;36m10[0m[39m, [0m[33m...[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m` to `[0m[1;35mmg_dtoa[0m[1;39m([0m[39mtmp, [0m[1;35msizeof[0m[1;39m([0m[39mtmp[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m, [0m[33m...[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m`[0m               [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mHowever, the identical error persists. Looking at the ASan report details:[0m          [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m```[0m                                                                                 [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mThis frame has [0m[1;36m2[0m[39m [0m[1;35mobject[0m[1;39m([0m[39ms[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m:[0m                                                         [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m    [0m[1;39m[[0m[1;36m32[0m[39m, [0m[1;36m72[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m [0m[32m'tmp'[0m[39m [0m[1;39m([0m[39mline [0m[1;36m276[0m[1;39m)[0m                                                       [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m    [0m[1;39m[[0m[1;36m112[0m[39m, [0m[1;36m120[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m [0m[32m'tmp371'[0m[39m [0m[1;39m([0m[39mline [0m[1;36m319[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m <== Memory access at offset [0m[1;36m120[0m[39m overflows this [0m  [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mvariable[0m                                                                            [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m```[0m                                                                                 [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mThe ASan report shows TWO separate `tmp` variables in the stack frame:[0m              [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m- **First tmp** at line [0m[1;36m276[0m[39m: [0m[1;39m[[0m[1;36m32[0m[39m, [0m[1;36m72[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m - [0m[1;36m40[0m[39m bytes, used for [0m                         [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [32m'd'[0m[35m/[0m[32m'u'[0m[35m/[0m[32m'x'[0m[35m/[0m[32m'X'[0m[35m/[0m[32m'p'[0m[35m/[0m[32m'g'[0m[35m/[0m[32m'f'[0m[39m formats[0m                                                 [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m- **Second tmp** [0m[1;39m([0m[39mtmp371[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m at line [0m[1;36m319[0m[39m: [0m[1;39m[[0m[1;36m112[0m[39m, [0m[1;36m120[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m - **still [0m[1;36m8[0m[39m bytes**, used for [0m    [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [32m'e'[0m[35m/[0m[32m'E'[0m[39m formats[0m                                                                     [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m**Critical Finding**: The previous patch likely modified the WRONG `tmp` variable [0m  [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mor wasn't applied correctly. The code snippets show line [0m[1;36m318[0m[39m still has `char [0m       [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mtmp[0m[1;39m[[0m[1;36m8[0m[1;39m][0m[39m;` and line [0m[1;36m322[0m[39m still has `[0m[1;35mmg_dtoa[0m[1;39m([0m[39mtmp, [0m[1;36m10[0m[39m, [0m[33m...[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m`, indicating the patch was [0m  [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mnot successfully applied to the [0m[32m'e'[0m[35m/[0m[32m'E'[0m[39m format handler.[0m                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m## Comprehensive Fix Strategy[0m                                                       [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m### Changes Required in src/fmt.c[0m                                                   [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m**Change [0m[1;36m1[0m[39m: Line [0m[1;36m318[0m[39m - Increase buffer size**[0m                                       [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m```c[0m                                                                                [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [35m/[0m[35m/[0m[39m Current [0m[1;39m([0m[39mINCORRECT[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m:[0m                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mchar tmp[0m[1;39m[[0m[1;36m8[0m[1;39m][0m[39m;[0m                                                                        [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [35m/[0m[35m/[0m[39m Should be changed to:[0m                                                            [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mchar tmp[0m[1;39m[[0m[1;36m40[0m[1;39m][0m[39m;[0m                                                                       [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m```[0m                                                                                 [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m**Change [0m[1;36m2[0m[39m: Line [0m[1;36m322[0m[39m - Use correct buffer size**[0m                                    [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m```c[0m                                                                                [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [35m/[0m[35m/[0m[39m Current [0m[1;39m([0m[39mINCORRECT[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m:[0m                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mk = [0m[1;35mmg_dtoa[0m[1;39m([0m[39mtmp, [0m[1;36m10[0m[39m, mantissa, [0m[1;36m8[0m[39m, c == [0m[32m'e'[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m;[0m                                        [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [35m/[0m[35m/[0m[39m Should be changed to:[0m                                                            [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mk = [0m[1;35mmg_dtoa[0m[1;39m([0m[39mtmp, [0m[1;35msizeof[0m[1;39m([0m[39mtmp[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m, mantissa, [0m[1;36m8[0m[39m, c == [0m[32m'e'[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m;[0m                               [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m```[0m                                                                                 [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m### Justification[0m                                                                   [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m1[0m[39m. **Consistency with Codebase Pattern**: Line [0m[1;36m275[0m[39m in the same function uses `char [0m [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mtmp[0m[1;39m[[0m[1;36m40[0m[1;39m][0m[39m;` for other numeric formats [0m[1;39m([0m[32m'd'[0m[35m/[0m[32m'u'[0m[35m/[0m[32m'x'[0m[35m/[0m[32m'X'[0m[35m/[0m[32m'p'[0m[35m/[0m[32m'g'[0m[35m/[0m[32m'f'[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m. The [0m[32m'e'[0m[35m/[0m[32m'E'[0m[39m [0m     [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mformat handler should follow the same pattern.[0m                                      [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m2[0m[39m. **Adequate Space for All Operations**:[0m                                           [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m   - mg_dtoa internally uses a [0m[1;36m40[0m[39m-byte buffer [0m[1;39m([0m[39mline [0m[1;36m139[0m[1;39m)[0m                            [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m   - mg_lld can write up to [0m[1;36m20[0m[39m bytes for INT64_MIN[0m                                  [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m   - [0m[1;36m40[0m[39m bytes provides sufficient space with a safety margin[0m                        [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m3[0m[39m. **Correct Size Propagation**: Using `[0m[1;35msizeof[0m[1;39m([0m[39mtmp[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m` instead of hardcoded `[0m[1;36m10[0m[39m` [0m     [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mensures mg_dtoa knows the actual buffer size, preventing mg_snprintf from [0m          [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mattempting out-of-bounds writes.[0m                                                    [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m4[0m[39m. **Matches All Other mg_dtoa Calls**:[0m                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m   - Line [0m[1;36m168[0m[39m: `[0m[1;35mmg_dtoa[0m[1;39m([0m[39mbuf, [0m[1;35msizeof[0m[1;39m([0m[39mbuf[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m, [0m[33m...[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m`[0m                                     [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m   - Line [0m[1;36m173[0m[39m: `[0m[1;35mmg_dtoa[0m[1;39m([0m[39mbuf, [0m[1;35msizeof[0m[1;39m([0m[39mbuf[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m, [0m[33m...[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m`[0m                                     [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m   - Line [0m[1;36m280[0m[39m: `[0m[1;35mmg_dtoa[0m[1;39m([0m[39mtmp, [0m[1;35msizeof[0m[1;39m([0m[39mtmp[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m, [0m[33m...[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m`[0m                                     [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m   - Only line [0m[1;36m322[0m[39m uses a hardcoded value that doesn't match the actual buffer size[0m [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m### How This Addresses the ASan Error[0m                                               [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mThe overflow occurs at offset [0m[1;36m120[0m[39m in the stack frame, which is exactly at the [0m      [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mboundary of the [0m[1;36m8[0m[39m-byte buffer at offsets [0m[1;39m[[0m[1;36m112[0m[39m, [0m[1;36m120[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m. The write happens when:[0m        [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m1[0m[39m. `[0m[1;35mmg_dtoa[0m[1;39m([0m[39mtmp, [0m[1;36m10[0m[39m, [0m[33m...[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m` is called with tmp having only [0m[1;36m8[0m[39m bytes[0m                   [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m2[0m[39m. Internally, `[0m[1;35mmg_snprintf[0m[1;39m([0m[39mtmp, [0m[1;36m10[0m[39m, [0m[33m...[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m` believes it has [0m[1;36m10[0m[39m bytes available[0m       [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m3[0m[39m. When writing the 9th byte [0m[1;39m([0m[39mat index [0m[1;36m8[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m, it accesses `tmp[0m[1;39m[[0m[1;36m8[0m[1;39m][0m[39m` which is at offset [0m [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m120[0m[39m [0m[1;39m([0m[1;36m112[0m[39m + [0m[1;36m8[0m[1;39m)[0m                                                                       [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m4[0m[39m. This is exactly where ASan detects the overflow[0m                                  [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mBy increasing the buffer to [0m[1;36m40[0m[39m bytes and passing `[0m[1;35msizeof[0m[1;39m([0m[39mtmp[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m` [0m[1;39m([0m[1;36m40[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m, the overflow [0m  [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mis eliminated because:[0m                                                              [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m- The buffer physically has [0m[1;36m40[0m[39m bytes allocated[0m                                      [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m- mg_snprintf knows the correct size and won't write beyond byte [0m[1;36m39[0m                 [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m- mg_lld has sufficient space for any exponent value[0m                                [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m### Preservation of Existing Logic[0m                                                  [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mThis fix:[0m                                                                           [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m- Does NOT change the formatting algorithm or output format[0m                         [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m- Does NOT modify the fuzzing harness or test code[0m                                  [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m- Only increases internal buffer size to prevent overflow[0m                           [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m- Maintains compatibility with all existing tests [0m[1;39m([0m[39mtest_mg_snprintf expects outputs[0m [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mlike [0m[32m"3.33e0"[0m[39m, [0m[32m"3.33e12"[0m[39m, [0m[32m"3e12"[0m[1;39m)[0m                                                   [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m- Follows the established codebase pattern for numeric format handlers[0m              [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m### Potential Side Effects[0m                                                          [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m**[0m[3;35mNone[0m[39m expected** because:[0m                                                          [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m- The change only affects internal buffer allocation within a single format handler[0m [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m- The output format and behavior remain identical[0m                                   [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m- No external APIs or function signatures are modified[0m                              [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m- The larger buffer doesn't affect performance meaningfully [0m[1;39m([0m[1;36m40[0m[39m vs [0m[1;36m8[0m[39m bytes on [0m      [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mstack[0m[1;39m)[0m                                                                              [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m### Why This is the Optimal Approach[0m                                                [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m1[0m[39m. **Minimal Change**: Only [0m[1;36m2[0m[39m lines modified[0m                                        [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m2[0m[39m. **Follows Existing Patterns**: Aligns with how other numeric formats are handled[0m [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m3[0m[39m. **Complete Fix**: Addresses both the mg_dtoa overflow and potential mg_lld [0m      [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39moverflow[0m                                                                            [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m4[0m[39m. **No Breaking Changes**: Maintains all existing functionality and test [0m          [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mcompatibility[0m                                                                       [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m

[2;36m                    [0m         [39m## Summary[0m                                                                          [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mThe initial issue is a stack-buffer-overflow detected by AddressSanitizer in the [0m   [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mmongoose codebase. The overflow occurs when writing [0m[1;36m1[0m[39m byte to address [0m              [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m0x7f65cf76fb78[0m[39m, specifically in the `mg_pfn_iobuf_private` function called from [0m    [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m`scpy` during formatted output processing. The overflow affects a stack variable [0m   [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m`tmp371` [0m[1;39m([0m[1;36m8[0m[39m bytes[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m at line [0m[1;36m319[0m[39m in `mg_vxprintf`. [0m                                   [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mA patch was attempted that increased the size of a `tmp` buffer from [0m[1;36m8[0m[39m to [0m[1;36m40[0m[39m bytes [0m [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mfor the [0m[32m'e'[0m[35m/[0m[32m'E'[0m[39m format specifier case and updated the corresponding `mg_dtoa` call [0m [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mto use `[0m[1;35msizeof[0m[1;39m([0m[39mtmp[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m`. However, after applying the patch, the exact same [0m            [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mstack-buffer-overflow error persists at the same location with identical stack [0m     [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mtraces and memory access patterns.[0m                                                  [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m## Description[0m                                                                      [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m### Initial Issue Analysis[0m                                                          [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mThe initial issue manifests as a [0m[1;36m1[0m[39m-byte write stack-buffer-overflow with the [0m       [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mfollowing characteristics:[0m                                                          [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m**Error Location:**[0m                                                                 [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m- Primary error occurs in `mg_pfn_iobuf_private` → `mg_putchar_iobuf_static` → [0m     [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m`scpy` → `mg_vxprintf.specialized.[0m[1;36m2[0m[39m`[0m                                                [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m- The overflow happens at offset [0m[1;36m120[0m[39m in the stack frame of `mg_vxprintf` [0m[1;39m([0m[39mline [0m[1;36m247[0m[39m [0m [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39min fmt.c[0m[1;39m)[0m                                                                           [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m- Two stack objects are present in the frame:[0m                                       [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m  - `tmp` at [0m[1;39m[[0m[1;36m32[0m[39m, [0m[1;36m72[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m - [0m[1;36m40[0m[39m bytes [0m[1;39m([0m[39mline [0m[1;36m276[0m[1;39m)[0m                                         [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m  - `tmp371` at [0m[1;39m[[0m[1;36m112[0m[39m, [0m[1;36m120[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m - [0m[1;36m8[0m[39m bytes [0m[1;39m([0m[39mline [0m[1;36m319[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m ← overflow target[0m                   [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m**Call Chain:**[0m                                                                     [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mThe error propagates through the following call sequence:[0m                           [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m1[0m[39m. `LLVMFuzzerTestOneInput` [0m[1;39m([0m[39mfuzz.[0m[1;92mc:32[0m[1;39m)[0m                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m2[0m[39m. `mg_http_parse` [0m[1;39m([0m[39mhttp.[0m[1;92mc:317[0m[1;39m)[0m                                                     [2m                [0m

[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m6[0m[39m. `mg_snprintf` → `mg_vsnprintf` [0m[1;39m([0m[39mprintf.[0m[1;92mc:48[0m[39m, [0m[1;36m57[0m[1;39m)[0m                                 [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m7[0m[39m. `mg_vxprintf.specialized.[0m[1;36m2[0m[39m` [0m[1;39m([0m[39mfmt.[0m[1;92mc:315[0m[1;39m)[0m                                          [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m8[0m[39m. `scpy` [0m[1;39m([0m[39mfmt.[0m[1;92mc:233[0m[1;39m)[0m                                                               [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m9[0m[39m. `mg_putchar_iobuf_static` → `mg_pfn_iobuf_private` [0m[1;39m([0m[39mprintf.[0m[1;92mc:39[0m[1;39m)[0m                 [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m**Memory Access Pattern:**[0m                                                          [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mThe shadow bytes show:[0m                                                              [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m- `f1` markers indicate stack left redzone[0m                                          [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m- `f2` markers indicate stack mid redzone[0m                                           [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m- `f3` markers indicate stack right redzone[0m                                         [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m- The write at offset [0m[1;36m120[0m[39m [0m[1;39m([0m[39m`[0m[1;39m[[0m[39mf3[0m[1;39m][0m[39m`[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m is exactly at the boundary of the `tmp371` [0m      [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mvariable, indicating a write beyond the allocated [0m[1;36m8[0m[39m-byte buffer[0m                     [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m### Patch Attempt Details[0m                                                           [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mThe patch modified `src/fmt.c` at lines [0m[1;36m315[0m[39m-[0m[1;36m323[0m[39m, specifically targeting the [0m[32m'e'[0m[35m/[0m[32m'E'[0m [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mformat specifier case:[0m                                                              [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m**Changes made:**[0m                                                                   [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m1[0m[39m. Line [0m[1;36m318[0m[39m: Changed `char tmp[0m[1;39m[[0m[1;36m8[0m[1;39m][0m[39m;` to `char tmp[0m[1;39m[[0m[1;36m40[0m[1;39m][0m[39m;` - increased buffer size from[0m [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m8[0m[39m to [0m[1;36m40[0m[39m bytes[0m                                                                       [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m2[0m[39m. Line [0m[1;36m322[0m[39m: Changed `k = [0m[1;35mmg_dtoa[0m[1;39m([0m[39mtmp, [0m[1;36m10[0m[39m, mantissa, [0m[1;36m8[0m[39m, c == [0m[32m'e'[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m;` to `k = [0m        [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;35mmg_dtoa[0m[1;39m([0m[39mtmp, [0m[1;35msizeof[0m[1;39m([0m[39mtmp[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m, mantissa, [0m[1;36m8[0m[39m, c == [0m[32m'e'[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m;` - updated the second parameter [0m  [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mfrom hardcoded `[0m[1;36m10[0m[39m` to `[0m[1;35msizeof[0m[1;39m([0m[39mtmp[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m` [0m[1;39m([0m[1;36m40[0m[1;39m)[0m                                           [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m**Note:** The variable name mentioned in the error [0m[1;39m([0m[39m`tmp371`[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m suggests this might [0m  [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mbe a different `tmp` variable than the one modified in the patch, or it's a [0m        [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mcompiler-generated temporary name for line [0m[1;36m371[0m[39m [0m[1;39m([0m[39mthough the error references line [0m   [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m319[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m.[0m                                                                               [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m### Post-Patch Analysis[0m                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mAfter applying the patch, the identical error persists:[0m                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m**Unchanged aspects:**[0m                                                              [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m- Same overflow location: offset [0m[1;36m120[0m[39m in `mg_vxprintf` frame[0m                         [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m- Same stack frame layout: `tmp` at [0m[1;39m[[0m[1;36m32[0m[39m, [0m[1;36m72[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m and `tmp371` at [0m[1;39m[[0m[1;36m112[0m[39m, [0m[1;36m120[0m[1;39m)[0m             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m- Identical call stack[0m                                                              [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m- Same memory access pattern and shadow bytes[0m                                       [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m- Same [0m[1;36m1[0m[39m-byte write overflow at the boundary of `tmp371`[0m                            [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m**Critical Observation:**[0m                                                           [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mThe `tmp371` variable remains [0m[1;36m8[0m[39m bytes [0m[1;39m([0m[1;39m[[0m[1;36m112[0m[39m, [0m[1;36m120[0m[1;39m)[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m even after the patch, while the [0m [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m`tmp` variable at [0m[1;39m[[0m[1;36m32[0m[39m, [0m[1;36m72[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m shows as [0m[1;36m40[0m[39m bytes. This indicates that the patch [0m        [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mmodified a different `tmp` variable than the one involved in the overflow, or there[0m [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mare multiple code paths that can trigger the overflow.[0m                              [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m### Areas Requiring Further Investigation[0m                                           [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m1[0m[39m. **fmt.c around lines [0m[1;36m315[0m[39m-[0m[1;36m325[0m[39m**: The complete context of the [0m[32m'e'[0m[35m/[0m[32m'E'[0m[39m format [0m      [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mspecifier handling, particularly examining whether there are multiple `tmp` [0m        [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mvariables in scope and which one corresponds to `tmp371`.[0m                           [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m2[0m[39m. **fmt.c line [0m[1;36m319[0m[39m**: The exact code at this line needs inspection as it's [0m        [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39midentified as the location where `tmp371` is declared.[0m                              [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m3[0m[39m. **fmt.c line [0m[1;36m233[0m[39m [0m[1;39m([0m[39mscpy function[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m**: The implementation of `scpy` to understand [0m  [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mhow it writes beyond buffer boundaries, and what size constraints it expects.[0m       [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m4[0m[39m. **printf.c lines [0m[1;36m39[0m[39m and earlier [0m[1;39m([0m[39mmg_putchar_iobuf_static and [0m                    [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mmg_pfn_iobuf_private[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m**: These functions perform the actual write operation that [0m   [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mcauses the overflow.[0m                                                                [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m5[0m[39m. **mg_dtoa implementation**: Understanding how this function generates output and[0m [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mwhether it properly respects the buffer size parameter passed to it.[0m                [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m6[0m[39m. **mg_vxprintf [0m[1;39m([0m[39mline [0m[1;36m247[0m[39m onwards[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m**: The complete function implementation to [0m     [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39midentify all temporary buffers created and their usage patterns, particularly any [0m  [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m8[0m[39m-byte temporary buffers that might be overflowing.[0m                                 [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m7[0m[39m. **Relationship between mg_vxprintf calls**: The call stack shows two invocations[0m [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mof mg_vxprintf [0m[1;39m([0m[39mlines [0m[1;36m323[0m[39m and [0m[1;36m315[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m, suggesting nested formatting operations that [0m   [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mmight be using different buffer contexts.[0m                                           [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m## Initial Issue Log[0m                                                                [2m                [0m

[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m155[0m[39m:[0m                                                                                [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m156[0m[39m:  while [0m[1;39m([0m[39md <= [0m[1;36m1.0[0m[39m && d [0m[35m/[0m[39m mul <= [0m[1;36m1.0[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m mul [0m[35m/[0m[39m= [0m[1;36m10.0[0m[39m;[0m                               [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m157[0m[39m:  for [0m[1;39m([0m[39mi = [0m[1;36m0[0m[39m, t = mul * [0m[1;36m5[0m[39m; i < width; i++[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m t [0m[35m/[0m[39m= [0m[1;36m10.0[0m[39m;[0m                           [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m158[0m[39m:[0m                                                                                [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m159[0m[39m:  d += t;[0m                                                                       [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m160[0m[39m:[0m                                                                                [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m161[0m[39m:  [0m[35m/[0m[35m/[0m[39m Calculate exponent, and [0m[32m'mul'[0m[39m for scientific representation[0m                [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m162[0m[39m:  mul = [0m[1;36m1.0[0m[39m;[0m                                                                    [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m163[0m[39m:  while [0m[1;39m([0m[39md >= [0m[1;36m10.0[0m[39m && d [0m[35m/[0m[39m mul >= [0m[1;36m10.0[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m mul *= [0m[1;36m10.0[0m[39m, e++;[0m                        [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m164[0m[39m:  while [0m[1;39m([0m[39md < [0m[1;36m1.0[0m[39m && d [0m[35m/[0m[39m mul < [0m[1;36m1.0[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m mul [0m[35m/[0m[39m= [0m[1;36m10.0[0m[39m, e--;[0m                            [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m165[0m[39m:  [0m[35m/[0m[35m/[0m[39m [0m[1;35mprintf[0m[1;39m([0m[32m" --> %g %d %g %g\n"[0m[39m, saved, e, t, mul[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m;[0m                            [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m166[0m[39m:[0m                                                                                [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m167[0m[39m:  if [0m[1;39m([0m[39mtz && e >= width && width > [0m[1;36m1[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m [0m[1;39m{[0m                                          [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m168[0m[39m:    n = [0m[1;39m([0m[39mint[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m [0m[1;35mmg_dtoa[0m[1;39m([0m[39mbuf, [0m[1;35msizeof[0m[1;39m([0m[39mbuf[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m, saved [0m[35m/[0m[39m mul, width, tz[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m;[0m                [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m169[0m[39m:    [0m[35m/[0m[35m/[0m[39m [0m[1;35mprintf[0m[1;39m([0m[32m" --> %.*g %d [0m[32m[[0m[32m%.*s[0m[32m][0m[32m\n"[0m[39m, [0m[1;36m10[0m[39m, d [0m[35m/[0m[39m t, e, n, buf[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m;[0m                   [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m170[0m[39m:    n += [0m[1;35maddexp[0m[1;39m([0m[39mbuf + s + n, e, [0m[32m'+'[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m;[0m                                           [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m171[0m[39m:    return [0m[1;35mmg_snprintf[0m[1;39m([0m[39mdst, dstlen, [0m[32m"%.*s"[0m[39m, n, buf[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m;[0m                            [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m172[0m[39m:  [0m[1;39m}[0m[39m else if [0m[1;39m([0m[39mtz && e <= -width && width > [0m[1;36m1[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m [0m[1;39m{[0m                                  [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m173[0m[39m:    n = [0m[1;39m([0m[39mint[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m [0m[1;35mmg_dtoa[0m[1;39m([0m[39mbuf, [0m[1;35msizeof[0m[1;39m([0m[39mbuf[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m, saved [0m[35m/[0m[39m mul, width, tz[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m;[0m                [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m174[0m[39m:    [0m[35m/[0m[35m/[0m[39m [0m[1;35mprintf[0m[1;39m([0m[32m" --> %.*g %d [0m[32m[[0m[32m%.*s[0m[32m][0m[32m\n"[0m[39m, [0m[1;36m10[0m[39m, d [0m[35m/[0m[39m mul, e, n, buf[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m;[0m                 [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m175[0m[39m:    n += [0m[1;35maddexp[0m[1;39m([0m[39mbuf + s + n, -e, [0m[32m'-'[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m;[0m                                          [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m176[0m[39m:    return [0m[1;35mmg_snprintf[0m[1;39m([0m[39mdst, dstlen, [0m[32m"%.*s"[0m[39m, n, buf[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m;[0m                            [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m177[0m[39m:  [0m[1;39m}[0m[39m else [0m[1;39m{[0m                                                                      [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m```[0m                                                                                 [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m<[0m[35m/[0m[95mcode[0m[39m>[0m                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m<code>[0m                                                                              [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39msrc/fmt.[0m[1;92mc:1[0m[39m-[0m[1;36m8[0m                                                                       [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m```[0m                                                                                 [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m1[0m[39m:#include [0m[32m"fmt.h"[0m                                                                  [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m2[0m[39m:#include [0m[32m"printf.h"[0m                                                               [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m3[0m[39m:#include [0m[32m"util.h"[0m                                                                 [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m4[0m[39m:[0m                                                                                  [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m5[0m[39m:static bool [0m[1;35mis_digit[0m[1;39m([0m[39mint c[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m [0m[1;39m{[0m                                                     [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m6[0m[39m:  return c >= [0m[32m'0'[0m[39m && c <= [0m[32m'9'[0m[39m;[0m                                                    [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m7[0m[39m:[0m[1;39m}[0m                                                                                 [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m8[0m[39m:[0m                                                                                  [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m```[0m                                                                                 [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m<[0m[35m/[0m[95mcode[0m[39m>[0m                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m<code>[0m                                                                              [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39msrc/http.[0m[1;92mc:314[0m[39m-[0m[1;36m318[0m                                                                  [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m```[0m                                                                                 [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m314[0m[39m:    [0m[35m/[0m[35m/[0m[39m Ignore the message if it is too large due to oom issues[0m                  [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m315[0m[39m:    if [0m[1;39m([0m[39mhm->message.len > [0m[1;39m([0m[1;36m1[0m[39m<<[0m[1;36m21[0m[1;39m)[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m [0m[1;39m{[0m                                            [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m316[0m[39m:        [0m[1;35mMG_ERROR[0m[1;39m([0m[1;39m([0m[32m"MG_ERROR: oom potential; message.len is %e\n"[0m[39m, [0m              [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;39m([0m[39mdouble[0m[1;39m)[0m[1;39m([0m[39mhm->message.len[0m[1;39m)[0m[1;39m)[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m;[0m                                                        [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m317[0m[39m:        return [0m[1;36m-1[0m[39m;[0m                                                              [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m318[0m[39m:    [0m[1;39m}[0m                                                                           [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m```[0m                                                                                 [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m<[0m[35m/[0m[95mcode[0m[39m>[0m                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m<code>[0m                                                                              [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39msrc/fmt.[0m[1;92mc:22[0m[39m-[0m[1;36m79[0m                                                                     [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m```[0m                                                                                 [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;92m22:d[0m[39mouble [0m[1;35mlog10[0m[1;39m([0m[39mdouble x[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m [0m[1;39m{[0m                                                         [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m23[0m[39m:     [0m[39munion [0m[1;39m{[0m[39mdouble f; uint64_t i;[0m[1;39m}[0m[39m u = [0m[1;39m{[0m[39mx[0m[1;39m}[0m[39m;[0m                                      [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m24[0m[39m:     [0m[39mdouble hfsq,f,s,z,R,w,t1,t2,dk,y,hi,lo,val_hi,val_lo;[0m                       [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m25[0m[39m:     [0m[39muint64_t hx;[0m                                                                [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m26[0m[39m:     [0m[39mint k;[0m                                                                      [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m27[0m[39m:     [0m[39mhx = u.i>>[0m[1;36m32[0m[39m;[0m                                                               [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m28[0m[39m:     [0m[39mk = [0m[1;36m0[0m[39m;[0m                                                                      [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m29[0m[39m:     [0m[39mif [0m[1;39m([0m[39mhx < [0m[1;36m0x00100000[0m[39m || hx>>[0m[1;36m31[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m [0m[1;39m{[0m                                            [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m30[0m[39m:     [0m[39m        [0m[39mif [0m[1;39m([0m[39mu.i<<[0m[1;36m1[0m[39m == [0m[1;36m0[0m[1;39m)[0m                                                    [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m31[0m[39m:     [0m[39m        [0m[39m        [0m[39mreturn [0m[1;36m-1[0m[39m/[0m[1;39m([0m[39mx*x[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m;  [0m[35m/[0m[39m* [0m[1;35mlog[0m[1;39m([0m[39m+[0m[1;36m-0[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m=-inf *[0m[35m/[0m                       [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m32[0m[39m:     [0m[39m        [0m[39mif [0m[1;39m([0m[39mhx>>[0m[1;36m31[0m[1;39m)[0m                                                         [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m33[0m[39m:     [0m[39m        [0m[39m        [0m[39mreturn [0m[1;39m([0m[39mx-x[0m[1;39m)[0m[35m/[0m[95m0.0[0m[39m; [0m[35m/[0m[39m* [0m[1;35mlog[0m[1;39m([0m[39m-#[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m = NaN *[0m[35m/[0m                       [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m34[0m[39m:     [0m[39m        [0m[35m/[0m[39m* subnormal number, scale x up *[0m[35m/[0m                                  [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m35[0m[39m:     [0m[39m        [0m[39mk -= [0m[1;36m54[0m[39m;[0m                                                            [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m36[0m[39m:     [0m[39m        [0m[39mx *= [0m[1;36m0x1[0m[39mp54;[0m                                                        [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m37[0m[39m:     [0m[39m        [0m[39mu.f = x;[0m                                                            [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m38[0m[39m:     [0m[39m        [0m[39mhx = u.i>>[0m[1;36m32[0m[39m;[0m                                                       [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m39[0m[39m:     [0m[1;39m}[0m[39m else if [0m[1;39m([0m[39mhx >= [0m[1;36m0x7ff00000[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m [0m[1;39m{[0m                                              [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m40[0m[39m:     [0m[39m        [0m[39mreturn x;[0m                                                           [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m41[0m[39m:     [0m[1;39m}[0m[39m else if [0m[1;39m([0m[39mhx == [0m[1;36m0x3ff00000[0m[39m && u.i<<[0m[1;36m32[0m[39m == [0m[1;36m0[0m[1;39m)[0m                                [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m42[0m[39m:     [0m[39m        [0m[39mreturn [0m[1;36m0[0m[39m;[0m                                                           [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m43[0m[39m:     [0m[35m/[0m[39m* reduce x into [0m[1;39m[[0m[1;35msqrt[0m[1;39m([0m[1;36m2[0m[1;39m)[0m[35m/[0m[95m2[0m[39m, [0m[1;35msqrt[0m[1;39m([0m[1;36m2[0m[1;39m)[0m[1;39m][0m[39m *[0m[35m/[0m                                    [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m44[0m[39m:     [0m[39mhx += [0m[1;36m0x3ff00000[0m[39m - [0m[1;36m0x3fe6a09e[0m[39m;[0m                                              [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m45[0m[39m:     [0m[39mk += [0m[1;39m([0m[39mint[0m[1;39m)[0m[1;39m([0m[39mhx>>[0m[1;36m20[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m - [0m[1;36m0x3ff[0m[39m;[0m                                                 [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m46[0m[39m:     [0m[39mhx = [0m[1;39m([0m[39mhx&[0m[1;36m0x000fffff[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m + [0m[1;36m0x3fe6a09e[0m[39m;[0m                                          [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m47[0m[39m:     [0m[39mu.i = [0m[1;39m([0m[39muint64_t[0m[1;39m)[0m[39mhx<<[0m[1;36m32[0m[39m | [0m[1;39m([0m[39mu.i&[0m[1;36m0xffffffff[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m;[0m                                  [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m48[0m[39m:     [0m[39mx = u.f;[0m                                                                    [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m49[0m[39m:     [0m[39mf = x - [0m[1;36m1.0[0m[39m;[0m                                                                [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m50[0m[39m:     [0m[39mhfsq = [0m[1;36m0.5[0m[39m*f*f;[0m                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m51[0m[39m:     [0m[39ms = f/[0m[1;39m([0m[1;36m2.0[0m[39m+f[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m;[0m                                                              [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m52[0m[39m:     [0m[39mz = s*s;[0m                                                                    [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m53[0m[39m:     [0m[39mw = z*z;[0m                                                                    [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m54[0m[39m:     [0m[39mt1 = w*[0m[1;39m([0m[39mLg2+w*[0m[1;39m([0m[39mLg4+w*Lg6[0m[1;39m)[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m;[0m                                                 [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m55[0m[39m:     [0m[39mt2 = z*[0m[1;39m([0m[39mLg1+w*[0m[1;39m([0m[39mLg3+w*[0m[1;39m([0m[39mLg5+w*Lg7[0m[1;39m)[0m[1;39m)[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m;[0m                                         [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m56[0m[39m:     [0m[39mR = t2 + t1;[0m                                                                [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m57[0m[39m:     [0m[35m/[0m[39m* See log2.c for details. *[0m[35m/[0m                                               [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m58[0m[39m:     [0m[35m/[0m[39m* hi+lo = f - hfsq + s*[0m[1;39m([0m[39mhfsq+R[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m ~ [0m[1;35mlog[0m[1;39m([0m[1;36m1[0m[39m+f[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m *[0m[35m/[0m                              [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m59[0m[39m:     [0m[39mhi = f - hfsq;[0m                                                              [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m60[0m[39m:     [0m[39mu.f = hi;[0m                                                                   [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m61[0m[39m:     [0m[39mu.i &= [0m[1;39m([0m[39muint64_t[0m[1;39m)[0m[1;36m-1[0m[39m<<[0m[1;36m32[0m[39m;[0m                                                    [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m62[0m[39m:     [0m[39mhi = u.f;[0m                                                                   [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m63[0m[39m:     [0m[39mlo = f - hi - hfsq + s*[0m[1;39m([0m[39mhfsq+R[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m;[0m                                            [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m64[0m[39m:     [0m[35m/[0m[39m* val_hi+val_lo ~ [0m[1;35mlog10[0m[1;39m([0m[1;36m1[0m[39m+f[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m + k*[0m[1;35mlog10[0m[1;39m([0m[1;36m2[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m *[0m[35m/[0m                               [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m65[0m[39m:     [0m[39mval_hi = hi*ivln10hi;[0m                                                       [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m66[0m[39m:     [0m[39mdk = k;[0m                                                                     [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m67[0m[39m:     [0m[39my = dk*log10_2hi;[0m                                                           [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m68[0m[39m:     [0m[39mval_lo = dk*log10_2lo + [0m[1;39m([0m[39mlo+hi[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m*ivln10lo + lo*ivln10hi;[0m                     [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m69[0m[39m:     [0m[35m/[0m[39m*[0m                                                                          [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m70[0m[39m:     [0m[39m * Extra precision in for adding y is not strictly needed[0m                   [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m71[0m[39m:     [0m[39m * since there is no very large cancellation near x = [0m[1;35msqrt[0m[1;39m([0m[1;36m2[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m or[0m            [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m72[0m[39m:     [0m[39m * x = [0m[1;36m1[0m[39m/[0m[1;35msqrt[0m[1;39m([0m[1;36m2[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m, but we do it anyway since it costs little on CPUs[0m         [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m73[0m[39m:     [0m[39m * with some parallelism and it reduces the error for many args.[0m            [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m74[0m[39m:     [0m[39m *[0m[35m/[0m                                                                         [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m75[0m[39m:     [0m[39mw = y + val_hi;[0m                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m76[0m[39m:     [0m[39mval_lo += [0m[1;39m([0m[39my - w[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m + val_hi;[0m                                                 [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m77[0m[39m:     [0m[39mval_hi = w;[0m                                                                 [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m78[0m[39m:     [0m[39mreturn val_lo + val_hi;[0m                                                     [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m79[0m[39m:[0m[1;39m}[0m                                                                                [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m```[0m                                                                                 [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m<[0m[35m/[0m[95mcode[0m[39m>[0m                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m<code>[0m                                                                              [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39msrc/fmt.[0m[1;92mc:81[0m[39m-[0m[1;36m105[0m                                                                    [2m                [0m

[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m84[0m[39m:[0m                                                                                 [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m85[0m[39m:  if [0m[1;39m([0m[39mexponent > [0m[1;36m0[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m [0m[1;39m{[0m                                                            [2m                [0m

[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m89[0m[39m:  [0m[1;39m}[0m[39m else if [0m[1;39m([0m[39mexponent < [0m[1;36m0[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m [0m[1;39m{[0m                                                     [2m                [0m

[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m300[0m[39m:      [0m[1;39m}[0m[39m else if [0m[1;39m([0m[39mc == [0m[32m'm'[0m[39m || c == [0m[32m'M'[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m [0m[1;39m{[0m                                        [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m301[0m[39m:        mg_pm_t f = [0m[1;35mva_arg[0m[1;39m([0m[39m*ap, mg_pm_t[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m;[0m                                       [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m302[0m[39m:        if [0m[1;39m([0m[39mc == [0m[32m'm'[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m [0m[1;35mout[0m[1;39m([0m[32m'"'[0m[39m, param[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m;[0m                                          [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m303[0m[39m:        n += [0m[1;35mf[0m[1;39m([0m[39mout, param, ap[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m;[0m                                                 [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m304[0m[39m:        if [0m[1;39m([0m[39mc == [0m[32m'm'[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m n += [0m[1;36m2[0m[39m, [0m[1;35mout[0m[1;39m([0m[32m'"'[0m[39m, param[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m;[0m                                  [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m305[0m[39m:      [0m[1;39m}[0m[39m else if [0m[1;39m([0m[39mc == [0m[32m'c'[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m [0m[1;39m{[0m                                                    [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m306[0m[39m:        int ch = [0m[1;35mva_arg[0m[1;39m([0m[39m*ap, int[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m;[0m                                              [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m307[0m[39m:        [0m[1;35mout[0m[1;39m([0m[1;39m([0m[39mchar[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m ch, param[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m;[0m                                                  [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m308[0m[39m:        n++;[0m                                                                    [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m309[0m[39m:      [0m[1;39m}[0m[39m else if [0m[1;39m([0m[39mc == [0m[32m's'[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m [0m[1;39m{[0m                                                    [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m310[0m[39m:        char *p = [0m[1;35mva_arg[0m[1;39m([0m[39m*ap, char *[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m;[0m                                          [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m311[0m[39m:        if [0m[1;39m([0m[39mpr == ~0U[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m pr = p == NULL ? [0m[1;36m0[0m[39m : [0m[1;35mstrlen[0m[1;39m([0m[39mp[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m;[0m                          [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m312[0m[39m:        for [0m[1;39m([0m[39mj = [0m[1;36m0[0m[39m; !minus && pr < w && j + pr < w; j++[0m[1;39m)[0m                        [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m313[0m[39m:          n += [0m[1;35mscpy[0m[1;39m([0m[39mout, param, &pad, [0m[1;36m1[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m;[0m                                       [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m314[0m[39m:        n += [0m[1;35mscpy[0m[1;39m([0m[39mout, param, p, pr[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m;[0m                                           [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m315[0m[39m:        for [0m[1;39m([0m[39mj = [0m[1;36m0[0m[39m; minus && pr < w && j + pr < w; j++[0m[1;39m)[0m                         [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m316[0m[39m:          n += [0m[1;35mscpy[0m[1;39m([0m[39mout, param, &pad, [0m[1;36m1[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m;[0m                                       [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m317[0m[39m:      [0m[1;39m}[0m[39m else if [0m[1;39m([0m[39mc == [0m[32m'e'[0m[39m || c == [0m[32m'E'[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m [0m[1;39m{[0m                                        [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m318[0m[39m:    [0m[39m        [0m[39m  char tmp[0m[1;39m[[0m[1;36m8[0m[1;39m][0m[39m;[0m                                                      [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m319[0m[39m:          double d = [0m[1;35mva_arg[0m[1;39m([0m[39m*ap, double[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m;[0m                                       [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m320[0m[39m:          int64_t exponent = [0m[1;39m([0m[39mint64_t[0m[1;39m)[0m[1;35mlog10[0m[1;39m([0m[1;35mmy_fabs[0m[1;39m([0m[39md[0m[1;39m)[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m;[0m                        [2m                [0m

[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m339[0m[39m:    [0m[1;39m}[0m                                                                           [2m                [0m

[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m341[0m[39m:  return n;[0m                                                                     [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m342[0m[39m:[0m[1;39m}[0m                                                                               [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m```[0m                                                                                 [2m                [0m

[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m33[0m[39m:                  p == NULL ? file : p + [0m[1;36m1[0m[39m, line, fname[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m;[0m                        [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m34[0m[39m:  if [0m[1;39m([0m[39mn > [0m[1;35msizeof[0m[1;39m([0m[39mbuf[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m - [0m[1;36m2[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m n = [0m[1;35msizeof[0m[1;39m([0m[39mbuf[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m - [0m[1;36m2[0m[39m;[0m                                  [2m                [0m
