[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m32[0m[39m:  n = [0m[1;35mmg_snprintf[0m[1;39m([0m[39mbuf, [0m[1;35msizeof[0m[1;39m([0m[39mbuf[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m, [0m[32m"%-6llx %d %s:%d:%s"[0m[39m, [0m[1;35mmg_millis[0m[1;39m([0m[1;39m)[0m[39m, level,[0m    [2m                [0m

[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m34[0m[39m:  if [0m[1;39m([0m[39mn > [0m[1;35msizeof[0m[1;39m([0m[39mbuf[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m - [0m[1;36m2[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m n = [0m[1;35msizeof[0m[1;39m([0m[39mbuf[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m - [0m[1;36m2[0m[39m;[0m                                  [2m                [0m

[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m33[0m[39m:#define [0m[1;35mMG_ERROR[0m[1;39m([0m[39margs[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m [0m[1;35mMG_LOG[0m[1;39m([0m[39mMG_LL_ERROR, args[0m[1;39m)[0m                                 [2m                [0m

[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m138[0m[39m:static size_t [0m[1;35mmg_dtoa[0m[1;39m([0m[39mchar *dst, size_t dstlen, double d, int width, bool tz[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m [0m[1;39m{[0m [2m                [0m

[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m141[0m[39m:  double t, mul, saved;[0m                                                         [2m                [0m

[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m146[0m[39m:[0m                                                                                [2m                [0m

[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m148[0m[39m:  saved = d;[0m                                                                    [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m149[0m[39m:  if [0m[1;39m([0m[39mtz[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m [0m[1;39m{[0m                                                                     [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m150[0m[39m:    mul = [0m[1;36m1.0[0m[39m;[0m                                                                  [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m151[0m[39m:    while [0m[1;39m([0m[39md >= [0m[1;36m10.0[0m[39m && d [0m[35m/[0m[39m mul >= [0m[1;36m10.0[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m mul *= [0m[1;36m10.0[0m[39m;[0m                           [2m                [0m

[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m153[0m[39m:    mul = [0m[1;36m0.1[0m[39m;[0m                                                                  [2m                [0m

[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m155[0m[39m:[0m                                                                                [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m156[0m[39m:  while [0m[1;39m([0m[39md <= [0m[1;36m1.0[0m[39m && d [0m[35m/[0m[39m mul <= [0m[1;36m1.0[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m mul [0m[35m/[0m[39m= [0m[1;36m10.0[0m[39m;[0m                               [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m157[0m[39m:  for [0m[1;39m([0m[39mi = [0m[1;36m0[0m[39m, t = mul * [0m[1;36m5[0m[39m; i < width; i++[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m t [0m[35m/[0m[39m= [0m[1;36m10.0[0m[39m;[0m                           [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m158[0m[39m:[0m                                                                                [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m159[0m[39m:  d += t;[0m                                                                       [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m160[0m[39m:[0m                                                                                [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m161[0m[39m:  [0m[35m/[0m[35m/[0m[39m Calculate exponent, and [0m[32m'mul'[0m[39m for scientific representation[0m                [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m162[0m[39m:  mul = [0m[1;36m1.0[0m[39m;[0m                                                                    [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m163[0m[39m:  while [0m[1;39m([0m[39md >= [0m[1;36m10.0[0m[39m && d [0m[35m/[0m[39m mul >= [0m[1;36m10.0[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m mul *= [0m[1;36m10.0[0m[39m, e++;[0m                        [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m164[0m[39m:  while [0m[1;39m([0m[39md < [0m[1;36m1.0[0m[39m && d [0m[35m/[0m[39m mul < [0m[1;36m1.0[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m mul [0m[35m/[0m[39m= [0m[1;36m10.0[0m[39m, e--;[0m                            [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m165[0m[39m:  [0m[35m/[0m[35m/[0m[39m [0m[1;35mprintf[0m[1;39m([0m[32m" --> %g %d %g %g\n"[0m[39m, saved, e, t, mul[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m;[0m                            [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m166[0m[39m:[0m                                                                                [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m167[0m[39m:  if [0m[1;39m([0m[39mtz && e >= width && width > [0m[1;36m1[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m [0m[1;39m{[0m                                          [2m                [0m

[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m170[0m[39m:    n += [0m[1;35maddexp[0m[1;39m([0m[39mbuf + s + n, e, [0m[32m'+'[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m;[0m                                           [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m171[0m[39m:    return [0m[1;35mmg_snprintf[0m[1;39m([0m[39mdst, dstlen, [0m[32m"%.*s"[0m[39m, n, buf[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m;[0m                            [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m172[0m[39m:  [0m[1;39m}[0m[39m else if [0m[1;39m([0m[39mtz && e <= -width && width > [0m[1;36m1[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m [0m[1;39m{[0m                                  [2m                [0m

[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m175[0m[39m:    n += [0m[1;35maddexp[0m[1;39m([0m[39mbuf + s + n, -e, [0m[32m'-'[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m;[0m                                          [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m176[0m[39m:    return [0m[1;35mmg_snprintf[0m[1;39m([0m[39mdst, dstlen, [0m[32m"%.*s"[0m[39m, n, buf[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m;[0m                            [2m                [0m

[2;36m                    [0m         [39m```[0m                                                                                 [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m<[0m[35m/[0m[95mcode[0m[39m>[0m                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m<code>[0m                                                                              [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39msrc/fmt.[0m[1;92mc:107[0m[39m-[0m[1;36m117[0m                                                                   [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m```[0m                                                                                 [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m107[0m[39m:static int [0m[1;35maddexp[0m[1;39m([0m[39mchar *buf, int e, int sign[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m [0m[1;39m{[0m                                 [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m108[0m[39m:  int n = [0m[1;36m0[0m[39m;[0m                                                                    [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m109[0m[39m:  buf[0m[1;39m[[0m[39mn++[0m[1;39m][0m[39m = [0m[32m'e'[0m[39m;[0m                                                               [2m                [0m

[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m111[0m[39m:  if [0m[1;39m([0m[39me > [0m[1;36m400[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m return [0m[1;36m0[0m[39m;[0m                                                        [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m112[0m[39m:  if [0m[1;39m([0m[39me < [0m[1;36m10[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m buf[0m[1;39m[[0m[39mn++[0m[1;39m][0m[39m = [0m[32m'0'[0m[39m;[0m                                                   [2m                [0m

[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m290[0m[39m:        [0m[1;39m}[0m                                                                       [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m291[0m[39m:        for [0m[1;39m([0m[39mj = [0m[1;36m0[0m[39m; j < xl && w > [0m[1;36m0[0m[39m; j++[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m w--;[0m                                  [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m292[0m[39m:        for [0m[1;39m([0m[39mj = [0m[1;36m0[0m[39m; pad == [0m[32m' '[0m[39m && !minus && k < w && j + k < w; j++[0m[1;39m)[0m            [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m293[0m[39m:          n += [0m[1;35mscpy[0m[1;39m([0m[39mout, param, &pad, [0m[1;36m1[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m;[0m                                       [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m294[0m[39m:        n += [0m[1;35mscpy[0m[1;39m([0m[39mout, param, [0m[1;39m([0m[39mchar *[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m [0m[32m"0x"[0m[39m, xl[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m;[0m                               [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m295[0m[39m:        for [0m[1;39m([0m[39mj = [0m[1;36m0[0m[39m; pad == [0m[32m'0'[0m[39m && k < w && j + k < w; j++[0m[1;39m)[0m                      [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m296[0m[39m:          n += [0m[1;35mscpy[0m[1;39m([0m[39mout, param, &pad, [0m[1;36m1[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m;[0m                                       [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m297[0m[39m:        n += [0m[1;35mscpy[0m[1;39m([0m[39mout, param, tmp, k[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m;[0m                                          [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m298[0m[39m:        for [0m[1;39m([0m[39mj = [0m[1;36m0[0m[39m; pad == [0m[32m' '[0m[39m && minus && k < w && j + k < w; j++[0m[1;39m)[0m             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m299[0m[39m:          n += [0m[1;35mscpy[0m[1;39m([0m[39mout, param, &pad, [0m[1;36m1[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m;[0m                                       [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m```[0m                                                                                 [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m<[0m[35m/[0m[95mcode[0m[39m>[0m                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m<code>[0m                                                                              [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39msrc/fmt.[0m[1;92mc:317[0m[39m-[0m[1;36m327[0m                                                                   [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m```[0m                                                                                 [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m317[0m[39m:      [0m[1;39m}[0m[39m else if [0m[1;39m([0m[39mc == [0m[32m'e'[0m[39m || c == [0m[32m'E'[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m [0m[1;39m{[0m                                        [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m318[0m[39m:    [0m[39m        [0m[39m  char tmp[0m[1;39m[[0m[1;36m8[0m[1;39m][0m[39m;[0m                                                      [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m319[0m[39m:          double d = [0m[1;35mva_arg[0m[1;39m([0m[39m*ap, double[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m;[0m                                       [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m320[0m[39m:          int64_t exponent = [0m[1;39m([0m[39mint64_t[0m[1;39m)[0m[1;35mlog10[0m[1;39m([0m[1;35mmy_fabs[0m[1;39m([0m[39md[0m[1;39m)[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m;[0m                        [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m321[0m[39m:          double mantissa = d [0m[35m/[0m[39m [0m[1;35mpower[0m[1;39m([0m[1;36m10[0m[39m, exponent[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m;[0m                            [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m322[0m[39m:          k = [0m[1;35mmg_dtoa[0m[1;39m([0m[39mtmp, [0m[1;36m10[0m[39m, mantissa, [0m[1;36m8[0m[39m, c == [0m[32m'e'[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m;[0m                          [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m323[0m[39m:          n += [0m[1;35mscpy[0m[1;39m([0m[39mout, param, tmp, k[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m;[0m                                        [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m324[0m[39m:          [0m[1;35mout[0m[1;39m([0m[39mc, param[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m;[0m                                                        [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m325[0m[39m:          n++;[0m                                                                  [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m326[0m[39m:    [0m[39m        [0m[39m  k = [0m[1;35mmg_lld[0m[1;39m([0m[39mtmp, exponent, [0m[1;36m1[0m[39m, [0m[1;36m0[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m;[0m                                  [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m327[0m[39m:          n += [0m[1;35mscpy[0m[1;39m([0m[39mout, param, tmp, k[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m;[0m                                        [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m```[0m                                                                                 [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m<[0m[35m/[0m[95mcode[0m[39m>[0m                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m<[0m[35m/[0m[95mcode_snippets[0m[39m>[0m                                                                    [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m## Fix Strategy[0m                                                                     [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m<fix_strategy>[0m                                                                      [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m## Analysis of the Issue[0m                                                            [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mAfter analyzing the evaluation report and code snippets, I can identify the root [0m   [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mcause and develop a comprehensive fix strategy:[0m                                     [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m### Root Cause[0m                                                                      [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mThe stack-buffer-overflow occurs in the [0m[32m'e'[0m[35m/[0m[32m'E'[0m[39m format specifier case in [0m           [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m`src/fmt.c` at lines [0m[1;36m317[0m[39m-[0m[1;36m327[0m[39m. The specific issues are:[0m                              [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m1[0m[39m. **Insufficient buffer size**: Line [0m[1;36m318[0m[39m declares `char tmp[0m[1;39m[[0m[1;36m8[0m[1;39m][0m[39m` with only [0m[1;36m8[0m[39m bytes[0m  [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m2[0m[39m. **Incorrect buffer size parameter**: Line [0m[1;36m322[0m[39m passes hardcoded `[0m[1;36m10[0m[39m` to `mg_dtoa`[0m [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39minstead of the actual buffer size[0m                                                   [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m3[0m[39m. **Unbounded write in mg_lld**: Line [0m[1;36m326[0m[39m calls `mg_lld` which has no buffer size [0m [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mparameter and can write up to [0m[1;36m21[0m[39m bytes for large int64_t exponent values[0m            [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m4[0m[39m. **Buffer reuse without adequate space**: The same [0m[1;36m8[0m[39m-byte buffer is reused for [0m   [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mboth mantissa [0m[1;39m([0m[39mvia `mg_dtoa`[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m and exponent [0m[1;39m([0m[39mvia `mg_lld`[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m operations[0m                [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m### Why the Previous Patch Failed[0m                                                   [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mThe previous patch attempted to fix this by changing line [0m[1;36m318[0m[39m to `char tmp[0m[1;39m[[0m[1;36m40[0m[1;39m][0m[39m` and[0m [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mline [0m[1;36m322[0m[39m to use `[0m[1;35msizeof[0m[1;39m([0m[39mtmp[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m`. However, the post-patch stack trace still shows [0m     [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m`tmp371` at [0m[1;39m[[0m[1;36m112[0m[39m, [0m[1;36m120[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m with only [0m[1;36m8[0m[39m bytes, indicating the patch was not successfully[0m [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mapplied to the compiled binary. The error persists with identical characteristics, [0m [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mconfirming the fix did not take effect.[0m                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m### Analysis of Code Patterns[0m                                                       [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mExamining the working [0m[32m'd'[0m[35m/[0m[32m'u'[0m[35m/[0m[32m'x'[0m[35m/[0m[32m'X'[0m[35m/[0m[32m'p'[0m[35m/[0m[32m'g'[0m[35m/[0m[32m'f'[0m[39m format specifier case at lines [0m   [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m272[0m[39m-[0m[1;36m299[0m[39m reveals the correct pattern:[0m                                                [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m- Uses `char tmp[0m[1;39m[[0m[1;36m40[0m[1;39m][0m[39m` [0m[1;39m([0m[39mline [0m[1;36m275[0m[1;39m)[0m                                                    [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m- Passes `[0m[1;35msizeof[0m[1;39m([0m[39mtmp[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m` to `mg_dtoa` [0m[1;39m([0m[39mline [0m[1;36m280[0m[1;39m)[0m                                      [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m- Provides sufficient space for both `mg_dtoa` and `mg_lld` operations[0m              [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mThe [0m[32m'e'[0m[35m/[0m[32m'E'[0m[39m case should follow this same pattern for consistency and safety.[0m        [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m### Buffer Size Requirements[0m                                                        [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m- `mg_dtoa` can produce up to ~[0m[1;36m30[0m[39m bytes [0m[1;39m([0m[39msign + digits + decimal point[0m[1;39m)[0m             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m- `mg_lld` can write up to [0m[1;36m21[0m[39m bytes [0m[1;39m([0m[39msign + up to [0m[1;36m20[0m[39m digits for int64_t max value[0m[1;39m)[0m  [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m- A [0m[1;36m40[0m[39m-byte buffer provides adequate space for both operations with safety margin[0m   [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m## Fix Strategy[0m                                                                     [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m### Changes to Apply [0m[1;39m([0m[39mfrom initial codebase[0m[1;39m)[0m                                        [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m**File: src/fmt.c**[0m                                                                 [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m**Location [0m[1;36m1[0m[39m: Line [0m[1;36m318[0m[39m**[0m                                                            [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m- Current: `char tmp[0m[1;39m[[0m[1;36m8[0m[1;39m][0m[39m;`[0m                                                           [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m- Change to: `char tmp[0m[1;39m[[0m[1;36m40[0m[1;39m][0m[39m;`[0m                                                        [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m- Rationale: Increase buffer size from [0m[1;36m8[0m[39m to [0m[1;36m40[0m[39m bytes to match the pattern used in [0m  [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mlines [0m[1;36m275[0m[39m for other format specifiers[0m                                               [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m**Location [0m[1;36m2[0m[39m: Line [0m[1;36m322[0m[39m**[0m                                                            [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m- Current: `k = [0m[1;35mmg_dtoa[0m[1;39m([0m[39mtmp, [0m[1;36m10[0m[39m, mantissa, [0m[1;36m8[0m[39m, c == [0m[32m'e'[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m;`[0m                           [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m- Change to: `k = [0m[1;35mmg_dtoa[0m[1;39m([0m[39mtmp, [0m[1;35msizeof[0m[1;39m([0m[39mtmp[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m, mantissa, [0m[1;36m8[0m[39m, c == [0m[32m'e'[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m;`[0m                [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m- Rationale: Replace hardcoded `[0m[1;36m10[0m[39m` with `[0m[1;35msizeof[0m[1;39m([0m[39mtmp[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m` [0m[1;39m([0m[39mwhich will be [0m[1;36m40[0m[39m after the [0m [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mfirst change[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m to correctly inform `mg_dtoa` of the actual buffer size[0m               [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m### Implementation Steps[0m                                                            [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m1[0m[39m. Modify line [0m[1;36m318[0m[39m in `src/fmt.c` to increase the buffer size from [0m[1;36m8[0m[39m to [0m[1;36m40[0m[39m bytes[0m    [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m2[0m[39m. Modify line [0m[1;36m322[0m[39m in `src/fmt.c` to replace the hardcoded buffer size parameter [0m   [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mwith `[0m[1;35msizeof[0m[1;39m([0m[39mtmp[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m`[0m                                                                  [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m3[0m[39m. Ensure the changes are applied to the [0m[32m'e'[0m[35m/[0m[32m'E'[0m[39m format specifier case within the [0m  [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m`mg_vxprintf` function[0m                                                              [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m### Why This Fix is Optimal[0m                                                         [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m1[0m[39m. **Consistency**: Matches the buffer size and pattern used for other format [0m      [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mspecifiers [0m[1;39m([0m[39mlines [0m[1;36m272[0m[39m-[0m[1;36m299[0m[1;39m)[0m                                                          [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m2[0m[39m. **Safety**: Provides adequate space for both `mg_dtoa` [0m[1;39m([0m[39mup to ~[0m[1;36m30[0m[39m bytes[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m and [0m    [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m`mg_lld` [0m[1;39m([0m[39mup to [0m[1;36m21[0m[39m bytes[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m operations[0m                                                [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m3[0m[39m. **Correctness**: Eliminates the mismatch between declared buffer size [0m[1;39m([0m[1;36m8[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m and [0m   [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mthe size parameter passed to `mg_dtoa` [0m[1;39m([0m[1;36m10[0m[1;39m)[0m                                         [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m4[0m[39m. **Minimal change**: Only modifies the buffer declaration and one function [0m       [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mparameter, preserving all existing logic[0m                                            [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m5[0m[39m. **Buffer reuse is safe**: The pattern of outputting mantissa before reusing the [0m [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mbuffer for exponent is valid as long as the buffer is large enough[0m                  [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m### How It Addresses the Issues[0m                                                     [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m1[0m[39m. **Stack-buffer-overflow**: The [0m[1;36m40[0m[39m-byte buffer provides sufficient space for [0m     [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m`mg_lld` to write exponent values without overflowing[0m                               [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m2[0m[39m. **Parameter mismatch**: Using `[0m[1;35msizeof[0m[1;39m([0m[39mtmp[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m` ensures `mg_dtoa` receives the [0m      [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mcorrect buffer size[0m                                                                 [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m3[0m[39m. **Consistency**: Aligns with established patterns in the codebase for similar [0m   [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mformat specifiers[0m                                                                   [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m4[0m[39m. **Edge cases**: Handles large exponent values [0m[1;39m([0m[39mup to ±[0m[1;36m308[0m[39m for double range[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m [0m     [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mwhich require up to [0m[1;36m4[0m[39m bytes, plus safety margin[0m                                     [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m### Potential Side Effects and Mitigation[0m                                           [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m1[0m[39m. **Increased stack usage**: The change increases stack usage by [0m[1;36m32[0m[39m bytes [0m[1;39m([0m[39mfrom [0m[1;36m8[0m[39m [0m [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mto [0m[1;36m40[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m per [0m[32m'e'[0m[35m/[0m[32m'E'[0m[39m format specifier[0m                                                 [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m   - Mitigation: This is acceptable as it matches the stack usage of other format [0m  [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mspecifiers and is still a small local variable[0m                                      [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m   [0m                                                                                 [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m2[0m[39m. **No functional changes**: The logic remains identical, only the buffer size [0m    [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mchanges[0m                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m   - Mitigation: No additional testing needed beyond verifying the overflow is [0m     [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mresolved[0m                                                                            [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m

[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m

[2;36m                    [0m         [35m/tmp/[0m[95mtmp6oxomw4r[0m[39m:[0m[35m/[0m[95mtestcase[0m[39m -t ghcr.io/aixcc-finals/base-runner:v1.[0m[1;36m3.0[0m[39m reproduce [0m    [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mfuzz -[0m[33mruns[0m[39m=[0m[1;36m100[0m[39m.[0m                                                                     [2m                [0m

[2;36m                    [0m         [39m===Evaluation [0m[33mReport[0m[39m===[0m                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m# Evaluation Report[0m                                                                 [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m## Summary[0m                                                                          [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mThe initial issue reports a stack-buffer-overflow vulnerability detected by [0m        [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mAddressSanitizer during fuzzing of the Mongoose HTTP library. The overflow occurs [0m  [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mwhen writing [0m[1;36m1[0m[39m byte at offset [0m[1;36m120[0m[39m in a stack frame, overflowing a variable `tmp371`[0m [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mat line [0m[1;36m319[0m[39m of `src/fmt.c` with a size of only [0m[1;36m8[0m[39m bytes [0m[1;39m([0m[39mrange [0m[1;39m[[0m[1;36m112[0m[39m, [0m[1;36m120[0m[1;39m)[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m. The [0m     [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mpatch attempt increases the size of a different buffer [0m[1;39m([0m[39m`tmp` for the [0m[32m'e'[0m[39m or [0m[32m'E'[0m[39m [0m   [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mformat case[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m from [0m[1;36m8[0m[39m to [0m[1;36m40[0m[39m bytes and fixes the corresponding size parameter passed [0m  [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mto `[0m[1;35mmg_dtoa[0m[1;39m([0m[1;39m)[0m[39m`. However, after applying the patch, the same stack-buffer-overflow [0m  [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39merror persists with identical characteristics, indicating that the patch did not [0m   [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39maddress the root cause of the vulnerability.[0m                                        [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m## Description[0m                                                                      [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m### Initial Issue Analysis[0m                                                          [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mThe AddressSanitizer error report reveals a stack-buffer-overflow occurring during [0m [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mthe execution of a fuzzer test. Key observations from the initial issue:[0m            [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m1[0m[39m. **Error Location**: The overflow occurs at address `[0m[1;36m0x7f65cf76fb78[0m[39m` with a WRITE[0m [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mof size [0m[1;36m1[0m                                                                           [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m2[0m[39m. **Call Stack**: The overflow is triggered through the following sequence:[0m        [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m   - `LLVMFuzzerTestOneInput` → `mg_http_parse` → `mg_log` → `mg_vxprintf` → [0m       [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m`mg_dtoa` → `mg_snprintf` → `mg_vsnprintf` → `mg_vxprintf.specialized.[0m[1;36m2[0m[39m` → `scpy` →[0m [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m`mg_putchar_iobuf_static` → `mg_pfn_iobuf_private`[0m                                  [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m3[0m[39m. **Frame Analysis**: The problematic frame is in `mg_vxprintf` at `src/fmt.[0m[1;92mc:247[0m[39m`[0m [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mcontaining:[0m                                                                         [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m   - `tmp` variable at [0m[1;39m[[0m[1;36m32[0m[39m, [0m[1;36m72[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m - [0m[1;36m40[0m[39m bytes at line [0m[1;36m276[0m                              [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m   - `tmp371` variable at [0m[1;39m[[0m[1;36m112[0m[39m, [0m[1;36m120[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m - [0m[1;36m8[0m[39m bytes at line [0m[1;36m319[0m                          [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m4[0m[39m. **Overflow Details**: Memory access at offset [0m[1;36m120[0m[39m overflows the `tmp371` [0m        [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mvariable, writing [0m[1;36m1[0m[39m byte beyond its allocated [0m[1;36m8[0m[39m-byte boundary[0m                       [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m### Patch Attempt Details[0m                                                           [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mThe patch modifies the handling of the [0m[32m'e'[0m[39m or [0m[32m'E'[0m[39m format specifier case in [0m         [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m`src/fmt.c`:[0m                                                                        [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m**Changes made**:[0m                                                                   [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m1[0m[39m. Line [0m[1;36m318[0m[39m: Changed `char tmp[0m[1;39m[[0m[1;36m8[0m[1;39m][0m[39m;` to `char tmp[0m[1;39m[[0m[1;36m40[0m[1;39m][0m[39m;` - increasing buffer size [0m    [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mfrom [0m[1;36m8[0m[39m to [0m[1;36m40[0m[39m bytes[0m                                                                  [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m2[0m[39m. Line [0m[1;36m322[0m[39m: Changed `k = [0m[1;35mmg_dtoa[0m[1;39m([0m[39mtmp, [0m[1;36m10[0m[39m, mantissa, [0m[1;36m8[0m[39m, c == [0m[32m'e'[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m;` to `k = [0m        [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;35mmg_dtoa[0m[1;39m([0m[39mtmp, [0m[1;35msizeof[0m[1;39m([0m[39mtmp[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m, mantissa, [0m[1;36m8[0m[39m, c == [0m[32m'e'[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m;` - using `[0m[1;35msizeof[0m[1;39m([0m[39mtmp[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m` instead of[0m [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mhardcoded value [0m[1;36m10[0m                                                                  [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m**Location**: The patch targets lines [0m[1;36m315[0m[39m-[0m[1;36m325[0m[39m in the [0m[32m'e'[0m[39m or [0m[32m'E'[0m[39m format case within [0m [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mthe `mg_vxprintf` function.[0m                                                         [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m### Post-Patch Analysis[0m                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mAfter applying the patch, the fuzzer produces an identical error:[0m                   [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m1[0m[39m. **Same Error Pattern**: Stack-buffer-overflow with WRITE of size [0m[1;36m1[0m[39m at offset [0m[1;36m120[0m [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m2[0m[39m. **Same Variable**: The overflow still affects `tmp371` at line [0m[1;36m319[0m[39m, range [0m[1;39m[[0m[1;36m112[0m[39m, [0m [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m120[0m[1;39m)[0m                                                                                [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m3[0m[39m. **Same Call Stack**: The execution path remains identical[0m                        [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m4[0m[39m. **Same Frame Layout**: Both `tmp` at [0m[1;39m[[0m[1;36m32[0m[39m, [0m[1;36m72[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m and `tmp371` at [0m[1;39m[[0m[1;36m112[0m[39m, [0m[1;36m120[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m are [0m    [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mstill present with the same offsets[0m                                                 [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mThe patch did not resolve the issue because:[0m                                        [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m- The overflow occurs in `tmp371` [0m[1;39m([0m[1;36m8[0m[39m bytes at line [0m[1;36m319[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m, not in the `tmp` variable [0m [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mmodified by the patch[0m                                                               [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m- The frame analysis shows `tmp` at line [0m[1;36m276[0m[39m [0m[1;39m([0m[39malready [0m[1;36m40[0m[39m bytes in the original [0m     [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mcode[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m and `tmp371` at line [0m[1;36m319[0m[39m as separate variables[0m                                [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m- The patch modified the wrong buffer variable[0m                                      [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m### Areas Requiring Further Investigation[0m                                           [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mTo fully understand and resolve this vulnerability, the following areas should be [0m  [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39minvestigated:[0m                                                                       [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m1[0m[39m. **Line [0m[1;36m319[0m[39m in src/fmt.c**: Examine the code at this specific line where `tmp371`[0m [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mis declared and determine its intended use and why it's only [0m[1;36m8[0m[39m bytes[0m                [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m2[0m[39m. **The mg_dtoa Function**: Review the implementation in `src/fmt.c` to [0m           [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39munderstand:[0m                                                                         [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m   - How it writes to the output buffer[0m                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m   - What the size parameters control[0m                                               [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m   - Whether it's being called with correct buffer sizes at line [0m[1;36m323[0m[39m [0m[1;39m([0m[39mmentioned in [0m [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mthe call stack[0m[1;39m)[0m                                                                     [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m3[0m[39m. **Multiple Format Cases**: Since line [0m[1;36m315[0m[39m shows the [0m[32m'e'[0m[35m/[0m[32m'E'[0m[39m case but line [0m[1;36m319[0m[39m is[0m [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39moutside this block, investigate what format specifier case contains line [0m[1;36m319[0m[39m and [0m   [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mthe `tmp371` variable[0m                                                               [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m4[0m[39m. **The scpy Function**: Examine the implementation at `src/fmt.[0m[1;92mc:233[0m[39m` to [0m         [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39munderstand how it performs buffer writes and whether it properly respects buffer [0m   [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mboundaries[0m                                                                          [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m5[0m[39m. **mg_vxprintf Function Structure**: Review the entire function [0m[1;39m([0m[39mstarting at line[0m [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m247[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m to understand:[0m                                                                 [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m   - How many temporary buffers are used[0m                                            [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m   - The relationship between different format specifier cases[0m                      [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m   - Whether buffer sizes are consistently validated[0m                                [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mThe discrepancy between the patched code [0m[1;39m([0m[39mtargeting a `tmp` buffer[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m and the actual [0m [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39moverflow location [0m[1;39m([0m[39m`tmp371`[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m suggests that either multiple similar buffer overflow [0m [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mvulnerabilities exist in the code, or the patch targeted an incorrect location [0m     [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mbased on misidentification of the vulnerable buffer.[0m                                [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m## Initial Issue Log[0m                                                                [2m                [0m

[2;36m                    [0m         [39msrc/fmt.[0m[1;92mc:317[0m[39m-[0m[1;36m327[0m                                                                   [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m```[0m                                                                                 [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m317[0m[39m:      [0m[1;39m}[0m[39m else if [0m[1;39m([0m[39mc == [0m[32m'e'[0m[39m || c == [0m[32m'E'[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m [0m[1;39m{[0m                                        [2m                [0m

[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m324[0m[39m:          [0m[1;35mout[0m[1;39m([0m[39mc, param[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m;[0m                                                        [2m                [0m

[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m326[0m[39m:    [0m[39m        [0m[39m  k = [0m[1;35mmg_lld[0m[1;39m([0m[39mtmp, exponent, [0m[1;36m1[0m[39m, [0m[1;36m0[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m;[0m                                  [2m                [0m

[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m291[0m[39m:        for [0m[1;39m([0m[39mj = [0m[1;36m0[0m[39m; j < xl && w > [0m[1;36m0[0m[39m; j++[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m w--;[0m                                  [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m292[0m[39m:        for [0m[1;39m([0m[39mj = [0m[1;36m0[0m[39m; pad == [0m[32m' '[0m[39m && !minus && k < w && j + k < w; j++[0m[1;39m)[0m            [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m293[0m[39m:          n += [0m[1;35mscpy[0m[1;39m([0m[39mout, param, &pad, [0m[1;36m1[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m;[0m                                       [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m294[0m[39m:        n += [0m[1;35mscpy[0m[1;39m([0m[39mout, param, [0m[1;39m([0m[39mchar *[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m [0m[32m"0x"[0m[39m, xl[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m;[0m                               [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m295[0m[39m:        for [0m[1;39m([0m[39mj = [0m[1;36m0[0m[39m; pad == [0m[32m'0'[0m[39m && k < w && j + k < w; j++[0m[1;39m)[0m                      [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m296[0m[39m:          n += [0m[1;35mscpy[0m[1;39m([0m[39mout, param, &pad, [0m[1;36m1[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m;[0m                                       [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m297[0m[39m:        n += [0m[1;35mscpy[0m[1;39m([0m[39mout, param, tmp, k[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m;[0m                                          [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m298[0m[39m:        for [0m[1;39m([0m[39mj = [0m[1;36m0[0m[39m; pad == [0m[32m' '[0m[39m && minus && k < w && j + k < w; j++[0m[1;39m)[0m             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m299[0m[39m:          n += [0m[1;35mscpy[0m[1;39m([0m[39mout, param, &pad, [0m[1;36m1[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m;[0m                                       [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m```[0m                                                                                 [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m<[0m[35m/[0m[95mcode[0m[39m>[0m                                                                             [2m                [0m

[2;36m                    [0m         [39msrc/fmt.[0m[1;92mc:22[0m[39m-[0m[1;36m79[0m                                                                     [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m```[0m                                                                                 [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;92m22:d[0m[39mouble [0m[1;35mlog10[0m[1;39m([0m[39mdouble x[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m [0m[1;39m{[0m                                                         [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m23[0m[39m:     [0m[39munion [0m[1;39m{[0m[39mdouble f; uint64_t i;[0m[1;39m}[0m[39m u = [0m[1;39m{[0m[39mx[0m[1;39m}[0m[39m;[0m                                      [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m24[0m[39m:     [0m[39mdouble hfsq,f,s,z,R,w,t1,t2,dk,y,hi,lo,val_hi,val_lo;[0m                       [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m25[0m[39m:     [0m[39muint64_t hx;[0m                                                                [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m26[0m[39m:     [0m[39mint k;[0m                                                                      [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m27[0m[39m:     [0m[39mhx = u.i>>[0m[1;36m32[0m[39m;[0m                                                               [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m28[0m[39m:     [0m[39mk = [0m[1;36m0[0m[39m;[0m                                                                      [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m29[0m[39m:     [0m[39mif [0m[1;39m([0m[39mhx < [0m[1;36m0x00100000[0m[39m || hx>>[0m[1;36m31[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m [0m[1;39m{[0m                                            [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m30[0m[39m:     [0m[39m        [0m[39mif [0m[1;39m([0m[39mu.i<<[0m[1;36m1[0m[39m == [0m[1;36m0[0m[1;39m)[0m                                                    [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m31[0m[39m:     [0m[39m        [0m[39m        [0m[39mreturn [0m[1;36m-1[0m[39m/[0m[1;39m([0m[39mx*x[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m;  [0m[35m/[0m[39m* [0m[1;35mlog[0m[1;39m([0m[39m+[0m[1;36m-0[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m=-inf *[0m[35m/[0m                       [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m32[0m[39m:     [0m[39m        [0m[39mif [0m[1;39m([0m[39mhx>>[0m[1;36m31[0m[1;39m)[0m                                                         [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m33[0m[39m:     [0m[39m        [0m[39m        [0m[39mreturn [0m[1;39m([0m[39mx-x[0m[1;39m)[0m[35m/[0m[95m0.0[0m[39m; [0m[35m/[0m[39m* [0m[1;35mlog[0m[1;39m([0m[39m-#[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m = NaN *[0m[35m/[0m                       [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m34[0m[39m:     [0m[39m        [0m[35m/[0m[39m* subnormal number, scale x up *[0m[35m/[0m                                  [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m35[0m[39m:     [0m[39m        [0m[39mk -= [0m[1;36m54[0m[39m;[0m                                                            [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m36[0m[39m:     [0m[39m        [0m[39mx *= [0m[1;36m0x1[0m[39mp54;[0m                                                        [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m37[0m[39m:     [0m[39m        [0m[39mu.f = x;[0m                                                            [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m38[0m[39m:     [0m[39m        [0m[39mhx = u.i>>[0m[1;36m32[0m[39m;[0m                                                       [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m39[0m[39m:     [0m[1;39m}[0m[39m else if [0m[1;39m([0m[39mhx >= [0m[1;36m0x7ff00000[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m [0m[1;39m{[0m                                              [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m40[0m[39m:     [0m[39m        [0m[39mreturn x;[0m                                                           [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m41[0m[39m:     [0m[1;39m}[0m[39m else if [0m[1;39m([0m[39mhx == [0m[1;36m0x3ff00000[0m[39m && u.i<<[0m[1;36m32[0m[39m == [0m[1;36m0[0m[1;39m)[0m                                [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m42[0m[39m:     [0m[39m        [0m[39mreturn [0m[1;36m0[0m[39m;[0m                                                           [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m43[0m[39m:     [0m[35m/[0m[39m* reduce x into [0m[1;39m[[0m[1;35msqrt[0m[1;39m([0m[1;36m2[0m[1;39m)[0m[35m/[0m[95m2[0m[39m, [0m[1;35msqrt[0m[1;39m([0m[1;36m2[0m[1;39m)[0m[1;39m][0m[39m *[0m[35m/[0m                                    [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m44[0m[39m:     [0m[39mhx += [0m[1;36m0x3ff00000[0m[39m - [0m[1;36m0x3fe6a09e[0m[39m;[0m                                              [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m45[0m[39m:     [0m[39mk += [0m[1;39m([0m[39mint[0m[1;39m)[0m[1;39m([0m[39mhx>>[0m[1;36m20[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m - [0m[1;36m0x3ff[0m[39m;[0m                                                 [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m46[0m[39m:     [0m[39mhx = [0m[1;39m([0m[39mhx&[0m[1;36m0x000fffff[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m + [0m[1;36m0x3fe6a09e[0m[39m;[0m                                          [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m47[0m[39m:     [0m[39mu.i = [0m[1;39m([0m[39muint64_t[0m[1;39m)[0m[39mhx<<[0m[1;36m32[0m[39m | [0m[1;39m([0m[39mu.i&[0m[1;36m0xffffffff[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m;[0m                                  [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m48[0m[39m:     [0m[39mx = u.f;[0m                                                                    [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m49[0m[39m:     [0m[39mf = x - [0m[1;36m1.0[0m[39m;[0m                                                                [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m50[0m[39m:     [0m[39mhfsq = [0m[1;36m0.5[0m[39m*f*f;[0m                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m51[0m[39m:     [0m[39ms = f/[0m[1;39m([0m[1;36m2.0[0m[39m+f[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m;[0m                                                              [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m52[0m[39m:     [0m[39mz = s*s;[0m                                                                    [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m53[0m[39m:     [0m[39mw = z*z;[0m                                                                    [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m54[0m[39m:     [0m[39mt1 = w*[0m[1;39m([0m[39mLg2+w*[0m[1;39m([0m[39mLg4+w*Lg6[0m[1;39m)[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m;[0m                                                 [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m55[0m[39m:     [0m[39mt2 = z*[0m[1;39m([0m[39mLg1+w*[0m[1;39m([0m[39mLg3+w*[0m[1;39m([0m[39mLg5+w*Lg7[0m[1;39m)[0m[1;39m)[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m;[0m                                         [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m56[0m[39m:     [0m[39mR = t2 + t1;[0m                                                                [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m57[0m[39m:     [0m[35m/[0m[39m* See log2.c for details. *[0m[35m/[0m                                               [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m58[0m[39m:     [0m[35m/[0m[39m* hi+lo = f - hfsq + s*[0m[1;39m([0m[39mhfsq+R[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m ~ [0m[1;35mlog[0m[1;39m([0m[1;36m1[0m[39m+f[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m *[0m[35m/[0m                              [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m59[0m[39m:     [0m[39mhi = f - hfsq;[0m                                                              [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m60[0m[39m:     [0m[39mu.f = hi;[0m                                                                   [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m61[0m[39m:     [0m[39mu.i &= [0m[1;39m([0m[39muint64_t[0m[1;39m)[0m[1;36m-1[0m[39m<<[0m[1;36m32[0m[39m;[0m                                                    [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m62[0m[39m:     [0m[39mhi = u.f;[0m                                                                   [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m63[0m[39m:     [0m[39mlo = f - hi - hfsq + s*[0m[1;39m([0m[39mhfsq+R[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m;[0m                                            [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m64[0m[39m:     [0m[35m/[0m[39m* val_hi+val_lo ~ [0m[1;35mlog10[0m[1;39m([0m[1;36m1[0m[39m+f[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m + k*[0m[1;35mlog10[0m[1;39m([0m[1;36m2[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m *[0m[35m/[0m                               [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m65[0m[39m:     [0m[39mval_hi = hi*ivln10hi;[0m                                                       [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m66[0m[39m:     [0m[39mdk = k;[0m                                                                     [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m67[0m[39m:     [0m[39my = dk*log10_2hi;[0m                                                           [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m68[0m[39m:     [0m[39mval_lo = dk*log10_2lo + [0m[1;39m([0m[39mlo+hi[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m*ivln10lo + lo*ivln10hi;[0m                     [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m69[0m[39m:     [0m[35m/[0m[39m*[0m                                                                          [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m70[0m[39m:     [0m[39m * Extra precision in for adding y is not strictly needed[0m                   [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m71[0m[39m:     [0m[39m * since there is no very large cancellation near x = [0m[1;35msqrt[0m[1;39m([0m[1;36m2[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m or[0m            [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m72[0m[39m:     [0m[39m * x = [0m[1;36m1[0m[39m/[0m[1;35msqrt[0m[1;39m([0m[1;36m2[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m, but we do it anyway since it costs little on CPUs[0m         [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m73[0m[39m:     [0m[39m * with some parallelism and it reduces the error for many args.[0m            [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m74[0m[39m:     [0m[39m *[0m[35m/[0m                                                                         [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m75[0m[39m:     [0m[39mw = y + val_hi;[0m                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m76[0m[39m:     [0m[39mval_lo += [0m[1;39m([0m[39my - w[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m + val_hi;[0m                                                 [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m77[0m[39m:     [0m[39mval_hi = w;[0m                                                                 [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m78[0m[39m:     [0m[39mreturn val_lo + val_hi;[0m                                                     [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m79[0m[39m:[0m[1;39m}[0m                                                                                [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m```[0m                                                                                 [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m<[0m[35m/[0m[95mcode[0m[39m>[0m                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m<code>[0m                                                                              [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39msrc/fmt.[0m[1;92mc:81[0m[39m-[0m[1;36m105[0m                                                                    [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m```[0m                                                                                 [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;92m81:d[0m[39mouble [0m[1;35mpower[0m[1;39m([0m[39mdouble base, int64_t exponent[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m [0m[1;39m{[0m                                    [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m82[0m[39m:  double result = [0m[1;36m1.0[0m[39m;[0m                                                           [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m83[0m[39m:  int64_t i;[0m                                                                     [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m84[0m[39m:[0m                                                                                 [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m85[0m[39m:  if [0m[1;39m([0m[39mexponent > [0m[1;36m0[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m [0m[1;39m{[0m                                                            [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m86[0m[39m:    for [0m[1;39m([0m[39mi = [0m[1;36m0[0m[39m; i < exponent; i++[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m [0m[1;39m{[0m                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m87[0m[39m:      result *= base;[0m                                                            [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m88[0m[39m:    [0m[1;39m}[0m                                                                            [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m89[0m[39m:  [0m[1;39m}[0m[39m else if [0m[1;39m([0m[39mexponent < [0m[1;36m0[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m [0m[1;39m{[0m                                                     [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m90[0m[39m:    for [0m[1;39m([0m[39mi = [0m[1;36m0[0m[39m; i < -exponent; i++[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m [0m[1;39m{[0m                                            [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m91[0m[39m:      result [0m[35m/[0m[39m= base;[0m                                                            [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m92[0m[39m:    [0m[1;39m}[0m                                                                            [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m93[0m[39m:  [0m[1;39m}[0m                                                                              [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m94[0m[39m:  [0m[35m/[0m[35m/[0m[39m If exponent is [0m[1;36m0[0m[39m, result remains [0m[1;36m1.0[0m                                        [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m95[0m[39m:[0m                                                                                 [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m96[0m[39m:  return result;[0m                                                                 [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m97[0m[39m:[0m[1;39m}[0m                                                                                [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m98[0m[39m:[0m                                                                                 [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;92m99:d[0m[39mouble [0m[1;35mmy_fabs[0m[1;39m([0m[39mdouble x[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m [0m[1;39m{[0m                                                       [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m100[0m[39m:  if [0m[1;39m([0m[39mx >= [0m[1;36m0[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m [0m[1;39m{[0m                                                                 [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m101[0m[39m:    return x;[0m                                                                   [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m102[0m[39m:  [0m[1;39m}[0m[39m else [0m[1;39m{[0m                                                                      [2m                [0m

[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m104[0m[39m:  [0m[1;39m}[0m                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m105[0m[39m:[0m[1;39m}[0m                                                                               [2m                [0m

[2;36m                    [0m         [39msrc/fmt.[0m[1;92mc:317[0m[39m-[0m[1;36m327[0m                                                                   [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m```[0m                                                                                 [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m317[0m[39m:      [0m[1;39m}[0m[39m else if [0m[1;39m([0m[39mc == [0m[32m'e'[0m[39m || c == [0m[32m'E'[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m [0m[1;39m{[0m                                        [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m318[0m[39m:    [0m[39m        [0m[39m  char tmp[0m[1;39m[[0m[1;36m8[0m[1;39m][0m[39m;[0m                                                      [2m                [0m

[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m320[0m[39m:          int64_t exponent = [0m[1;39m([0m[39mint64_t[0m[1;39m)[0m[1;35mlog10[0m[1;39m([0m[1;35mmy_fabs[0m[1;39m([0m[39md[0m[1;39m)[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m;[0m                        [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m321[0m[39m:          double mantissa = d [0m[35m/[0m[39m [0m[1;35mpower[0m[1;39m([0m[1;36m10[0m[39m, exponent[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m;[0m                            [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m322[0m[39m:          k = [0m[1;35mmg_dtoa[0m[1;39m([0m[39mtmp, [0m[1;36m10[0m[39m, mantissa, [0m[1;36m8[0m[39m, c == [0m[32m'e'[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m;[0m                          [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m323[0m[39m:          n += [0m[1;35mscpy[0m[1;39m([0m[39mout, param, tmp, k[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m;[0m                                        [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m324[0m[39m:          [0m[1;35mout[0m[1;39m([0m[39mc, param[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m;[0m                                                        [2m                [0m

[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m245[0m[39m:size_t [0m[1;35mmg_vxprintf[0m[1;39m([0m[39mvoid [0m[1;39m([0m[39m*out[0m[1;39m)[0m[1;39m([0m[39mchar, void *[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m, void *param, const char *fmt,[0m     [2m                [0m

[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m248[0m[39m:  while [0m[1;39m([0m[39mfmt[0m[1;39m[[0m[39mi[0m[1;39m][0m[39m != [0m[32m'\0'[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m [0m[1;39m{[0m                                                      [2m                [0m

[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m251[0m[39m:      char pad = [0m[32m' '[0m[39m, minus = [0m[1;36m0[0m[39m, c = fmt[0m[1;39m[[0m[39m++i[0m[1;39m][0m[39m;[0m                                  [2m                [0m

[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m265[0m[39m:      [0m[1;39m}[0m                                                                         [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m266[0m[39m:      while [0m[1;39m([0m[39mc == [0m[32m'h'[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m c = fmt[0m[1;39m[[0m[39m++i[0m[1;39m][0m[39m;  [0m[35m/[0m[35m/[0m[39m Treat h and hh as int[0m                  [2m                [0m

[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m269[0m[39m:        if [0m[1;39m([0m[39mc == [0m[32m'l'[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m is_long++, c = fmt[0m[1;39m[[0m[39m++i[0m[1;39m][0m[39m;[0m                                  [2m                [0m

[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m210[0m[39m:  size_t s = [0m[1;36m0[0m[39m, n, i;[0m                                                           [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m211[0m[39m:  if [0m[1;39m([0m[39mis_signed && val < [0m[1;36m0[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m buf[0m[1;39m[[0m[39ms++[0m[1;39m][0m[39m = [0m[32m'-'[0m[39m, v = [0m[1;39m([0m[39muint64_t[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m [0m[1;39m([0m[39m-val[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m;[0m              [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m212[0m[39m:  [0m[35m/[0m[35m/[0m[39m This loop prints a number in reverse order. I guess this is because we[0m     [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m213[0m[39m:  [0m[35m/[0m[35m/[0m[39m write numbers from right to left: least significant digit comes last.[0m      [2m                [0m
