[2;36m                    [0m         [39m## Fix Strategy[0m                                                                     [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m<fix_strategy>[0m                                                                      [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m## Analysis[0m                                                                         [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mAfter reviewing the evaluation report and code snippets, I can now identify the [0m    [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mroot cause:[0m                                                                         [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m**Root Cause:**[0m                                                                     [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mThe stack-buffer-overflow occurs in the `%e/%E` format specifier handler at lines [0m  [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m317[0m[39m-[0m[1;36m327[0m[39m in `src/fmt.c`. The buffer `tmp` declared at line [0m[1;36m318[0m[39m is only [0m[1;36m8[0m[39m bytes, but [0m [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mthe call to `[0m[1;35mmg_dtoa[0m[1;39m([0m[1;39m)[0m[39m` at line [0m[1;36m322[0m[39m passes `[0m[33mdstlen[0m[39m=[0m[1;36m10[0m[39m`, allowing it to write up to [0m [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m10[0m[39m bytes into an [0m[1;36m8[0m[39m-byte buffer.[0m                                                     [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m**Why the Previous Patch Failed:**[0m                                                  [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mThe previous patch correctly identified the location but was already applied. [0m      [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mLooking at the patch attempt, it shows:[0m                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m- Line [0m[1;36m318[0m[39m: Changed `char tmp[0m[1;39m[[0m[1;36m8[0m[1;39m][0m[39m;` to `char tmp[0m[1;39m[[0m[1;36m40[0m[1;39m][0m[39m;`  [0m                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m- Line [0m[1;36m322[0m[39m: Changed size parameter from `[0m[1;36m10[0m[39m` to `[0m[1;35msizeof[0m[1;39m([0m[39mtmp[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m`[0m                       [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mHowever, the error persists with identical characteristics. This suggests the patch[0m [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mmay not have been applied correctly, or there's a compilation/deployment issue.[0m     [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m**Verification from Code Snippets:**[0m                                                [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mLooking at the code snippets provided, I can see the vulnerable code at lines [0m      [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m317[0m[39m-[0m[1;36m327[0m[39m where:[0m                                                                      [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m- Line [0m[1;36m318[0m[39m declares `char tmp[0m[1;39m[[0m[1;36m8[0m[1;39m][0m[39m;` [0m[1;39m([0m[1;36m8[0m[39m bytes[0m[1;39m)[0m                                        [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m- Line [0m[1;36m322[0m[39m calls `[0m[1;35mmg_dtoa[0m[1;39m([0m[39mtmp, [0m[1;36m10[0m[39m, mantissa, [0m[1;36m8[0m[39m, c == [0m[32m'e'[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m;` with [0m[33mdstlen[0m[39m=[0m[1;36m10[0m          [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m- Line [0m[1;36m326[0m[39m reuses the same buffer for `[0m[1;35mmg_lld[0m[1;39m([0m[39mtmp, exponent, [0m[1;36m1[0m[39m, [0m[1;36m0[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m;`[0m                [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mThe `[0m[1;35mmg_dtoa[0m[1;39m([0m[1;39m)[0m[39m` function uses `[0m[1;35mmg_snprintf[0m[1;39m([0m[1;39m)[0m[39m` internally, which respects the [0m       [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m`dstlen` parameter and can write up to that many bytes. With [0m[33mdstlen[0m[39m=[0m[1;36m10[0m[39m and actual [0m  [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mbuffer size of [0m[1;36m8[0m[39m, this causes the overflow.[0m                                         [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m## Fix Strategy[0m                                                                     [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m### Primary Fix: Correct Buffer Size and Parameter[0m                                  [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m**Location:** `src/fmt.c` lines [0m[1;36m317[0m[39m-[0m[1;36m327[0m[39m [0m[1;39m([0m[39mthe `%e/%E` format specifier case[0m[1;39m)[0m         [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m**Step [0m[1;36m1[0m[39m: Increase buffer size to [0m[1;36m40[0m[39m bytes**[0m                                        [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m- Change line [0m[1;36m318[0m[39m from `char tmp[0m[1;39m[[0m[1;36m8[0m[1;39m][0m[39m;` to `char tmp[0m[1;39m[[0m[1;36m40[0m[1;39m][0m[39m;`[0m                            [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m- This matches the pattern used by other format specifiers [0m[1;39m([0m[39msee line [0m[1;36m275[0m[39m for [0m       [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m`%g/%f`[0m[1;39m)[0m                                                                            [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m- [0m[1;36m40[0m[39m bytes is sufficient for:[0m                                                       [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m  - Mantissa output from `[0m[1;35mmg_dtoa[0m[1;39m([0m[1;39m)[0m[39m`: max [0m[1;36m11[0m[39m bytes [0m[1;39m([0m[39msign + digit + [0m[32m'.'[0m[39m + [0m[1;36m8[0m[39m fraction[0m [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mdigits[0m[1;39m)[0m                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m  - Exponent output from `[0m[1;35mmg_lld[0m[1;39m([0m[1;39m)[0m[39m`: max [0m[1;36m20[0m[39m bytes [0m[1;39m([0m[39msign + [0m[1;36m19[0m[39m digits for int64_t[0m[1;39m)[0m    [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m**Step [0m[1;36m2[0m[39m: Use [0m[1;35msizeof[0m[1;39m([0m[39mtmp[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m instead of hardcoded size**[0m                               [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m- Change line [0m[1;36m322[0m[39m from `k = [0m[1;35mmg_dtoa[0m[1;39m([0m[39mtmp, [0m[1;36m10[0m[39m, mantissa, [0m[1;36m8[0m[39m, c == [0m[32m'e'[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m;` [0m              [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m- To: `k = [0m[1;35mmg_dtoa[0m[1;39m([0m[39mtmp, [0m[1;35msizeof[0m[1;39m([0m[39mtmp[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m, mantissa, [0m[1;36m8[0m[39m, c == [0m[32m'e'[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m;`[0m                       [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m- This ensures the size parameter matches the actual buffer size[0m                    [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m- Follows the same pattern as line [0m[1;36m280[0m[39m for `%g/%f` format specifiers[0m                [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m### Implementation Details[0m                                                          [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mThe fix should modify the `%e/%E` handler block starting at line [0m[1;36m317[0m[39m:[0m               [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m```c[0m                                                                                [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;39m}[0m[39m else if [0m[1;39m([0m[39mc == [0m[32m'e'[0m[39m || c == [0m[32m'E'[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m [0m[1;39m{[0m                                                  [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m    char tmp[0m[1;39m[[0m[1;36m40[0m[1;39m][0m[39m;  [0m[35m/[0m[35m/[0m[39m CHANGED: from tmp[0m[1;39m[[0m[1;36m8[0m[1;39m][0m[39m to tmp[0m[1;39m[[0m[1;36m40[0m[1;39m][0m                               [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m    double d = [0m[1;35mva_arg[0m[1;39m([0m[39m*ap, double[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m;[0m                                                 [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m    int64_t exponent = [0m[1;39m([0m[39mint64_t[0m[1;39m)[0m[1;35mlog10[0m[1;39m([0m[1;35mmy_fabs[0m[1;39m([0m[39md[0m[1;39m)[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m;[0m                                  [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m    double mantissa = d [0m[35m/[0m[39m [0m[1;35mpower[0m[1;39m([0m[1;36m10[0m[39m, exponent[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m;[0m                                      [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m    k = [0m[1;35mmg_dtoa[0m[1;39m([0m[39mtmp, [0m[1;35msizeof[0m[1;39m([0m[39mtmp[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m, mantissa, [0m[1;36m8[0m[39m, c == [0m[32m'e'[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m;  [0m[35m/[0m[35m/[0m[39m CHANGED: from [0m[1;36m10[0m[39m to [0m  [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;35msizeof[0m[1;39m([0m[39mtmp[0m[1;39m)[0m                                                                         [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m    n += [0m[1;35mscpy[0m[1;39m([0m[39mout, param, tmp, k[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m;[0m                                                  [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m    [0m[1;35mout[0m[1;39m([0m[39mc, param[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m;[0m                                                                  [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m    n++;[0m                                                                            [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m    k = [0m[1;35mmg_lld[0m[1;39m([0m[39mtmp, exponent, [0m[1;36m1[0m[39m, [0m[1;36m0[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m;[0m                                                [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m    n += [0m[1;35mscpy[0m[1;39m([0m[39mout, param, tmp, k[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m;[0m                                                  [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;39m}[0m                                                                                   [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m```[0m                                                                                 [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m### Justification[0m                                                                   [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m**Why this is the optimal approach:**[0m                                               [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m1[0m[39m. **Matches established patterns:** The fix follows the exact same pattern used by[0m [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m`%g/%f` handlers at lines [0m[1;36m272[0m[39m-[0m[1;36m299[0m                                                   [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m2[0m[39m. **Minimal change:** Only modifies two lines, reducing risk of introducing new [0m   [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mbugs[0m                                                                                [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m3[0m[39m. **Safe buffer size:** [0m[1;36m40[0m[39m bytes provides adequate space for both operations [0m      [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;39m([0m[39mmantissa and exponent[0m[1;39m)[0m                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m4[0m[39m. **Consistent with codebase:** Uses the same buffer size as `[0m[1;35mmg_dtoa[0m[1;39m([0m[1;39m)[0m[39m`'s [0m        [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39minternal buffer [0m[1;39m([0m[39mline [0m[1;36m139[0m[1;39m)[0m                                                          [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m**How it preserves existing logic:**[0m                                                [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m1[0m[39m. The buffer is still reused for both `[0m[1;35mmg_dtoa[0m[1;39m([0m[1;39m)[0m[39m` and `[0m[1;35mmg_lld[0m[1;39m([0m[1;39m)[0m[39m` calls [0m            [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;39m([0m[39msequential, not overlapping[0m[1;39m)[0m                                                       [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m2[0m[39m. The width parameter [0m[1;39m([0m[1;36m8[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m remains unchanged, maintaining output format[0m             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m3[0m[39m. The `tz` parameter [0m[1;39m([0m[39m`c == [0m[32m'e'[0m[39m`[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m remains unchanged, preserving trailing zero [0m     [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mbehavior[0m                                                                            [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m4[0m[39m. All existing test cases should continue to pass[0m                                  [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m**How it addresses the issue:**[0m                                                     [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m1[0m[39m. Increases buffer from [0m[1;36m8[0m[39m to [0m[1;36m40[0m[39m bytes, preventing overflow[0m                         [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m2[0m[39m. Passes correct buffer size to `[0m[1;35mmg_dtoa[0m[1;39m([0m[1;39m)[0m[39m` via `[0m[1;35msizeof[0m[1;39m([0m[39mtmp[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m`[0m                      [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m3[0m[39m. Ensures `[0m[1;35mmg_dtoa[0m[1;39m([0m[1;39m)[0m[39m` can safely write up to the actual buffer capacity[0m            [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m4[0m[39m. Eliminates the mismatch between declared size [0m[1;39m([0m[1;36m8[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m and passed size [0m[1;39m([0m[1;36m10[0m[1;39m)[0m           [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m**Potential side effects and mitigation:**[0m                                          [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m1[0m[39m. **Stack usage increase:** +[0m[1;36m32[0m[39m bytes per call - negligible for typical stack [0m     [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39msizes[0m                                                                               [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m2[0m[39m. **No functional changes:** Output format remains identical[0m                       [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m3[0m[39m. **No breaking changes:** Existing tests and API remain unchanged[0m                 [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m**Similar solutions in codebase:**[0m                                                  [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m- Line [0m[1;36m275[0m[39m: `char tmp[0m[1;39m[[0m[1;36m40[0m[1;39m][0m[39m;` for `%d/%u/%x/%X/%p/%g/%f` handlers[0m                     [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m- Line [0m[1;36m280[0m[39m: `k = [0m[1;35mmg_dtoa[0m[1;39m([0m[39mtmp, [0m[1;35msizeof[0m[1;39m([0m[39mtmp[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m, v, [0m[1;39m([0m[39mint[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m pr, c == [0m[32m'g'[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m;` uses [0m           [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m`[0m[1;35msizeof[0m[1;39m([0m[39mtmp[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m`[0m                                                                       [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m- Line [0m[1;36m139[0m[39m: `char buf[0m[1;39m[[0m[1;36m40[0m[1;39m][0m[39m;` in `[0m[1;35mmg_dtoa[0m[1;39m([0m[1;39m)[0m[39m` function itself[0m                          [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mThis fix directly addresses the root cause identified in the AddressSanitizer [0m      [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mreport where memory access at offset [0m[1;36m120[0m[39m overflows the `tmp371` variable [0m[1;39m([0m[39mthe [0m      [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mcompiler's internal name for `tmp` at line [0m[1;36m319[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m.[0m                                    [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m<[0m[35m/[0m[95mfix_strategy[0m[1m>[0m                                                                     [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         ===Evaluation [33mEnd[0m===                                                                [2m                [0m

[2;36m                    [0m         [33mexception[0m=[3;91mFalse[0m                                                               [2m                      [0m
[2;36m                   [0m[2;36m [0m[34mINFO    [0m ===Evaluator [33mResult[0m===                                                              ]8;id=345885;file:///home/qqor/crete/packages/crete/framework/agent/services/prism/teams/evaluation/evaluator.py\[2mevaluator.py[0m]8;;\[2m:[0m]8;id=551490;file:///home/qqor/crete/packages/crete/framework/agent/services/prism/teams/evaluation/evaluator.py#204\[2m204[0m]8;;\
[2;36m                    [0m         PatchStatus.VULNERABLE                                                              [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         ===Evaluator [33mDiff[0m===                                                                [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         --- a/src/fmt.c                                                                     [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         +++ b/src/fmt.c                                                                     [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         @@ [1;36m-315[0m,[1;36m11[0m +[1;36m315[0m,[1;36m11[0m @@                                                               [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                  for [1m([0mj = [1;36m0[0m; minus && pr [1m<[0m[39m w && j + pr < w; j++[0m[1;39m)[0m                            [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m           n += [0m[1;35mscpy[0m[1;39m([0m[39mout, param, &pad, [0m[1;36m1[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m;[0m                                          [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m       [0m[1;39m}[0m[39m else if [0m[1;39m([0m[39mc == [0m[32m'e'[0m[39m || c == [0m[32m'E'[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m [0m[1;39m{[0m                                           [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m-       [0m[39m        [0m[39m  char tmp[0m[1;39m[[0m[1;36m8[0m[1;39m][0m[39m;[0m                                                      [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m+       [0m[39m        [0m[39m  char tmp[0m[1;39m[[0m[1;36m40[0m[1;39m][0m[39m;[0m                                                     [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m           double d = [0m[1;35mva_arg[0m[1;39m([0m[39m*ap, double[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m;[0m                                          [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m           int64_t exponent = [0m[1;39m([0m[39mint64_t[0m[1;39m)[0m[1;35mlog10[0m[1;39m([0m[1;35mmy_fabs[0m[1;39m([0m[39md[0m[1;39m)[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m;[0m                           [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m           double mantissa = d [0m[35m/[0m[39m [0m[1;35mpower[0m[1;39m([0m[1;36m10[0m[39m, exponent[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m;[0m                               [2m                [0m

[2;36m                    [0m         [39m  Right alloca redzone:    cb[0m                                                       [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m==[0m[1;36m18[0m[39m==ABORTING[0m                                                                      [2m                [0m

[2;36m                    [0m         [39mINFO:__main__:Running: docker run --privileged --shm-[0m[33msize[0m[39m=[0m[35m2g[0m[39m --platform linux/amd64[0m [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m--rm -i -e [0m[33mHELPER[0m[39m=[0m[3;92mTrue[0m[39m -e [0m[33mARCHITECTURE[0m[39m=[0m[35mx86_64[0m[39m -v [0m                                   [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [35m/home/qqor/crete/packages/python_oss_fuzz/.oss_fuzz/build/out/[0m[95mmongoose[0m[39m:[0m[35m/[0m[95mout[0m[39m -v [0m     [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [35m/tmp/[0m[95mtmp6oxomw4r[0m[39m:[0m[35m/[0m[95mtestcase[0m[39m -t ghcr.io/aixcc-finals/base-runner:v1.[0m[1;36m3.0[0m[39m reproduce [0m    [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mfuzz -[0m[33mruns[0m[39m=[0m[1;36m100[0m[39m.[0m                                                                     [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m===Evaluation [0m[33mReport[0m[39m===[0m                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m# Evaluation Report[0m                                                                 [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m## Summary[0m                                                                          [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mThe initial issue reveals an AddressSanitizer [0m[1;39m([0m[39mASan[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m stack-buffer-overflow error [0m   [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39moccurring in the mongoose codebase when processing formatted output. The error [0m     [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39moccurs when writing [0m[1;36m1[0m[39m byte to address `[0m[1;36m0x7f65cf76fb78[0m[39m`, which overflows an [0m[1;36m8[0m[39m-byte [0m  [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mstack variable `tmp371` at line [0m[1;36m319[0m[39m in `[0m[35m/src/mongoose/src/[0m[95mfmt.c[0m[39m`. The patch attempt[0m [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mincreases the size of a buffer from [0m[1;36m8[0m[39m to [0m[1;36m40[0m[39m bytes and corrects a hardcoded buffer [0m  [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39msize parameter, but the same stack-buffer-overflow error persists after applying [0m   [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mthe patch, indicating that the fix does not address the root cause of the issue.[0m    [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m## Description[0m                                                                      [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m### Initial Issue Analysis[0m                                                          [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mThe initial issue manifests as a stack-buffer-overflow with the following [0m          [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mcharacteristics:[0m                                                                    [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m1[0m[39m. **Error Location**: The overflow occurs in `mg_pfn_iobuf_private` function, [0m     [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mwhich is called through a chain: `mg_pfn_iobuf_private` → `mg_putchar_iobuf_static`[0m [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m→ `scpy` → `mg_vxprintf.specialized.[0m[1;36m2[0m[39m`[0m                                              [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m2[0m[39m. **Vulnerable Variable**: According to the ASan report, a variable named `tmp371`[0m [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mat line [0m[1;36m319[0m[39m in `[0m[35m/src/mongoose/src/[0m[95mfmt.c[0m[39m` is [0m[1;36m8[0m[39m bytes in size `[0m[1;39m[[0m[1;36m112[0m[39m, [0m[1;36m120[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m`, and the [0m  [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mwrite operation attempts to access offset [0m[1;36m120[0m[39m, which is exactly [0m[1;36m1[0m[39m byte beyond the [0m  [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mallocated buffer.[0m                                                                   [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m3[0m[39m. **Call Stack Context**: The overflow occurs during HTTP parsing [0m                 [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;39m([0m[39m`mg_http_parse`[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m which triggers logging functionality [0m[1;39m([0m[39m`mg_log`[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m, which in turn [0m   [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mcalls `mg_vxprintf` for formatted output.[0m                                           [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m4[0m[39m. **Frame Layout**: The ASan report shows the stack frame of `mg_vxprintf` [0m        [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mcontains:[0m                                                                           [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m   - `tmp` variable at offset [0m[1;39m[[0m[1;36m32[0m[39m, [0m[1;36m72[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m [0m[1;39m([0m[1;36m40[0m[39m bytes[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m at line [0m[1;36m276[0m                       [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m   - `tmp371` variable at offset [0m[1;39m[[0m[1;36m112[0m[39m, [0m[1;36m120[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m [0m[1;39m([0m[1;36m8[0m[39m bytes[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m at line [0m[1;36m319[0m                   [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m### Patch Attempt Description[0m                                                       [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mThe patch modifies `[0m[35m/src/mongoose/src/[0m[95mfmt.c[0m[39m` in the handling of [0m[32m'e'[0m[39m and [0m[32m'E'[0m[39m format [0m [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mspecifiers [0m[1;39m([0m[39mscientific notation for floating-point numbers[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m:[0m                        [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m**Changes made:**[0m                                                                   [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m1[0m[39m. Line [0m[1;36m318[0m[39m: Changed `char tmp[0m[1;39m[[0m[1;36m8[0m[1;39m][0m[39m;` to `char tmp[0m[1;39m[[0m[1;36m40[0m[1;39m][0m[39m;` - increasing buffer size [0m    [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mfrom [0m[1;36m8[0m[39m to [0m[1;36m40[0m[39m bytes[0m                                                                  [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m2[0m[39m. Line [0m[1;36m322[0m[39m: Changed `k = [0m[1;35mmg_dtoa[0m[1;39m([0m[39mtmp, [0m[1;36m10[0m[39m, mantissa, [0m[1;36m8[0m[39m, c == [0m[32m'e'[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m;` to `k = [0m        [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;35mmg_dtoa[0m[1;39m([0m[39mtmp, [0m[1;35msizeof[0m[1;39m([0m[39mtmp[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m, mantissa, [0m[1;36m8[0m[39m, c == [0m[32m'e'[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m;` - replacing hardcoded size [0m[1;36m10[0m[39m [0m   [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mwith `[0m[1;35msizeof[0m[1;39m([0m[39mtmp[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m`[0m                                                                  [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m**Location in code:**[0m                                                               [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mThe patch targets the branch handling exponential notation format specifiers within[0m [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mthe `mg_vxprintf` function, specifically around lines [0m[1;36m315[0m[39m-[0m[1;36m325[0m[39m.[0m                      [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m### Post-Patch Results[0m                                                              [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mAfter applying the patch, the exact same error persists:[0m                            [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m1[0m[39m. **Same Error Location**: The stack-buffer-overflow still occurs at the same [0m     [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mfunction chain and memory address pattern[0m                                           [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m2[0m[39m. **Same Vulnerable Variable**: `tmp371` at line [0m[1;36m319[0m[39m remains [0m[1;36m8[0m[39m bytes `[0m[1;39m[[0m[1;36m112[0m[39m, [0m[1;36m120[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m` [0m [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mand still overflows at offset [0m[1;36m120[0m                                                   [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m3[0m[39m. **Identical Stack Frame**: The frame layout shows the same structure with `tmp` [0m [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mat [0m[1;39m[[0m[1;36m32[0m[39m, [0m[1;36m72[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m and `tmp371` at [0m[1;39m[[0m[1;36m112[0m[39m, [0m[1;36m120[0m[1;39m)[0m                                              [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mThis indicates that:[0m                                                                [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m- The patch did not modify the correct variable [0m[1;39m([0m[39m`tmp` was changed, but `tmp371` is[0m [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mthe one overflowing[0m[1;39m)[0m                                                                [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m- The buffer size of `tmp371` remains [0m[1;36m8[0m[39m bytes after the patch[0m                       [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m- The actual overflow may be occurring in a different code path or the wrong buffer[0m [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mwas targeted[0m                                                                        [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m### Areas Requiring Further Investigation[0m                                           [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m1[0m[39m. **Line [0m[1;36m319[0m[39m in fmt.c**: The exact declaration and usage of the `tmp371` variable [0m [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mneeds to be examined, as this is the actual overflowing buffer according to ASan.[0m   [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m2[0m[39m. **mg_dtoa Function**: The `mg_dtoa` function at `[0m[35m/src/mongoose/src/[0m[95mfmt.c[0m[39m` is [0m    [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mbeing called in the stack trace. This function's implementation and how it writes [0m  [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mto buffers should be investigated to understand the actual buffer size [0m             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mrequirements.[0m                                                                       [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m3[0m[39m. **scpy Function**: The `scpy` function at line [0m[1;36m233[0m[39m in `[0m[35m/src/mongoose/src/[0m[95mfmt.c[0m[39m` [0m [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mperforms the actual write that triggers the overflow. Its implementation and buffer[0m [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mboundary checking should be examined.[0m                                               [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m4[0m[39m. **mg_vxprintf Function**: A comprehensive review of the entire `mg_vxprintf` [0m    [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mfunction [0m[1;39m([0m[39mstarting at line [0m[1;36m247[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m is needed to identify all temporary buffers and [0m    [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mtheir usage patterns, particularly around lines [0m[1;36m315[0m[39m-[0m[1;36m325[0m[39m where multiple format [0m      [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mspecifiers are handled.[0m                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m5[0m[39m. **mg_putchar_iobuf_static Function**: Located in `[0m[35m/src/mongoose/src/[0m[95mprintf.c[0m[39m` at[0m [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mline [0m[1;36m39[0m[39m, this function is in the direct call chain and should be reviewed for [0m      [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mproper buffer management.[0m                                                           [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m6[0m[39m. **Format Specifier Handling**: The code path handling [0m[32m'e'[0m[39m and [0m[32m'E'[0m[39m format [0m        [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mspecifiers needs thorough review, as the patch attempted to fix this area but the [0m  [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mvariable name mismatch suggests there may be multiple temporary buffers with [0m       [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mdifferent purposes.[0m                                                                 [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m## Initial Issue Log[0m                                                                [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mHere is the initial issue log of the codebase:[0m                                      [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m<issue>[0m                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m+ [0m[33mFUZZER[0m[39m=[0m[35mfuzz[0m                                                                       [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m+ shift[0m                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m+ [0m[32m'[0m[32m[[0m[32m'[0m[39m [0m[32m'!'[0m[39m -v TESTCASE [0m[32m'[0m[32m][0m[32m'[0m                                                           [2m                [0m

[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m36[0m[39m:     [0m[39m        [0m[39mx *= [0m[1;36m0x1[0m[39mp54;[0m                                                        [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m37[0m[39m:     [0m[39m        [0m[39mu.f = x;[0m                                                            [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m38[0m[39m:     [0m[39m        [0m[39mhx = u.i>>[0m[1;36m32[0m[39m;[0m                                                       [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m39[0m[39m:     [0m[1;39m}[0m[39m else if [0m[1;39m([0m[39mhx >= [0m[1;36m0x7ff00000[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m [0m[1;39m{[0m                                              [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m40[0m[39m:     [0m[39m        [0m[39mreturn x;[0m                                                           [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m41[0m[39m:     [0m[1;39m}[0m[39m else if [0m[1;39m([0m[39mhx == [0m[1;36m0x3ff00000[0m[39m && u.i<<[0m[1;36m32[0m[39m == [0m[1;36m0[0m[1;39m)[0m                                [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m42[0m[39m:     [0m[39m        [0m[39mreturn [0m[1;36m0[0m[39m;[0m                                                           [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m43[0m[39m:     [0m[35m/[0m[39m* reduce x into [0m[1;39m[[0m[1;35msqrt[0m[1;39m([0m[1;36m2[0m[1;39m)[0m[35m/[0m[95m2[0m[39m, [0m[1;35msqrt[0m[1;39m([0m[1;36m2[0m[1;39m)[0m[1;39m][0m[39m *[0m[35m/[0m                                    [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m44[0m[39m:     [0m[39mhx += [0m[1;36m0x3ff00000[0m[39m - [0m[1;36m0x3fe6a09e[0m[39m;[0m                                              [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m45[0m[39m:     [0m[39mk += [0m[1;39m([0m[39mint[0m[1;39m)[0m[1;39m([0m[39mhx>>[0m[1;36m20[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m - [0m[1;36m0x3ff[0m[39m;[0m                                                 [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m46[0m[39m:     [0m[39mhx = [0m[1;39m([0m[39mhx&[0m[1;36m0x000fffff[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m + [0m[1;36m0x3fe6a09e[0m[39m;[0m                                          [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m47[0m[39m:     [0m[39mu.i = [0m[1;39m([0m[39muint64_t[0m[1;39m)[0m[39mhx<<[0m[1;36m32[0m[39m | [0m[1;39m([0m[39mu.i&[0m[1;36m0xffffffff[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m;[0m                                  [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m48[0m[39m:     [0m[39mx = u.f;[0m                                                                    [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m49[0m[39m:     [0m[39mf = x - [0m[1;36m1.0[0m[39m;[0m                                                                [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m50[0m[39m:     [0m[39mhfsq = [0m[1;36m0.5[0m[39m*f*f;[0m                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m51[0m[39m:     [0m[39ms = f/[0m[1;39m([0m[1;36m2.0[0m[39m+f[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m;[0m                                                              [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m52[0m[39m:     [0m[39mz = s*s;[0m                                                                    [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m53[0m[39m:     [0m[39mw = z*z;[0m                                                                    [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m54[0m[39m:     [0m[39mt1 = w*[0m[1;39m([0m[39mLg2+w*[0m[1;39m([0m[39mLg4+w*Lg6[0m[1;39m)[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m;[0m                                                 [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m55[0m[39m:     [0m[39mt2 = z*[0m[1;39m([0m[39mLg1+w*[0m[1;39m([0m[39mLg3+w*[0m[1;39m([0m[39mLg5+w*Lg7[0m[1;39m)[0m[1;39m)[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m;[0m                                         [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m56[0m[39m:     [0m[39mR = t2 + t1;[0m                                                                [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m57[0m[39m:     [0m[35m/[0m[39m* See log2.c for details. *[0m[35m/[0m                                               [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m58[0m[39m:     [0m[35m/[0m[39m* hi+lo = f - hfsq + s*[0m[1;39m([0m[39mhfsq+R[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m ~ [0m[1;35mlog[0m[1;39m([0m[1;36m1[0m[39m+f[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m *[0m[35m/[0m                              [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m59[0m[39m:     [0m[39mhi = f - hfsq;[0m                                                              [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m60[0m[39m:     [0m[39mu.f = hi;[0m                                                                   [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m61[0m[39m:     [0m[39mu.i &= [0m[1;39m([0m[39muint64_t[0m[1;39m)[0m[1;36m-1[0m[39m<<[0m[1;36m32[0m[39m;[0m                                                    [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m62[0m[39m:     [0m[39mhi = u.f;[0m                                                                   [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m63[0m[39m:     [0m[39mlo = f - hi - hfsq + s*[0m[1;39m([0m[39mhfsq+R[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m;[0m                                            [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m64[0m[39m:     [0m[35m/[0m[39m* val_hi+val_lo ~ [0m[1;35mlog10[0m[1;39m([0m[1;36m1[0m[39m+f[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m + k*[0m[1;35mlog10[0m[1;39m([0m[1;36m2[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m *[0m[35m/[0m                               [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m65[0m[39m:     [0m[39mval_hi = hi*ivln10hi;[0m                                                       [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m66[0m[39m:     [0m[39mdk = k;[0m                                                                     [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m67[0m[39m:     [0m[39my = dk*log10_2hi;[0m                                                           [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m68[0m[39m:     [0m[39mval_lo = dk*log10_2lo + [0m[1;39m([0m[39mlo+hi[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m*ivln10lo + lo*ivln10hi;[0m                     [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m69[0m[39m:     [0m[35m/[0m[39m*[0m                                                                          [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m70[0m[39m:     [0m[39m * Extra precision in for adding y is not strictly needed[0m                   [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m71[0m[39m:     [0m[39m * since there is no very large cancellation near x = [0m[1;35msqrt[0m[1;39m([0m[1;36m2[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m or[0m            [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m72[0m[39m:     [0m[39m * x = [0m[1;36m1[0m[39m/[0m[1;35msqrt[0m[1;39m([0m[1;36m2[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m, but we do it anyway since it costs little on CPUs[0m         [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m73[0m[39m:     [0m[39m * with some parallelism and it reduces the error for many args.[0m            [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m74[0m[39m:     [0m[39m *[0m[35m/[0m                                                                         [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m75[0m[39m:     [0m[39mw = y + val_hi;[0m                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m76[0m[39m:     [0m[39mval_lo += [0m[1;39m([0m[39my - w[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m + val_hi;[0m                                                 [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m77[0m[39m:     [0m[39mval_hi = w;[0m                                                                 [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m78[0m[39m:     [0m[39mreturn val_lo + val_hi;[0m                                                     [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m79[0m[39m:[0m[1;39m}[0m                                                                                [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m```[0m                                                                                 [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m<[0m[35m/[0m[95mcode[0m[39m>[0m                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m<code>[0m                                                                              [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39msrc/fmt.[0m[1;92mc:138[0m[39m-[0m[1;36m205[0m                                                                   [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m```[0m                                                                                 [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m138[0m[39m:static size_t [0m[1;35mmg_dtoa[0m[1;39m([0m[39mchar *dst, size_t dstlen, double d, int width, bool tz[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m [0m[1;39m{[0m [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m139[0m[39m:  char buf[0m[1;39m[[0m[1;36m40[0m[1;39m][0m[39m;[0m                                                                 [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m140[0m[39m:  int i, s = [0m[1;36m0[0m[39m, n = [0m[1;36m0[0m[39m, e = [0m[1;36m0[0m[39m;[0m                                                   [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m141[0m[39m:  double t, mul, saved;[0m                                                         [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m142[0m[39m:  if [0m[1;39m([0m[39md == [0m[1;36m0.0[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m return [0m[1;35mmg_snprintf[0m[1;39m([0m[39mdst, dstlen, [0m[32m"%s"[0m[39m, [0m[32m"0"[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m;[0m                     [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m143[0m[39m:  if [0m[1;39m([0m[1;35mxisinf[0m[1;39m([0m[39md[0m[1;39m)[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m return [0m[1;35mmg_snprintf[0m[1;39m([0m[39mdst, dstlen, [0m[32m"%s"[0m[39m, d > [0m[1;36m0[0m[39m ? [0m[32m"inf"[0m[39m : [0m[32m"-inf"[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m;[0m [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m144[0m[39m:  if [0m[1;39m([0m[1;35mxisnan[0m[1;39m([0m[39md[0m[1;39m)[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m return [0m[1;35mmg_snprintf[0m[1;39m([0m[39mdst, dstlen, [0m[32m"%s"[0m[39m, [0m[32m"nan"[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m;[0m                  [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m145[0m[39m:  if [0m[1;39m([0m[39md < [0m[1;36m0.0[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m d = -d, buf[0m[1;39m[[0m[39ms++[0m[1;39m][0m[39m = [0m[32m'-'[0m[39m;[0m                                          [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m146[0m[39m:[0m                                                                                [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m147[0m[39m:  [0m[35m/[0m[35m/[0m[39m Round[0m                                                                      [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m148[0m[39m:  saved = d;[0m                                                                    [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m149[0m[39m:  if [0m[1;39m([0m[39mtz[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m [0m[1;39m{[0m                                                                     [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m150[0m[39m:    mul = [0m[1;36m1.0[0m[39m;[0m                                                                  [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m151[0m[39m:    while [0m[1;39m([0m[39md >= [0m[1;36m10.0[0m[39m && d [0m[35m/[0m[39m mul >= [0m[1;36m10.0[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m mul *= [0m[1;36m10.0[0m[39m;[0m                           [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m152[0m[39m:  [0m[1;39m}[0m[39m else [0m[1;39m{[0m                                                                      [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m153[0m[39m:    mul = [0m[1;36m0.1[0m[39m;[0m                                                                  [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m154[0m[39m:  [0m[1;39m}[0m                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m155[0m[39m:[0m                                                                                [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m156[0m[39m:  while [0m[1;39m([0m[39md <= [0m[1;36m1.0[0m[39m && d [0m[35m/[0m[39m mul <= [0m[1;36m1.0[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m mul [0m[35m/[0m[39m= [0m[1;36m10.0[0m[39m;[0m                               [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m157[0m[39m:  for [0m[1;39m([0m[39mi = [0m[1;36m0[0m[39m, t = mul * [0m[1;36m5[0m[39m; i < width; i++[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m t [0m[35m/[0m[39m= [0m[1;36m10.0[0m[39m;[0m                           [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m158[0m[39m:[0m                                                                                [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m159[0m[39m:  d += t;[0m                                                                       [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m160[0m[39m:[0m                                                                                [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m161[0m[39m:  [0m[35m/[0m[35m/[0m[39m Calculate exponent, and [0m[32m'mul'[0m[39m for scientific representation[0m                [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m162[0m[39m:  mul = [0m[1;36m1.0[0m[39m;[0m                                                                    [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m163[0m[39m:  while [0m[1;39m([0m[39md >= [0m[1;36m10.0[0m[39m && d [0m[35m/[0m[39m mul >= [0m[1;36m10.0[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m mul *= [0m[1;36m10.0[0m[39m, e++;[0m                        [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m164[0m[39m:  while [0m[1;39m([0m[39md < [0m[1;36m1.0[0m[39m && d [0m[35m/[0m[39m mul < [0m[1;36m1.0[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m mul [0m[35m/[0m[39m= [0m[1;36m10.0[0m[39m, e--;[0m                            [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m165[0m[39m:  [0m[35m/[0m[35m/[0m[39m [0m[1;35mprintf[0m[1;39m([0m[32m" --> %g %d %g %g\n"[0m[39m, saved, e, t, mul[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m;[0m                            [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m166[0m[39m:[0m                                                                                [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m167[0m[39m:  if [0m[1;39m([0m[39mtz && e >= width && width > [0m[1;36m1[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m [0m[1;39m{[0m                                          [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m168[0m[39m:    n = [0m[1;39m([0m[39mint[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m [0m[1;35mmg_dtoa[0m[1;39m([0m[39mbuf, [0m[1;35msizeof[0m[1;39m([0m[39mbuf[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m, saved [0m[35m/[0m[39m mul, width, tz[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m;[0m                [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m169[0m[39m:    [0m[35m/[0m[35m/[0m[39m [0m[1;35mprintf[0m[1;39m([0m[32m" --> %.*g %d [0m[32m[[0m[32m%.*s[0m[32m][0m[32m\n"[0m[39m, [0m[1;36m10[0m[39m, d [0m[35m/[0m[39m t, e, n, buf[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m;[0m                   [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m170[0m[39m:    n += [0m[1;35maddexp[0m[1;39m([0m[39mbuf + s + n, e, [0m[32m'+'[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m;[0m                                           [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m171[0m[39m:    return [0m[1;35mmg_snprintf[0m[1;39m([0m[39mdst, dstlen, [0m[32m"%.*s"[0m[39m, n, buf[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m;[0m                            [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m172[0m[39m:  [0m[1;39m}[0m[39m else if [0m[1;39m([0m[39mtz && e <= -width && width > [0m[1;36m1[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m [0m[1;39m{[0m                                  [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m173[0m[39m:    n = [0m[1;39m([0m[39mint[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m [0m[1;35mmg_dtoa[0m[1;39m([0m[39mbuf, [0m[1;35msizeof[0m[1;39m([0m[39mbuf[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m, saved [0m[35m/[0m[39m mul, width, tz[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m;[0m                [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m174[0m[39m:    [0m[35m/[0m[35m/[0m[39m [0m[1;35mprintf[0m[1;39m([0m[32m" --> %.*g %d [0m[32m[[0m[32m%.*s[0m[32m][0m[32m\n"[0m[39m, [0m[1;36m10[0m[39m, d [0m[35m/[0m[39m mul, e, n, buf[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m;[0m                 [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m175[0m[39m:    n += [0m[1;35maddexp[0m[1;39m([0m[39mbuf + s + n, -e, [0m[32m'-'[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m;[0m                                          [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m176[0m[39m:    return [0m[1;35mmg_snprintf[0m[1;39m([0m[39mdst, dstlen, [0m[32m"%.*s"[0m[39m, n, buf[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m;[0m                            [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m177[0m[39m:  [0m[1;39m}[0m[39m else [0m[1;39m{[0m                                                                      [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m178[0m[39m:    int targ_width = width;[0m                                                     [2m                [0m
