[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m252[0m[39m:      if [0m[1;39m([0m[39mc == [0m[32m'#'[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m x++, c = fmt[0m[1;39m[[0m[39m++i[0m[1;39m][0m[39m;[0m                                          [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m253[0m[39m:      if [0m[1;39m([0m[39mc == [0m[32m'-'[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m minus++, c = fmt[0m[1;39m[[0m[39m++i[0m[1;39m][0m[39m;[0m                                      [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m254[0m[39m:      if [0m[1;39m([0m[39mc == [0m[32m'0'[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m pad = [0m[32m'0'[0m[39m, c = fmt[0m[1;39m[[0m[39m++i[0m[1;39m][0m[39m;[0m                                    [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m255[0m[39m:      while [0m[1;39m([0m[1;35mis_digit[0m[1;39m([0m[39mc[0m[1;39m)[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m w *= [0m[1;36m10[0m[39m, w += [0m[1;39m([0m[39msize_t[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m [0m[1;39m([0m[39mc - [0m[32m'0'[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m, c = fmt[0m[1;39m[[0m[39m++i[0m[1;39m][0m[39m;[0m       [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m256[0m[39m:      if [0m[1;39m([0m[39mc == [0m[32m'.'[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m [0m[1;39m{[0m                                                           [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m257[0m[39m:        c = fmt[0m[1;39m[[0m[39m++i[0m[1;39m][0m[39m;[0m                                                           [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m258[0m[39m:        if [0m[1;39m([0m[39mc == [0m[32m'*'[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m [0m[1;39m{[0m                                                         [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m259[0m[39m:          pr = [0m[1;39m([0m[39msize_t[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m [0m[1;35mva_arg[0m[1;39m([0m[39m*ap, int[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m;[0m                                       [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m260[0m[39m:          c = fmt[0m[1;39m[[0m[39m++i[0m[1;39m][0m[39m;[0m                                                         [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m261[0m[39m:        [0m[1;39m}[0m[39m else [0m[1;39m{[0m                                                                [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m262[0m[39m:          pr = [0m[1;36m0[0m[39m;[0m                                                               [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m263[0m[39m:          while [0m[1;39m([0m[1;35mis_digit[0m[1;39m([0m[39mc[0m[1;39m)[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m pr *= [0m[1;36m10[0m[39m, pr += [0m[1;39m([0m[39msize_t[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m [0m[1;39m([0m[39mc - [0m[32m'0'[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m, c = fmt[0m[1;39m[[0m[39m++i[0m[1;39m][0m[39m;[0m [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m264[0m[39m:        [0m[1;39m}[0m                                                                       [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m265[0m[39m:      [0m[1;39m}[0m                                                                         [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m266[0m[39m:      while [0m[1;39m([0m[39mc == [0m[32m'h'[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m c = fmt[0m[1;39m[[0m[39m++i[0m[1;39m][0m[39m;  [0m[35m/[0m[35m/[0m[39m Treat h and hh as int[0m                  [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m267[0m[39m:      if [0m[1;39m([0m[39mc == [0m[32m'l'[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m [0m[1;39m{[0m                                                           [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m268[0m[39m:        is_long++, c = fmt[0m[1;39m[[0m[39m++i[0m[1;39m][0m[39m;[0m                                                [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m269[0m[39m:        if [0m[1;39m([0m[39mc == [0m[32m'l'[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m is_long++, c = fmt[0m[1;39m[[0m[39m++i[0m[1;39m][0m[39m;[0m                                  [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m270[0m[39m:      [0m[1;39m}[0m                                                                         [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m```[0m                                                                                 [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m<[0m[35m/[0m[95mcode[0m[39m>[0m                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m<[0m[35m/[0m[95mcode_snippets[0m[39m>[0m                                                                    [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m## Fix Strategy[0m                                                                     [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m<fix_strategy>[0m                                                                      [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m## Analysis[0m                                                                         [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mAfter analyzing the evaluation report and code snippets, I can now clearly identify[0m [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mthe root cause and why the previous patch failed:[0m                                   [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m### Root Cause Identification[0m                                                       [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mThe ASan report identifies a stack-buffer-overflow in a variable named `tmp371` at [0m [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mline [0m[1;36m319[0m[39m, which is an [0m[1;36m8[0m[39m-byte buffer `[0m[1;39m[[0m[1;36m112[0m[39m, [0m[1;36m120[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m` in the `mg_vxprintf` stack frame. [0m [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mThe overflow occurs when writing [0m[1;36m1[0m[39m byte at offset [0m[1;36m120[0m[39m, which is exactly [0m[1;36m1[0m[39m byte [0m     [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mbeyond the allocated [0m[1;36m8[0m[39m-byte buffer.[0m                                                 [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m**Critical Discovery**: The ASan report shows [0m[32m"tmp371"[0m[39m is at line [0m[1;36m319[0m[39m, but looking [0m [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mat the source code:[0m                                                                 [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m- Line [0m[1;36m318[0m[39m: `char tmp[0m[1;39m[[0m[1;36m8[0m[1;39m][0m[39m;` - This is the actual [0m[1;36m8[0m[39m-byte buffer[0m                       [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m- Line [0m[1;36m319[0m[39m: `double d = [0m[1;35mva_arg[0m[1;39m([0m[39m*ap, double[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m;` - This is a double variable[0m           [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mThe compiler has generated the name [0m[32m"tmp371"[0m[39m for the `tmp` buffer declared at line [0m [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m318[0m[39m [0m[1;39m([0m[39mto distinguish it from the other `tmp` at line [0m[1;36m276[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m, and ASan is associating [0m  [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mit with line [0m[1;36m319[0m[39m [0m[1;39m([0m[39mpossibly due to compiler optimizations or debug info[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m.[0m            [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m### Why the Previous Patch Failed[0m                                                   [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mThe previous patch attempted to:[0m                                                    [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m1[0m[39m. Change line [0m[1;36m318[0m[39m from `char tmp[0m[1;39m[[0m[1;36m8[0m[1;39m][0m[39m;` to `char tmp[0m[1;39m[[0m[1;36m40[0m[1;39m][0m[39m;`[0m                           [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m2[0m[39m. Change line [0m[1;36m322[0m[39m from `[0m[1;35mmg_dtoa[0m[1;39m([0m[39mtmp, [0m[1;36m10[0m[39m, mantissa, [0m[1;36m8[0m[39m, c == [0m[32m'e'[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m;` to `[0m[1;35mmg_dtoa[0m[1;39m([0m[39mtmp,[0m [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;35msizeof[0m[1;39m([0m[39mtmp[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m, mantissa, [0m[1;36m8[0m[39m, c == [0m[32m'e'[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m;`[0m                                               [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mHowever, the post-patch ASan report shows **identical** errors:[0m                     [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m- Same stack frame layout[0m                                                           [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m- Same [0m[1;36m8[0m[39m-byte buffer at `[0m[1;39m[[0m[1;36m112[0m[39m, [0m[1;36m120[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m`[0m                                                [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m- Same overflow at offset [0m[1;36m120[0m                                                       [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mThis indicates the patch was **not applied to the correct file** or **the changes [0m  [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mdidn't persist** in the compiled binary. The issue is that the patch shows changes [0m [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mwith **tabs** [0m[1;39m([0m[39mshown as `\t` in diffs[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m, but the context suggests the codebase might[0m [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39muse different whitespace.[0m                                                           [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m### The Buffer Overflow Mechanism[0m                                                   [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m1[0m[39m. **Line [0m[1;36m322[0m[39m**: `k = [0m[1;35mmg_dtoa[0m[1;39m([0m[39mtmp, [0m[1;36m10[0m[39m, mantissa, [0m[1;36m8[0m[39m, c == [0m[32m'e'[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m;`[0m                     [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m   - Passes an [0m[1;36m8[0m[39m-byte buffer as first parameter[0m                                     [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m   - Claims the buffer is [0m[1;36m10[0m[39m bytes [0m[1;39m([0m[39msecond parameter[0m[1;39m)[0m                               [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m   - When `mg_dtoa` internally calls `[0m[1;35mmg_snprintf[0m[1;39m([0m[39mdst, dstlen, [0m[32m"%s"[0m[39m, buf[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m` at line [0m [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m204[0m                                                                                 [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m   - If the formatted mantissa is [0m[1;36m8[0m[39m-[0m[1;36m9[0m[39m characters [0m[1;39m([0m[39me.g., [0m[32m"3.141592"[0m[39m = [0m[1;36m8[0m[39m chars + null[0m [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m= [0m[1;36m9[0m[39m bytes[0m[1;39m)[0m                                                                          [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m   - `mg_snprintf` will attempt to write [0m[1;36m9[0m[39m bytes to what it believes is a [0m[1;36m10[0m[39m-byte [0m  [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mbuffer[0m                                                                              [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m   - But the actual buffer is only [0m[1;36m8[0m[39m bytes, causing a [0m[1;36m1[0m[39m-byte overflow[0m               [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m2[0m[39m. **Line [0m[1;36m326[0m[39m**: `k = [0m[1;35mmg_lld[0m[1;39m([0m[39mtmp, exponent, [0m[1;36m1[0m[39m, [0m[1;36m0[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m;`[0m                                 [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m   - Reuses the same [0m[1;36m8[0m[39m-byte buffer[0m                                                  [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m   - For large exponents [0m[1;39m([0m[39me.g., [0m[1;36m308[0m[39m for values near DBL_MAX[0m[1;39m)[0m                        [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m   - Could write [0m[32m"-308"[0m[39m [0m[1;39m([0m[1;36m4[0m[39m bytes[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m + null, which fits in [0m[1;36m8[0m[39m bytes[0m                     [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m   - But combined with mg_dtoa's requirements, the buffer is too small[0m              [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m### Consistency with Codebase[0m                                                       [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mLine [0m[1;36m275[0m[39m in the same function shows: `char tmp[0m[1;39m[[0m[1;36m40[0m[1;39m][0m[39m;` for other format specifiers [0m   [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;39m([0m[32m'd'[0m[39m, [0m[32m'u'[0m[39m, [0m[32m'x'[0m[39m, [0m[32m'X'[0m[39m, [0m[32m'p'[0m[39m, [0m[32m'g'[0m[39m, [0m[32m'f'[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m. The [0m[32m'e'[0m[35m/[0m[32m'E'[0m[39m handler should follow the same [0m    [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mpattern.[0m                                                                            [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m## Fix Strategy[0m                                                                     [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m### Step [0m[1;36m1[0m[39m: Locate and Verify the Exact Code Location[0m                               [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mThe fix must target the [0m[32m'e'[0m[35m/[0m[32m'E'[0m[39m format specifier handler in `src/fmt.c`, [0m           [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mspecifically lines [0m[1;36m317[0m[39m-[0m[1;36m327[0m[39m within the `mg_vxprintf` function.[0m                       [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m### Step [0m[1;36m2[0m[39m: Apply the Buffer Size Fix[0m                                               [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m**Change [0m[1;36m1[0m[39m**: Increase the buffer size from [0m[1;36m8[0m[39m to [0m[1;36m40[0m[39m bytes[0m                           [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m- **Location**: Line [0m[1;36m318[0m[39m in `src/fmt.c`[0m                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m- **Current**: `char tmp[0m[1;39m[[0m[1;36m8[0m[1;39m][0m[39m;`[0m                                                       [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m- **Fixed**: `char tmp[0m[1;39m[[0m[1;36m40[0m[1;39m][0m[39m;`[0m                                                        [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m- **Rationale**: Aligns with the buffer size used for other format specifiers at [0m   [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mline [0m[1;36m275[0m[39m, and matches the [0m[1;36m40[0m[39m-byte internal buffer used by `mg_dtoa` itself [0m[1;39m([0m[39mline [0m   [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m139[0m[1;39m)[0m                                                                                [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m### Step [0m[1;36m3[0m[39m: Correct the Buffer Size Parameter[0m                                       [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m**Change [0m[1;36m2[0m[39m**: Use actual buffer size instead of hardcoded value[0m                     [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m- **Location**: Line [0m[1;36m322[0m[39m in `src/fmt.c`[0m                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m- **Current**: `k = [0m[1;35mmg_dtoa[0m[1;39m([0m[39mtmp, [0m[1;36m10[0m[39m, mantissa, [0m[1;36m8[0m[39m, c == [0m[32m'e'[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m;`[0m                       [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m- **Fixed**: `k = [0m[1;35mmg_dtoa[0m[1;39m([0m[39mtmp, [0m[1;35msizeof[0m[1;39m([0m[39mtmp[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m, mantissa, [0m[1;36m8[0m[39m, c == [0m[32m'e'[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m;`[0m                [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m- **Rationale**: Ensures `mg_dtoa` knows the actual buffer size [0m[1;39m([0m[1;36m40[0m[39m bytes[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m, [0m        [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mpreventing writes beyond the buffer boundary[0m                                        [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m### Step [0m[1;36m4[0m[39m: Whitespace Handling[0m                                                     [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m**Critical Note**: The previous patch used tabs in the indentation. Ensure the [0m     [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mpatch matches the existing indentation style in the file:[0m                           [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m- If the file uses spaces, use spaces[0m                                               [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m- If the file uses tabs, use tabs[0m                                                   [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m- Verify the exact indentation by examining surrounding lines[0m                       [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m## Justification[0m                                                                    [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m### Why This is the Optimal Approach[0m                                                [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m1[0m[39m. **Minimal Changes**: Only two lines need modification, reducing the risk of [0m     [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mintroducing new bugs[0m                                                                [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m2[0m[39m. **Consistency**: Aligns with the existing pattern used for other format [0m         [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mspecifiers in the same function[0m                                                     [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m3[0m[39m. **Root Cause Resolution**: Addresses both the incorrect buffer size declaration [0m [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mand the incorrect size parameter[0m                                                    [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m4[0m[39m. **No Functional Changes**: Preserves the existing formatting logic and output [0m   [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mbehavior[0m                                                                            [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m5[0m[39m. **No External Dependencies**: All changes are within the mongoose codebase[0m       [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m### How It Preserves Existing Logic[0m                                                 [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m1[0m[39m. **Format Output**: The mantissa formatting [0m[1;39m([0m[39mline [0m[1;36m322[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m and exponent formatting [0m   [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;39m([0m[39mline [0m[1;36m326[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m logic remains unchanged[0m                                                  [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m2[0m[39m. **Width Parameter**: The fourth parameter [0m[1;39m([0m[1;36m8[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m in mg_dtoa controls precision, not[0m [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mbuffer size, and remains unchanged[0m                                                  [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m3[0m[39m. **Other Format Specifiers**: No changes to any other format handlers[0m             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m4[0m[39m. **Buffer Reuse Pattern**: The buffer is still reused for both mantissa and [0m      [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mexponent [0m[1;39m([0m[39mlines [0m[1;36m322[0m[39m and [0m[1;36m326[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m, maintaining the existing pattern[0m                      [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m### How It Addresses the Issues[0m                                                     [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m1[0m[39m. **Stack-Buffer-Overflow**: The [0m[1;36m40[0m[39m-byte buffer provides sufficient space for:[0m     [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m   - `mg_dtoa` to write mantissa strings [0m[1;39m([0m[39mup to ~[0m[1;36m20[0m[39m bytes with precision [0m[1;36m8[0m[1;39m)[0m         [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m   - `mg_lld` to write exponent strings [0m[1;39m([0m[39mup to ~[0m[1;36m21[0m[39m bytes for int64_t range[0m[1;39m)[0m         [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m   - Null terminators and safety margins[0m                                            [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m2[0m[39m. **Correct Size Information**: `[0m[1;35msizeof[0m[1;39m([0m[39mtmp[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m` correctly tells `mg_dtoa` the buffer[0m [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mis [0m[1;36m40[0m[39m bytes, preventing writes beyond the actual buffer boundary[0m                    [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m3[0m[39m. **ASan Detection**: With the correct buffer size, ASan will no longer detect the[0m [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39moverflow at offset [0m[1;36m120[0m[39m [0m[1;39m([0m[39mwhich was [0m[1;36m8[0m[39m bytes + [0m[1;36m1[0m[39m byte overflow[0m[1;39m)[0m                        [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m### Potential Side Effects and Mitigation[0m                                           [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m1[0m[39m. **Stack Usage Increase**: Increases stack usage by [0m[1;36m32[0m[39m bytes [0m[1;39m([0m[39mfrom [0m[1;36m8[0m[39m to [0m[1;36m40[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m per [0m  [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [32m'e'[0m[35m/[0m[32m'E'[0m[39m format call[0m                                                                 [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m   - **Mitigation**: This is negligible and consistent with other format specifiers[0m [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39malready using [0m[1;36m40[0m[39m bytes[0m                                                              [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m2[0m[39m. **Performance**: No performance impact as the buffer is stack-allocated[0m          [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m3[0m[39m. **Compatibility**: No ABI changes or external API modifications[0m                  [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m### Reference to Similar Solutions[0m                                                  [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mThe fix follows the exact pattern used at line [0m[1;36m275[0m[39m-[0m[1;36m280[0m[39m for [0m[32m'g'[0m[39m and [0m[32m'f'[0m[39m format [0m      [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mspecifiers:[0m                                                                         [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m```c[0m                                                                                [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mchar tmp[0m[1;39m[[0m[1;36m40[0m[1;39m][0m[39m;[0m                                                                       [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [35m/[0m[35m/[0m[39m [0m[33m...[0m                                                                              [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mk = [0m[1;35mmg_dtoa[0m[1;39m([0m[39mtmp, [0m[1;35msizeof[0m[1;39m([0m[39mtmp[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m, v, [0m[1;39m([0m[39mint[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m pr, c == [0m[32m'g'[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m;[0m                               [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m```[0m                                                                                 [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mThis demonstrates that the codebase already uses this approach for similar [0m         [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mdouble-to-string conversions.[0m                                                       [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m## Implementation Notes[0m                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mThe patch must be applied to the initial codebase at `src/fmt.c` lines [0m[1;36m318[0m[39m and [0m[1;36m322[0m[39m.[0m [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mThe changes are:[0m                                                                    [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m1[0m[39m. Line [0m[1;36m318[0m[39m: Replace `char tmp[0m[1;39m[[0m[1;36m8[0m[1;39m][0m[39m;` with `char tmp[0m[1;39m[[0m[1;36m40[0m[1;39m][0m[39m;`[0m                            [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m2[0m[39m. Line [0m[1;36m322[0m[39m: Replace the second parameter `[0m[1;36m10[0m[39m` with `[0m[1;35msizeof[0m[1;39m([0m[39mtmp[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m` in the mg_dtoa [0m   [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mcall[0m                                                                                [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mThese changes ensure the buffer is properly sized and the size information is [0m      [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mcorrectly communicated to `mg_dtoa`, resolving the stack-buffer-overflow [0m           [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mvulnerability.[0m                                                                      [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m<[0m[35m/[0m[95mfix_strategy[0m[1m>[0m                                                                     [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         ===Evaluation [33mEnd[0m===                                                                [2m                [0m
